story:
A Taste Dinner - Reheat and Relax

Taste answers the age-old question “What’s for dinner?” in a new and exciting way. I create inventive recipes based on seasonal ingredients. The menu changes weekly and always includes gluten-free and vegetarian options.  All dinners are fully cooked - all you have to do is reheat and relax.

I do all of the cooking in the back-of-the-house, and serve as the face of the company in the front-of-the-house, establishing personal relationships with all of my customers so they come to think of me as their “personal chef."

Taste by Katie is perfect for when:

- There's no time to go to the market

- You don't have time to cook

- You want a meal prepared to meet your needs

- You're tired of eating typical fast food

Taste by Katie makes your "rush-hour" a thing of the past!

After a year of steady growth, it's time to expand. I have made due with broken ovens, finicky refrigerators and a freezer on the fritz. What?! No more ice cream?!?! For the past year, I have been the executive chef, sous chef, and line cook (with a little help from my family). The website needs improved functionality, and increased outreach to the community will greatly increase sales. With your help, I'll be able to buy new equipment, hire an assistant, and increase my marketing efforts.

True Stories from Taste:

Something to Crow About -- It is 7:00 on a cold January night and my phone rings. One of my best customers has just finished dinner and is calling to tell me the Chicken Pot Pie he had for dinner “is awesome.” The Chicken Pot Pie is made with roasted chicken breast, carrots and peas in a savory gravy and topped with a biscuit crust.  I immediately send an email to my customers about the positive feedback. I am sold out of Chicken Pot Pie by the next day.

Taste Wins 1st Prize in Chili Cook-off -- In 2014, I participated in a Chili Cook-off that has become a Labor Day tradition in Arlington, VA. Having never participated in a cook-off before and since Taste had only been open for four months, I thought the publicity would be good. Labor Day was forecast to be hot and humid, so I created a chili to demonstrate my inventive style of cooking, balancing hot and cold ingredients. The result, "East Meets West Chili," ground pork infused with Asian spices and topped with a broccoli-pineapple slaw, hoisin sour cream and crispy noodles. A winning recipe.

Vegan Valentine's 911 -- On February 13, I got a call from a customer looking for a special dinner for Valentine's Day. She explained that her husband is vegan and it's very hard to find delicious recipes that meet his needs. "Could you come up with a dinner for us for tomorrow?" she asked. "No problem," I said. On Valentine's Day she had braised beef short ribs and he had Coconut Curry with zucchini. They LOVED it.

The Goal:

Taste wants to raise $30,000 to purchase new equipment, hire an assistant, and expand marketing efforts. 

Since one great chef can only create so much delicious food in a finite amount of time, increased storage capacity, better equipment, and a well-trained assistant will help meet the growing desire for Taste's wide range of appetizers, dinners and desserts. In addition, expanded marketing efforts will help spread the word about Taste's unique brand of restaurant-quality food that is ready to eat at home in 30 minutes or less.

Risks and Challenges:
I have overcome several hurdles in getting Taste off the ground. A year-long search to find the perfect space, managing the various permits required to launch a food-service company, and buying affordable equipment, were just some of the challenges I met.

In the competitive Washington, DC dining market, Taste's biggest challenge is getting foodies in the door with so many other corporate-backed options in the area. Being a small business in big city and making a name for yourself is tough!

The biggest challenge will be to balance the marketing and staffing to continue to grow at a sustainable rate. My recipe for success is having the right amount of marketing and staff to keep the business cooking all week.

story:
Support Camp SNAP!

Camp SNAP (Silly Nerdy Activities Playground) is bringing hot and iced coffee, tea, and water for burners of all ages. It is our hope that they will enjoy their drinks while socializing together over games of all sizes. We will have a public shaded Cafe and a larger public shade Game Lounge. We are trying to bring games (board to over sized) and build great fun games, see example below:

We plan to keep the cafe open every morning Monday through Sunday from 10am-1pm. We want everyone in Burning Man to start off on the right foot, and to reconnect over a game. 


Does SNAP sound like something you can support? Please do! Have a question? Email us at campsnap@gmail.com. You should also scroll down to check out the various perks available.  

Want to know more?

We currently have everything (scaffolding, cafe equipment, games, decor, and more) stored just outside of Reno. In order to bring all the infrastructure for the Cafe and Game Lounge, we need to rent a huge truck to move it.

We hope to set up a really chill spot. The game lounge will have tons of seating in a shaded structure for the public and stay open during all the daylight hours. We are trying to get a generator to make the game space available 24 hours to the Playa. Can you help us get our chill camp below to the Playa?


What we are asking for:

We need $2,500 for the truck (20', 11 days, +miles). We are just asking for help with the truck, We would love to have a stretch goal of $3,650. This would be $650 for a generator (power, lights, keep the game area open 24/7) and $500 as wiggle emergency money… but that is an extreme wish.

The Impact

Let’s face it, no one is himself or herself until they have their morning brew, and that can be hard to find sometimes. We want to help make the Playa easier, while providing games to socialize over. Do you think we have enough coffee?

Other Ways You Can Help

There are other ways to help that are not monetary, you can share this campaign or donations of needed items like: French Presses, teapots, and manual coffee drips. You can join us at a fundraiser if in the SF Bay area! Email us at campsnap@gmail.com or go to www.campsnap.wix.com/snap to see how you can help. 

Check out the Perks:

 

Above are neck shades, they come in simple colors and patterns. Note the simple colors have either the SNAP logo or our modified Man. Below are the arrowhead necklaces.

 

These are a few shots and examples of the necklaces. The colors are: white, light brown marble, reddish orange, green, light colored marble, dark brown, dark brown marble, and black.

 

Below are shark teeth necklaces, there are single tooth necklaces and necklaces with three teeth.

   

Below are petrified agate rock necklaces

      

   

Above are raw agate in a spiral and below is petrified agate.

   

Below are the polished extremely colorful agate necklaces in all shapes and sizes.

  

  

There are small, medium, and large tear drops, small, medium, large hearts, ovals, rectangles, triangles, dog tag shape, rounded diamond, and flat bottom ovals.

 

  

Below are butterfly earrings, some we have two pairs of and others the larger ones are single pairs. Don't worry, all butterflies lived out their full lives and were not killed in order to make jewelry and adorn your ears. Our inner tree hugger would not allow it, note they have been laminated and thus are sturdy.

   


   

  


Two-tone screen prints that will be framed and sold individually.

Small collage paintings 3x4"

 

 

   


Small prints or post cards 4x3" - will be shipped framed

  

Small prints and silk screens 4x4"- will be shipped in frames

  

Medium screen prints

             


Large Prints



 

  


 

Large Natural photography, will be rolled in a tub to be sent. Sorry I am a crappy photographer, she is not.


Please ask us any questions at campsnap@gmail.com or reach out to me (Natasha) directly at geraghtymedvedn@gmail.com and thank you for checking out our campaign. Please feel free to share it!

Ciao,

SNAP!

story:
Changing the World

I'm Trisha. 'Mom' to my two fabulous teens ( yup, I still like 'em) four dogs, a cat and a chinchilla.  I am a service dog trainer for rescue dogs, a foster mom for children and a dental hygienist in my spare time.

 Over half of all youth from the foster system will end up homeless, in jail, pregnant or even dead within a mere eighteen months of being 'aged out' of the system. 

That's the polite term for what happens when a child in the foster system turns eighteen and the financial help stops.  These kids are simply dropped from the system, out into the world. 
How prepared were you to navigate the world at that age? Exactly! I was a scattered mess at eighteen. Now, imagine facing those same daunting challenges with no family support, no practical life skills and in a world that doesn't view you as worth the time to teach. 
Over 25% of former foster youth are diagnosed with post dramatic stress disorder, that's twice as many as U.S. war veterans! How are they supposed to figure out life in an atmosphere that is hostile toward them? Add to that the fact there are only 1.8% of these abandoned kids that achieve a bachelors degree, and hope just seems to melt away. There you have the perfect recipe for a wasted life.
Not on my watch.
Let's see these kids for who they are: the future of our country and our world. The bright, creative, linear thinking, random reasoning, mathmatic geniuses, people people, quiet, overly vocal, rambunctious, introspective, outside the box living group of young people you would find as a sample of any crowd.   These are not rejects of society, though some may feel that way at times. Oh, wait, I feel like that too. Anyone else reading this that can relate? I guess they're just trying to grow up in this crazy world like anybody else. Except they have no one to help them along. 
Now they do: enter Classy Canine Cuisine. 
Classy Caninie Cuisine is a premium dog food created to help everyday dogs become exceptionally healthy. More importantly, an outstanding and progressive company created to help lost kids get a foothold in life. This sounds like a win-win proposition because it is. The simple things in life usually work best. 
We have intelligent, understanding  and amazingly patient life coaches on staff that work with the kids as they learn how to manage their time, finances, and people skills. Teacher, attorney, artist, photographer, and an animal trainer. Yeah, I think we have most of the bases covered.
I began learning the art of combining the right foods to achieve better behavior ten years ago as I fostered kids with special needs.  We are all familiar with the dreaded sugar high followed by the sugar low. This mix of foods works on the same principal: some foods create more activity in the cells, causing a rapid energy surge. Other foods release a bit more slowly, causing a more relaxed distribution of energy into the body. 
This doesn't necessarily mean one way is better than the other, the information simply allows us to meet our pets' needs more effectively. We can offer food to calm them or to provide a more energetic life. All of our menu items are made with whole, human-grade foods.
Here's Sedona's story:
Sedona was a beautiful boxer mix born with severely deformed knees. She was anxious, in pain and only 11 months old when she came to live with us. As she underwent her surgeries and recoveries, it was apparent her diet needed to be customized. I formulated ' Tender Tummies' for her. I chose lean proteins, gently steamed veggies and specialized anti-inflammatory and antioxidant rich additions. She healed in half the time and far more completely than the surgeons expected. I was proud to have blown them away. Food is the best medicine after all. 
The benefit of natural food for pets has been documented time and again. Fewer vet visits, significantly longer life spans, higher quality of life, reduced, if not eliminated, incidence of obesity and allergies are just the high points of the studies out there. There are even studies demonstrating greatly decreased incidence of cancer in dogs fed whole food diets.
I have seen these results in my own rescue dogs. They come to me emaciated and ragged. Within a week, they have shiny coats, calmer temperaments and significant weight improvement. 
However, the cost for food of this quality is prohibitive for most pet owners. The pet food industry is a multi-billion dollar big business machine. By focusing on our pets and not the money, we are able to produce a pet food that offers the premium in benefits without the premium cost. Hmmm, putting people and their pets before the profits: what a novel idea!
For pet families, affordable high quality pet nutrition translates into pets that experience less stress on their bodies and minds because there are no fillers and toxins commonly found in commercial pet foods. This in turn provides a more relaxed relationship between dog and owner, therefore, a calmer home life. We could all use a little more of that!


What We Need & What You Get

We finally found a location that could very well be home and we need a little help. At Classy Canine Cuisine, we've been working hard on our recipes and want to share them with the world. Our building needed to be large enough to house all our employees, life coaches and a fair amount of equipment. It also needed to be in a safe area without too much distraction. 

There it was! Driving home after a roller hockey game, my son says, "that looks like a good place for our foster kids to work." Then goes back to whatever he was thinking in that amazing thirteen year old brain of his.  A little off the beaten path, but visible enough to be seen was a perfect little storefront/ warehouse. Not too big, not too small, it was truly 'just right'.

We need enough to build a few walls and for some signage with a few months rent in the bank, that takes the largest chunk with no unforeseen complications. The additional is for the unforeseen complications. We all know nothing goes as planned, that's half the adventure. Our appliance needs are simple: a walk in refrigerator and freezer because this place doesn't have anything yet. 

Add large commercial oven and a gigantic mixer for the larger batches we are making now. We can do this. By keeping overhead as low as possible by using my bargain hunting skills, when we have a roof, we have our program. Once we have our program, we can start teaching others how to do the same thing. It's all about the young adults learning life skills, running a successful business and the amazing things that follow. They will be amazing us for decades with their unlocked potential.

If we don't reach our goal, rest assured, we will keep looking for even a small booth to get this program going. Too many people are counting on this venture. Most of whom we haven't even met yet.  

Also, we will use any additional funding to get the marketing aspect effectively utilized. Getting the word out about the program so we can get to as many kids as possible is our top priority.  We are fortunate to have several volunteers, but some of our staff needs to be paid regularly: the kids who make this whole adventure possible!


    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't contribute financially, please visit and like our Facebook page. Please tell everyone you know that they can help make a difference in the life of a young adult at high risk of homelessness or worse. 

    Let folks know about the site and the project. You might even help start a project and make a life changing difference in your neighborhood.

story:
We have a passion for great local ingredients and believe that food can be a vehicle to promote positive change.


We believe that food sparks conversations, breaks the ice and brings people closer together, so why not start with local, affordable and nutrient rich ingredients. We are dedicated to providing 100% local and affordable goods and produce to members of our community and restaurants. 

We will have an ordering cart on our website that will enable individuals and restaurants to login, view, and place orders for food that will be available in the coming week. Online orders will be available for pickup in store; however, for restaurants, the elderly, and people living with disabilities, we will be happy to make deliveries at a pre-arranged day/time. 

In addition to providing excellent quality produce to restaurants and families in downtown Toronto, River Jack's Local Market is also dedicated to providing educational resources (seminars, trips, classes) to help folks save money and waste less. We are currently developing content to get our blog up and running. Check back soon to read about a variety of food related topics; the blog will feature everything from preserving foods (canning, pickling, curing, and dehydrating) to urban gardening to planning meals and it will have an ever growing index of our favourite and user submitted recipes.

Our educational programs will be funded in part through the purchase of our second life items. As part of our dedication to wasting less, we will use foods that are nearing their expiration date to create house made soups, sauces, preserves, or any other delicious things we can think of, which will literally give these items a second life. 

A portion of the proceeds of each second life item will be used to fund chef led cooking classes, where families can learn how to make extraodinary dishes from locally grown food, and trips to farms, where families can learn about where our food comes and participate in question and answer periods with real local farmers. We intend to provide these educational family programs free of charge. We love food and we hope you will too. 

Our waste less mentality is also put into practice in our store design. Our shelves are free of plastics and unnecessary packaging and with the use of reusable glass containers and gravity bins for bulk foods, we can begin to eliminate needless waste in our landfills. 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Cost Breakdown:

  • 10-15k used extended cargo van or small truck for pickups from farms and deliveries to restaurants and elderly or handicap customers. We need a reliable vehicle that is clean, always starts, and lets us get the deliveries where they need to go on time.
  • 30-40k to renovate the space. Kitchen with enough workspace to hold cooking classes. Education centre.
  • ~7k for commercial fridge, freezer, stoves, and dishwasher (will also be used to sterilize bottles)
  • 3.5k for website development
  • If we raise money that goes beyond what we need to get up and running we will channel that money directly into our educational programs which will allow all the fun learning to start sooner.  
The Impact

There is a global need for environmentally friendly and sustainable solutions for industry and agriculture alike. With an ever growing number of hungry bellies to fill, it is of increasing importance that we adopt a new mindset regarding the ways we think about food. By making some simple changes to our food related behaviours at the community level, it is possible and relatively easy to minimize the environmental strain that results from us having food.

Seek out and choose locally grown food whenever possible

Eliminate unecessary packaging

Educate children about food, where it comes from, the effort involved in producing it, and help them to realize its value beyond dollars

Teach families how to preserve food (can/pickle/dry)

Help families learn to cook and plan meals

Make it fun!

The key to initiating this type of change is to have facilities that make these services available and to let people know they are there. This is where you come in!

We do need financial contributions to make River Jack's Local a reality, but that is not the only way you can help. We are always looking for more local famers to purchase from and/or participate in our programs, as well as chefs to lead our cooking courses, and we would be delighted to receive used industrial kitchen appliances/supplies. If that's not you, don't worry because, most importantly, we need to spread the word that River Jack's Local is coming! So please talk about and share our campaign with your friends and family, visit our website, send us some feedback, and certainly don't be shy and feel free to ask us questions. No matter how you contribute, you will be making an impact and helping to affect positive change.  

Risks and Challenges

As with all renovations that have a modest budget, finishing on or under budget will require some creativity and innovation. We intend to use inexpensive materials that meet our needs and will happily repurpose and/or reuse second hand items, gathered from auctions, establishments that are closing down, and local classifieds. 

We also intend to apply for government grants to give our project a little bit of a financial buffer and will also apply for a loan in order to complete the project even if we are unable to meet our campaign goals.

Looking forward to seeing all your happy faces at River Jack's Local Market soon!

* Everyone who contributes will have their name or business posted on our   supporters list in store and on our contributors page on our website.
story_txt:
We have a passion for great local ingredients and believe that food can be a vehicle to promote positive change.


We believe that food sparks conversations, breaks the ice and brings people closer together, so why not start with local, affordable and nutrient rich ingredients. We are dedicated to providing 100% local and affordable goods and produce to members of our community and restaurants. 
We will have an ordering cart on our website that will enable individuals and restaurants to login, view, and place orders for food that will be available in the coming week. Online orders will be available for pickup in store; however, for restaurants, the elderly, and people living with disabilities, we will be happy to make deliveries at a pre-arranged day/time. 
In addition to providing excellent quality produce to restaurants and families in downtown Toronto, River Jack's Local Market is also dedicated to providing educational resources (seminars, trips, classes) to help folks save money and waste less. We are currently developing content to get our blog up and running. Check back soon to read about a variety of food related topics; the blog will feature everything from preserving foods (canning, pickling, curing, and dehydrating) to urban gardening to planning meals and it will have an ever growing index of our favourite and user submitted recipes.

Our educational programs will be funded in part through the purchase of our second life items. As part of our dedication to wasting less, we will use foods that are nearing their expiration date to create house made soups, sauces, preserves, or any other delicious things we can think of, which will literally give these items a second life.

story:
Hi , I am Mark Trezza , founder of Marine Exploration Group  located in upstate New York . Along with my cousin David , we acquired an old 2 man submarine 5 years ago and restored it to better than new condition , making many modern changes in the process . As of right now  , we are looking to buy a used pontoon boat and some other underwater search equipment to help law enforcement in the searches of missing people that disappeared around water environments . For the families of these victims , it means a lot that someone is looking for their loved one , it may not be total closure for them if they are not found , but it certainly helps in the healing process !

Take a look at our Facebook page - Marine Exploration Group - read some of the recent stories that have been written about us ! Feel free to view some of our videos and news broadcast about recent expeditions ! Also you will find here on Indiegogo a couple of links to Youtube for some other videos ! If you can contribute that would be great , from a  $1 on up is appreciated , if you can't , we understand , just a hearty " Hello & Good Luck " is always appreciated !!!!  Don't forget to tell your friends about us and what we are trying to do ! Thank you  !

story:
YES, It's True! - and you're invited to make history with us.

BEER-making stranger's into friends.

This UNIQUE KIWI ALE uses a novel iconic New Zealand ingredient called MANUKA to flavour Ale. 

It's delicious to drink. It's KIWI AS.  And yes, it's another GROUNDBREAKING KIWI INNOVATION. This is Ale like no other. 

These ARE NOT like Captain Cook's, Mussel Inn-Captain Cooker, or Wigram Spruce Beer clones.

The faintest hint of wild honey and manuka flower gives it a refreshing tangy character. Really interesting. 

Yvonne Lorkin - NZ Wine and Beer Critic.

My Manuka Ales are completely different, in flavour, feel, aroma, ingredients, and brewing. This is why I have Letter's Patent awarded from the Patent Office.

Manuka Magic-it's a beauty unique Kiwi Ale is the newest on New Zealand's Beer Landscape, and it's coming to a Licensed Bar, Pub or Bottle Store near you, FOR YOU. 

EVALUATE THEM FOR YOURSELF with a 'Pre order'. Our Perks are unique, and delicious to drink. 

This invention gives hope for Beer Drinkers, as it answers a disturbing trend with Hops, the traditional flavouring in beer.

The Secret

And here is its biggest secret asset, which will make all ale and beer drinkers everywhere very, very happy: 

Hops will be hit very hard by climate change, because they cannot tolerate heat, which stresses the plant, and they are already suffering.  

Manuka however, thrives in these harsher growing conditions, and so Manuka Ales can be an answer to All Beer Drinker's worst fears (expensive low beer production).

The effects of climate change will reduce beer production worldwide, due to lost hop quality and production.

Manuka is a delicious alternative ingredient to hops in beer, and have the ability to supplement this pending loss.

Can humans survive on reduced beer production?

Agricultural and Forest Meteorology.

Volume 149, issues 6-7, 15 June 2009. Pages 913-919. 
THE IMPACT OF CLIMATE CHANGE ON THE YIELD AND QUALITY OF SAAZ HOPS IN THE CZECH REPUBLIC.
The impact of climate change on the production and quality of hops Humulus lupulus will depend on future weather conditions in the growing season. Our simulations suggest that hops will be particularly vulnerable to a change in climate. Even with the modest warming so far experienced yields have stagnated and quality declined. Recorded observations show an increase in air temperature which is associated with an earlier onset of hop phenological phases and a shortening of the vegetation period.
With prices high and breweries booming, hop growers should be full of good cheer. Instead, they have furrowed brows as climate change threatens the finicky crop.
This is not a problem that’s going to happen someday. 
If you drink beer now, the issue of climate change is impacting you right now.

See these links.

http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0168192309000392

http://www.nature.com/news/2008/080502/full/news.2008.799.html

http://thinkprogress.org/climate/2011/11/28/377061/global-warming

That's a pretty compelling reason to make a contribution, isn't it? 

Your good will IS APPRECIATED, however we must go over campaign target to brew this ale. 

Please consider taking the next step to allow us brew this ale. For your contribution please choose from the perks on offer? You can check them out on the right, then click on. 

Here is a CURRENCY CONVERTER for your convenience. 

http://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/

This IS NOT a Fundraising Campaign, nor is it an Equity Sale in a Business.It's an EXCLUSIVE 'PRE-SALES' EVENT to our Audience.

It's a crowd source campaign to raise EXCLUSIVE Orders as Ale Future's Vouchers, redeemable at the end of this campaign for ale, with other Perks for our Audience (over 20 years of age) so to bring this ale, and others soon after, into commercial production. 

GREAT - why am I reading this here?

The “crowd source” platform is the perfect way to bring my beers to you, as they haven't been brewed yet. 

At NATURALE ™ I will brew for YOU our Audience, your orders of Ale Future's Voucher's, or your money back.

This is a modern way to get your mitts on this Ale, which are EXCLUSIVE to this campaign. 

Your Ale 'Future's Voucher' order will go into production at the end of the campaign, providing the campaign target is met for brewing to commence.

When the ale is ready, you will be able to redeem your voucher.

It's as easy as that. The more you place pre-sales 'Ale Future's Vouchers', the better chance of making this a permanent offering. 

The more you want, the more I brew. It's supply and demand. JUST KEEP ORDERING to keep the ale flowing to you. 

Your good will IS APPRECIATED, however it will not allow us to brew this ale. 

Please consider the next step to allow us to brew Manuka Ales, with a contribution for one of the perks on offer? You can check them out on the right, then click on. 

Here's a CURRENCY CONVERTER for your convenience.

http://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/


Hello, I'm Tony Dapson, Brewer and Owner of Naturale ™, a Brewing Brand from Napier, HAWKE'S BAY, NEW ZEALAND, on the East Coast of the North Island. 

Iv'e brewed Ales and Beers for 40 years, so I know good Beer and how to brew it.

In  1996, I invented a process of brewing with a novel ingredient using a small iconic tree found only in New Zealand. MANUKA- Leptospemum scoparium.

In 1999, I was awarded Letters Patent in New Zealand and Australia, with others pending for this invention.

This invention was born in Napier, Hawke's Bay, and is proudly MADE IN NEW ZEALAND.  A first rate food producing region of the World.

................................................................................................................................

This is Not Just Any Ale!

These Manuka Ales are a Historical Development in Beer Evolution. I believe them to be a NEW BRANCH on the Beer Tree, much like Lagers form part of it. 
You can be part of this HISTORIC EVOLUTION, by supporting Manuka Ales.
Your good will IS APPRECIATED, however it will not allow us to brew this ale. 
Please take the next step towards the brewing, with a contribution for one of the perks on offer? You can check them out on the right, then click on. 

Here's a CURRENCY CONVERTER for your convenience.   

 http://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/ 

Manuka Tree.

What is MANUKA?

Manuka is a small scruffy tree / shrub, which is found on only in New Zealand. It's the first plant to regenerate in open ground, and allows other plants to establish. 

It's like a nugget toughing it out in it's environment, and so can tolerate extreme conditions. 

.............................................................................................................................................

Endorsements. 

Brewer's Statement.

It is the culmination of years of experimental work, by trail and error, to bring Manuka Ales to this point. Development is on-going.
How do I convey the 'taste' of Manuka Magic Ale!
It's a complex explosion of very subtle flavours interacting with each other, infusing on your tongue.
Your first sip tells it all. You'll then understand why I've called it MAGIC. 
I stand by all the endorsements made below. They are from a cross section of society, and all walks of life.

Tony Dapson . Brewer. NATURALE.  Napier, Hawke's Bay, NZ.

..........................................

Here's what others are saying about Manuka Magic-it's a beauty Unique Kiwi Ale

The Magic of Manuka

Tony Dapson has created a smooth ale with an interesting herbal anise-edge. It's his most popular brew, and it's easy to see why.

The faintest hint of wild honey and manuka flower gives it a refreshing tangy character. Really interesting. 

Yvonne Lorkin - NZ Wine and Beer Critic. May 17th 2014. Indulge Magazine.

.........................................

We had Manuka Magic Ale on the guest tap a couple of times. The locals really took to it, and with rave revues. We were happy it went very well. 

Grant. Duty Bar Manager, The Rose & Shamrock Pub, Havelock North.

.......................................

Yep it's MAGIC! I'll be back for more of it.

Chris from Sydney, Australia.  

..................................

Tasty and moreish. We bought extra to keep us going.

J. Barcley, Townsville, Australia. 

.................................

A well constucted complex beer with a lovely hint of strawberries in it's finish.

This novel smooth tasty ale, will satisfy and bring joy to beer drinker's, I'm sure.

Les, Brewing Guru at Jellybean Brewing, Napier. 

.................................

We are from Seattle, Washington, USA, so we know about Craft Beer. Manuka Magic ranks highly in our minds. Lots of complex flavours, sweet start, herbal and spicey on the palate, and a subtle bitterness finish. Good stuff.

John Harvey, Seattle, Washington, USA.

................................

Manuka Magic is GREAT. Can't wait to find it on tap in Welly.

Beer Lover.  Wellington, NZ Craft Beer Capital. 

................................

Manuka Magic is FANTASTIC. Give this guy a hand by buying your share.

David Cowie, Napier.

.................................

Thanks for trying your Manuka Magic Ale. I've just had the chance to enjoy it after doing some physical work in the heat. Definitely hit the spot, refreshing, crisp, flavourful. Good luck with everything.

Best wishes John Bell, Massey University. 

And many more.

HEY MATE. Support us to brew - IT'S FOR YOU!
Brews in the Wings. 

When things fire up, I will extend my other offerings.  Here's some exciting Ales and Beers you'll want to get your lips on. 

SKOR Premium Lager-you're a winner 5% acl/vol

DAPS Classic Ale-fixing a thirst 4.3% alc/vol

MANUKA PURL-what a treat 5% alc/vol

BLACK BARK MANUKA-smooth as silk 3.9% alc/vol

(Others under development and under wraps).

What are FUTURE'S VOUCHERS?

They are for 14 people grouping together to Pre-order Ale in a 30 Litre Keg giving each person 2 Litres of Ale each. (+20 Years Of Age ID Required).

THE FIRST OFFERING will be the freshest, cheapest and most direct way to offer ale to you, in 30 Litre Kegs delivered to a Licensed Liquor Establishment you nominate for delivery. 

For simplicity of operation, it's preferable for you to gather another 13 of your Friends, or Club Members together (over 20 years of age), and each contribute to a Group Voucher.  Everyone owns 2 Litres of Ale in a 30 Litre Keg.  The two litres on top is a gift, as tastings, spillage etc. 

Fill your 2 Litres in your own Flagon or Growler for home consumption, or enjoy Manuka Magic in your Licensed Club, (as an example). Then return the empty keg to us for refilling.

It's fun to share the experience in your Group setting with your mates.

Your nominated Licensed Liquor Establishment will supervise pouring. They may charge you a pouring fee, or sell you your Growler/Flagon. This is fair and to be expected.

You maybe a member of your local RSA, or Service, or Chartered Club. A Sports Club, a Golf Club, local Rugby, Soccer, Cricket, Tennis, Bowling or Fishing Club. A Social Club at your Work, a Craft Beer Bar/Pub, a local neighbourhood tavern or winery, or any other club you can think of!  Your local or another Off Sales Liquor Outlet in your town. 

You will know your local club, bar, or pub scene, so it's easier for you to make the connection between us for dispatch if you're a member of a Club as above, or you can approach your local Super Liquor Outlet.

Please ask your Licensed Liquor Establishment first to receive your first offering. It MUST pass through a Licensed Liquor Establishment, and not direct to a Public Member for us to stay within the Licensing Regulations.

You as the person who has made a 'Future's Voucher' purchase principal will ensure the keg is returned to us when your Group has emptied the keg. (You own the Ale, we own the Keg).

Keg transport fees will be inclusive of your purchase. Keep the Pre-sales Orders coming . There is NO CUT OFF after the campaign reaches target. 

The special InDemand feature allows future orders after the campaign finishes.

I will brew Manuka Magic Ale at ROOSTERS' ALE HOUSE, Hastings, HAWKE'S BAY, NZ. in 1200 litre batches brewed to orders placed.

...............................................................................................

WANTED. 
600 KEEN BEER FANS TO START MANUKA MAGIC FLOWING OUT THE BREWERY DOOR.
The numbers tell us we need 600 committed followers from our audience to make a contribution of NZ$24 for 2 litres of Ale each, to move the project to reach campaign target. 

Group your 14 mate's together and share a Keg.That's GOOD MATE-SHIP isn't it!
Group of 14 ALE FUTURE'S VOUCHERS. ( Manuka Magic Ale-30 litres in Keg). 
SORRY, New Zealand Audience Only. (+20 years of age).

Group Normal Price is US$250. That's US$17.88 (NZ24 approx) each for your 2 litres of Manuka Magic Ale.

EARLY BIRDS will receive 10% OFF the normal price in the FIRST 21 DAYS of the campaign, for their shrewd move on our First Offering.

DON'T BE DISAPPOINTED, organize your 14 Person Group NOW and to secure your 10% DISCOUNT opportunities.

It's first in, first served.  

.................................................................................................................................

How long will it take before I get my lips on this Ale?

This campaign runs for 60 DAYS from 3rd February 2015. Add 8 weeks to brew the ale. This will allow deliveries to start approximately 25th June 2015.

We offer perks (right) for a contribution.

Here's a CURRENCY CONVERTER for your convenience.

http://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/     

$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$

The Targets.

THE CAMPAIGN TARGET is US$11,000 this will allow us to brew Keg Ale for our New Zealand Home Audience, with redeemable Ale Future's Vouchers.This Stretch Limit amount MUST be met before this can happen.

STRETCH LIMIT 1 is US$100,000, which will allow us to brew and bottle ale for our international audience, offering Single 500 ml Bottle Tasting Samples. This Stretch Limit amount MUST be met before this can happen.

(Brewing Licenses not included).

$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$

Where does the money go?

The CAMPAIGN TARGET OF US$11,000 MUST BE MET to be able to brew Manuka Magic-it's a beauty unique Kiwi Ale for you. That's the absolute minimum amount required to start production.

Anything less leaves us stranded, and I would have to re-launch the campaign to get the Funds in over campaign target to brew for you. 

Keg Ale (campaign target)

The Funds provided will go towards ingredients in the ale, costs of brewing, Government Excise Tax, storage, new kegs, transport, running costs of this campaign, bank fees, perk purchases, liquor licenses. 

Ideally it would be FANTASTIC to have enough Funds come in, so I can send off BOTTLED ALE TASTERS EVERYWHERE for you.

Bottling Ale adds substantial costs (stretch limit 1)

Those increased costs are for larger volumes brewed, for more ingredients, bottling costs, bottles packaging, label manufacture.

 $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$

Calling ALL INTERNATIONALS - it's for you as well.

A Brewer needs his own brewery. To serve New Zealand and Export Markets with these delicious Manuka Ales I do too.

That's a pretty good reason, but here's a better reason. 

It's so you can SEE YOUR NAME ON OUR BREWERY WALL. 

My Manuka Ales MUST go to INTERNATIONAL MARKETS. 

HOPS ARE IN TROUBLE, AND SO IS YOUR PINT OF BEER.

We could be heading for PEAK BEER! and reduced beer production. Beer would become a luxury item. 

What are your thoughts on that?

SO LET'S GET these delicious Manuka Ales ON THE MARKET, and take the sting out of this situation FOR EVERY DRINKER, BY CREATING A SOLUTION TO THIS UNTHINKABLE PROBLEM.

Would you like to make your perk order on the right?

Here's a CURRENCY CONVERTER for your convenience.

http://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/  

$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$

Great perks are on offer.

We are offering you some GREAT PERKS. The Manuka Magic is FANTASTIC, and we've offered Perks everyone should enjoy.


                                                          


Ale 'Future's Vouchers' - International. One 500ml glass bottle Manuka Magic-it's a beauty Unique Kiwi Ale. 4.6% alc/vol GET US OVER US$100,000 stretch target 1, so you can start to get these.

..............................................................................................................................................

Several of my Friends have said they felt MORE DESIRABLE TO THE OPPOSITE SEX, after drinking one or two glasses of this magnificent brew. WOW! REALLY THAT'S AMAZING! No one's ugly anymore! I thought they were shining more lately.

There you go, fact or fiction. It's just one more reason why you should give this ale a try ;-) 

   

                                                   

                                          CHEERS EVERYONE ;-)

You now have lots of reasons why you would like to join our Audience.  

MAKE ORDERS, THEN SHOUT OUT LOUD TO YOUR FRIENDS EVERYWHERE. 

Please use the indiegogo.com tools to tell your Friends and networks, the importance of getting the word out to make the campaign a success.

I appreciate your time and effort you've taken to read this story. If you have made a contribution made for a perk. I THANK YOU VERY MUCH.

To contact us, go to comments with your questions.

Cheers,

Tony.

If you drink beer now, the issue of climate change is impacting you right now.

See these links.

http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0168192309000392
http://www.nature.com/news/2008/080502/full/news.2008.799.html
http://thinkprogress.org/climate/2011/11/28/377061/global-warming

It's a crowd source campaign to raise EXCLUSIVE Orders as Ale Future's Vouchers, redeemable at the end of this campaign for ale, with other Perks for our Audience (over 20 years of age) so to bring this ale, and others soon after, into commercial production. 

GREAT - why am I reading this here?
The “crowd source” platform is the perfect way to bring my beers to you, as they haven't been brewed yet. 
At NATURALE ™ I will brew for YOU our Audience, your orders of Ale Future's Voucher's, or your money back.

Hello, I'm Tony Dapson, Brewer and Owner of Naturale ™, a Brewing Brand from Napier, HAWKE'S BAY, NEW ZEALAND, on the East Coast of the North Island. 
Iv'e brewed Ales and Beers for 40 years, so I know good Beer and how to brew it.
In  1996, I invented a process of brewing with a novel ingredient using a small iconic tree found only in New Zealand. MANUKA- Leptospemum scoparium.
In 1999, I was awarded Letters Patent in New Zealand and Australia, with others pending for this invention.
This invention was born in Napier, Hawke's Bay, and is proudly MADE IN NEW ZEALAND.  A first rate food producing region of the World.
................................................................................................................................
This is Not Just Any Ale!
These Manuka Ales are a Historical Development in Beer Evolution. I believe them to be a NEW BRANCH on the Beer Tree, much like Lagers form part of it. 
You can be part of this HISTORIC EVOLUTION, by supporting Manuka Ales.

Your good will IS APPRECIATED, however it will not allow us to brew this ale. 

Please take the next step towards the brewing, with a contribution for one of the perks on offer? You can check them out on the right, then click on.

 http://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/ 



Manuka Tree.

What is MANUKA?

Manuka is a small scruffy tree / shrub, which is found on only in New Zealand. It's the first plant to regenerate in open ground, and allows other plants to establish. 

It's like a nugget toughing it out in it's environment, and so can tolerate extreme conditions. 
.............................................................................................................................................


Endorsements. 
Brewer's Statement.
It is the culmination of years of experimental work, by trail and error, to bring Manuka Ales to this point. Development is on-going.
How do I convey the 'taste' of Manuka Magic Ale!
It's a complex explosion of very subtle flavours interacting with each other, infusing on your tongue.
Your first sip tells it all. You'll then understand why I've called it MAGIC. 

I stand by all the endorsements made below. They are from a cross section of society, and all walks of life.

Tony Dapson . Brewer. NATURALE.  Napier, Hawke's Bay, NZ.

The Magic of Manuka
Tony Dapson has created a smooth ale with an interesting herbal anise-edge. It's his most popular brew, and it's easy to see why.
The faintest hint of wild honey and manuka flower gives it a refreshing tangy character. Really interesting. 
Yvonne Lorkin - NZ Wine and Beer Critic. May 17th 2014. Indulge Magazine.

Chris from Sydney, Australia.

This novel smooth tasty ale, will satisfy and bring joy to beer drinker's, I'm sure.
Les, Brewing Guru at Jellybean Brewing, Napier.

We are from Seattle, Washington, USA, so we know about Craft Beer. Manuka Magic ranks highly in our minds. Lots of complex flavours, sweet start, herbal and spicey on the palate, and a subtle bitterness finish. Good stuff.

What are FUTURE'S VOUCHERS?

They are for 14 people grouping together to Pre-order Ale in a 30 Litre Keg giving each person 2 Litres of Ale each. (+20 Years Of Age ID Required).


THE FIRST OFFERING will be the freshest, cheapest and most direct way to offer ale to you, in 30 Litre Kegs delivered to a Licensed Liquor Establishment you nominate for delivery. 
For simplicity of operation, it's preferable for you to gather another 13 of your Friends, or Club Members together (over 20 years of age), and each contribute to a Group Voucher.  Everyone owns 2 Litres of Ale in a 30 Litre Keg.  The two litres on top is a gift, as tastings, spillage etc. 
Fill your 2 Litres in your own Flagon or Growler for home consumption, or enjoy Manuka Magic in your Licensed Club, (as an example). Then return the empty keg to us for refilling.
It's fun to share the experience in your Group setting with your mates.

Your nominated Licensed Liquor Establishment will supervise pouring. They may charge you a pouring fee, or sell you your Growler/Flagon. This is fair and to be expected.
You maybe a member of your local RSA, or Service, or Chartered Club. A Sports Club, a Golf Club, local Rugby, Soccer, Cricket, Tennis, Bowling or Fishing Club. A Social Club at your Work, a Craft Beer Bar/Pub, a local neighbourhood tavern or winery, or any other club you can think of!  Your local or another Off Sales Liquor Outlet in your town. 
You will know your local club, bar, or pub scene, so it's easier for you to make the connection between us for dispatch if you're a member of a Club as above, or you can approach your local Super Liquor Outlet.
Please ask your Licensed Liquor Establishment first to receive your first offering. It MUST pass through a Licensed Liquor Establishment, and not direct to a Public Member for us to stay within the Licensing Regulations.
You as the person who has made a 'Future's Voucher' purchase principal will ensure the keg is returned to us when your Group has emptied the keg. (You own the Ale, we own the Keg).
Keg transport fees will be inclusive of your purchase. Keep the Pre-sales Orders coming . There is NO CUT OFF after the campaign reaches target. 



The special InDemand feature allows future orders after the campaign finishes.
I will brew Manuka Magic Ale at ROOSTERS' ALE HOUSE, Hastings, HAWKE'S BAY, NZ. in 1200 litre batches brewed to orders placed.
...............................................................................................

600 KEEN BEER FANS TO START MANUKA MAGIC FLOWING OUT THE BREWERY DOOR.
The numbers tell us we need 600 committed followers from our audience to make a contribution of NZ$24 for 2 litres of Ale each, to move the project to reach campaign target. 



Group your 14 mate's together and share a Keg.That's GOOD MATE-SHIP isn't it!

Group of 14 ALE FUTURE'S VOUCHERS. ( Manuka Magic Ale-30 litres in Keg). 


SORRY, New Zealand Audience Only. (+20 years of age).
Group Normal Price is US$250. That's US$17.88 (NZ24 approx) each for your 2 litres of Manuka Magic Ale.
EARLY BIRDS will receive 10% OFF the normal price in the FIRST 21 DAYS of the campaign, for their shrewd move on our First Offering.

DON'T BE DISAPPOINTED, organize your 14 Person Group NOW and to secure your 10% DISCOUNT opportunities.
It's first in, first served.  
.................................................................................................................................


How long will it take before I get my lips on this Ale?

This campaign runs for 60 DAYS from 3rd February 2015. Add 8 weeks to brew the ale. This will allow deliveries to start approximately 25th June 2015.


We offer perks (right) for a contribution.
Here's a CURRENCY CONVERTER for your convenience.
http://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/     

$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$
The Targets.

THE CAMPAIGN TARGET is US$11,000 this will allow us to brew Keg Ale for our New Zealand Home Audience, with redeemable Ale Future's Vouchers.This Stretch Limit amount MUST be met before this can happen.


STRETCH LIMIT 1 is US$100,000, which will allow us to brew and bottle ale for our international audience, offering Single 500 ml Bottle Tasting Samples. This Stretch Limit amount MUST be met before this can happen.
(Brewing Licenses not included).
$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$
Where does the money go?


The CAMPAIGN TARGET OF US$11,000 MUST BE MET to be able to brew Manuka Magic-it's a beauty unique Kiwi Ale for you. That's the absolute minimum amount required to start production.


Anything less leaves us stranded, and I would have to re-launch the campaign to get the Funds in over campaign target to brew for you. 
Keg Ale (campaign target)
The Funds provided will go towards ingredients in the ale, costs of brewing, Government Excise Tax, storage, new kegs, transport, running costs of this campaign, bank fees, perk purchases, liquor licenses. 
Ideally it would be FANTASTIC to have enough Funds come in, so I can send off BOTTLED ALE TASTERS EVERYWHERE for you.
Bottling Ale adds substantial costs (stretch limit 1)
Those increased costs are for larger volumes brewed, for more ingredients, bottling costs, bottles packaging, label manufacture.

Calling ALL INTERNATIONALS - it's for you as well.
A Brewer needs his own brewery. To serve New Zealand and Export Markets with these delicious Manuka Ales I do too.

That's a pretty good reason, but here's a better reason. 


It's so you can SEE YOUR NAME ON OUR BREWERY WALL. 

My Manuka Ales MUST go to INTERNATIONAL MARKETS. 
HOPS ARE IN TROUBLE, AND SO IS YOUR PINT OF BEER.
We could be heading for PEAK BEER! and reduced beer production. Beer would become a luxury item. 
What are your thoughts on that?


SO LET'S GET these delicious Manuka Ales ON THE MARKET, and take the sting out of this situation FOR EVERY DRINKER, BY CREATING A SOLUTION TO THIS UNTHINKABLE PROBLEM.
Would you like to make your perk order on the right?
Here's a CURRENCY CONVERTER for your convenience.
http://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/

Great perks are on offer.


We are offering you some GREAT PERKS. The Manuka Magic is FANTASTIC, and we've offered Perks everyone should enjoy.




                                                          
Ale 'Future's Vouchers' - International. One 500ml glass bottle Manuka Magic-it's a beauty Unique Kiwi Ale. 4.6% alc/vol GET US OVER US$100,000 stretch target 1, so you can start to get these.
..............................................................................................................................................

Several of my Friends have said they felt MORE DESIRABLE TO THE OPPOSITE SEX, after drinking one or two glasses of this magnificent brew. WOW! REALLY THAT'S AMAZING! No one's ugly anymore! I thought they were shining more lately.
There you go, fact or fiction. It's just one more reason why you should give this ale a try ;-) 
                                                                                                 CHEERS EVERYONE ;-)
You now have lots of reasons why you would like to join our Audience.  
MAKE ORDERS, THEN SHOUT OUT LOUD TO YOUR FRIENDS EVERYWHERE. 
Please use the indiegogo.com tools to tell your Friends and networks, the importance of getting the word out to make the campaign a success.
I appreciate your time and effort you've taken to read this story. If you have made a contribution made for a perk. I THANK YOU VERY MUCH.
To contact us, go to comments with your questions.
Cheers,
Tony.

story:
I created this deck with the intention that people could use these cards to understand the SIGNS that our loved ones show us that they are ok on the other side and they are still with us. I am proud to be able to offer this deck to you as a tool to make connections with your loved ones that have crossed over.

What I Need & What You Get

I'm going to be self-publishing this deck and funding for this project would provide a means to print the full 33 cards Signs from your Loved Ones Spirit Cards, with Instruction Card all in a uniquely beautiful organza bag, all at an affordable cost without impacting the quality of production.

Printing custom decks of cards is not cheap, and to get a good printer, I need to order a big batch of decks. 1000 to be precise.  The deck is 95% complete; I am now needing to raise the necessary funds to get them printed. Once I have the funding, all I have to do is place the orders.

I'm asking for $3,500, which is HALF of the total cost and would cover the production cost of 1000 decks. Any and all help is amazing and appreciated; I hope that together we can make this project a reality. Any funding past the stated goal will go toward increasing the number of decks printed. 

$3,500 will give me the confidence to place the minimum order, but won't actually cover all the costs.

$7,000 will cover the pre-production, printing and shipping costs for the minimum order!

$12,000 will allow me to place a larger order (which will make me very happy and help me do more good things in the world). 

I plan to sell the decks on my website www.diana-lynn.com, create a new website www.signsfromyourlovedones.com,  facebook, twitter, amazon, ebay, etsy and in local bookstores and fairs.  Updates will be posted on a regular basis.

The Impact

*** 50% of all the proceeds from each deck sold will be donated to local animal rescue projects.

Risks & Challenges

I estimate that the entire process of printing, including shipping the cards to the US & Canada, will take about 10-12 weeks.

Time Line for "Signs from your loved ones" Spirit cards
Jan. 2015 - Edit, prepare digital files
Feb. 2015 -  Completion of Deck - Send to Printer
Mar. 2015 - Waiting patiently for delivery!
April 2015 - Receive finished decks! Ship decks and promote!

The printer is tried and true and prints some of the most beautiful oracle decks on the market today. That said, the process of proofing art, and printing color cards for the first time, not to mention shipping them around the world certainly leaves room for some mishaps.

I am fully prepared to do everything in my power to facilitate a seamless process and solve any problems that arise.
• Currently, the writing of the cards is 100% complete.
• The artwork is getting the final touches.

 I just want to say thank you for helping me make this a dream come true.
Diana Lynn

story:
Summary

Can you imagine living without telecommunication? Today, more than a billion people still don't have cellular coverage*. Most of these unconnected people live in  rural regions of Latin America, Africa, and Asia, and the main reason why they're cut off from the world is because local cellular carriers deem them economically nonviable, given that most can't afford to pay for cell service, living on a couple of dollars per day or even less. 

What if there were a way to provide both affordable cellular coverage and phones to the marginalized people?  They could now use the phone to communicate, obtain information, gain knowledge, receive/provide assistance, and much more.

We've found a way to do just that (and more).

We are brubru, a nonprofit organization, whose mission is to connect the unconnected at the lowest possible price point, by establishing self-sustaining, community-owned rural cellular networks, enabling indigent communities to grow and thrive, creating a better world.

Our self-sustaining model is simple and effective:

1. Since most villages have neither the know-how nor the upfront capital to establish and manage their local cellular network, we assist them by:

(a) purchasing required equipment, such as base transceiver stations (BTSs), antennas, phones, solar modules (if there's no grid electricity), etc.

(b) assembling equipment, erecting cell towers, installing antennas, etc.

(c) overseeing and maintaining (troubleshooting) the cell network, to ensure optimal coverage.

2. Individual villages (local cell networks) are wirelessly interconnected with one another, to create a single cellular network that covers a vast territory, enabling  anyone on the network to call and text anyone else on the network for only a few dollars (in local currency) per month. Calling and texting outside the network is also seamless and affordable via Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP). In the villages that don't already have an internet service provider, we establish nonprofit ISPs.

3. Over time, the local cell network pays for itself, and each connected village is able to pay back the provided initial capital, at which point all revenue remains in each village, and can be used to improve local social services, such as schools, clinics, etc.

We are:

We are passionate about advancing brubru's mission to empower disadvantaged people. We bring a diverse, yet targeted combination of backgrounds and experience, to help brubru attain its altruistic objective of improving the lives of the disenfranchised. Our advisory team consists of individuals, who manufacture both open-source cellular hardware and software, as well as those who have ample experience in establishing and managing rural cellular networks. 

We need your help:

Since brubru's inception, we've been funding everything from our own pockets, and we've also applied for 501(c)(3) tax exemption. After spending the past months seeking permission to establish our first nonprofit rural cell network across the developing world, we've finally received the green light to do so in Mexico's Tlaxcala state.

We have launched this crowdfunding campaign because we really need your help to be able to provide cellular coverage to our first unconnected village (up to 500 people) in Mexico. We need to raise $30,000  to purchase the needed hardware, software, phones, and other components to establish a nonprofit cellular network.

Your pledges will improve their lives of poor people, and the more funds we raise during this campaign, the more people we'll connect. And it's just the beginning of what's possible. Please help us change the world.

Thank you very much for your generosity!

-brubru's Crowdfunding Team

Impact

Your participation is crucial. By assisting us, you're not just helping people with cell coverage, you're providing them with access to vital resources and information, such as healthcare, news, education, emergency response, employment, and much more.

All it takes is just one connected village. With your help, the success of this crowdfunding campaign will go a long way in validating our business model, and helping us to scale and expand into other parts of the developing world. 

We also aim to provide relief and humanitarian assistance to disaster victims, by swiftly deploying temporary cellular coverage (including phones and solar-powered charging stations) in regions where telecom infrastructure and electricity have been disrupted.

Please Select Your Perk

We offer a number of perk levels to our campaign contributors.

Other Ways You Can Help

Word-of-Mouth:If you happen to know someone who might also be interested in supporting our mission, please pass along our information.

Social Media: Please inform your friends and family aboutbrubru . We're on Twitter and Facebook. 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT

*  https://gsmaintelligence.com/files/analysis/?file=2014-05-22-measuring-mobile-penetration.pdf

story:
Cyclone Pam is one of the biggest storms of history. Reaching Category 5, winds higher than 180 knots, equivalent to more than 300kmh, waves higher than 12m, monster cyclone Pam, has already devastated homes. Some have no shelters. Power is running out, telecommunications lines are out, water is short and roofs are flying.

If some are lucky enough to find refuge in hotels and churches, some are left out. Lives are in danger.

After destroying more than 3000 houses, it is still devastating homes, landslides and severe coastal flooding are observed. If all the impacts cannot yet be measured, it is leaving everyone with damages. Not enough people know about this and we need you to spread the word and raise the urgency of this matter. This cannot wait, how long can one stay without a roof. 

If studies show that Port-Vila is the most vulnerable to disasters, Vanuatu, known as the happiest place in the world, needs your help.

We are raising money as a concerned group whose families live there and we will be donating to charities in the country. Thank you.
story_txt: Cyclone Pam is one of the biggest storms of history. Reaching Category 5, winds higher than 180 knots, equivalent to more than 300kmh, waves higher than 12m, monster cyclone Pam, has already devastated homes. Some have no shelters. Power is running out, telecommunications lines are out, water is short and roofs are flying.If some are lucky enough to find refuge in hotels and churches, some are left out. Lives are in danger.After destroying more than 3000 houses, it is still devastating homes, landslides and severe coastal flooding are observed. If all the impacts cannot yet be measured, it is leaving everyone with damages. Not enough people know about this and we need you to spread the word and raise the urgency of this matter. This cannot wait, how long can one stay without a roof. If studies show that Port-Vila is the most vulnerable to disasters, Vanuatu, known as the happiest place in the world, needs your help.We are raising money as a concerned group whose families live there and we will be donating to charities in the country. Thank you.

story:
This is YouthBloc!

We are the world’s FIRST social media platform that is designed to help its youth users make money and gain real business experience and free education. YouthBloc users can expect:

  • Simple Ways to Network With Friends

  • 24/7 Access to Free Online Education

  • Equal Share on Advertising Profits

  • Easy to Create Custom E-Storefronts

  • Celebrity and Professional Virtual Mentors

  • A Job Board, That Matches Youth to Jobs


Why?

In today’s world, we can check our email with just a look at the wrist (+1 to Pebble), find a mate with only a swipe of a thumb (looking at you tinder), and learn about business with one $100k+ check and 4 years of our time (Big ups to you, Universities of America).



We are in a time where social media usage is near necessity, and student loan and youth unemployment rates are skyrocketing. Today’s teens and young adults need more avenues to make legitimate streams of income. They need it now more than ever; however 50% of us in today’s younger generations are under or unemployed in America.



Why should you Care?

Well, this leads to more and more youth getting involved with the wrong crowds trying to make money and make ends meet (or at VERY least, to never have to eat funfetti frosting, and call it breakfast ever again). So is it really a surprise thatby age 23, over 40% percent of American adolescents and young adults have been arrested at least once for something other than a minor traffic violation? To give you a better idea that’s over 30 million arrests, and the average arrest can cost taxpayers up to $1,000, you do the math. Pro-tip, it’s a lot.


As many as 7 out of every 10 high school  teenagers have expressed interest in wanting to start their own business, yet have no simple way of gaining financial literacy, business experience, or access to mentors who can lead them down the right path.  We can pass a standardized test and protest for a $15 an hour minimum wage; still few of us have any idea how to balance a bank account, create a budget or make a business plan. In these problems, YouthBloc was born. Our mission is to unite educate and transform youth through entrepreneurship.

Be immortalized on our wall of fame, by making a $25 contribution now.


The Platform



Education Center

With the cost of higher learning at insane highs, causing more and more youth to search for new ways to gain business insight. YouthBloc provides an alternative to the everyday; revolutionizing the way teens and young adults look at and learn about the world of business.

YouthBloc members will have unlimited 24/7 access to free educational business classes.  Teaching the necessary business and life skills for navigating today’s complex financial world. Educating youth to make wise financial decisions before –not after – they are faced with life-changing decisions.

  • Business Planning, Personal Finance, Entrepreneurship and Marketing Classes to Start.

  • Essential Tools for Creating a Budget, Saving and Investing.

  • Financial Planning Lessons for Life, Business, and Retirement.


How Do Users Make Money?

We want to solve the youth crime and unemployment epidemic; to do that we need to create new legal streams of income for our users.

Step 2: Just use YouthBloc...

Advertising Revenue

Seriously it’s that easy. We could never accept all the advertising revenue when so many of our users could use it more. Considering it can’t even be generated without you, we’re more than happy to give you equal net profits that YouthBloc footprint creates. Basically we want you use YouthBloc and we want you to learn and earn, so the more you actively use YouthBloc, more advertising profits your footprint creates, and you’re getting half of it… So that’s pretty sweet.

Commerce Center

Custom E-Storefronts

Youth users will have the option to create simple and customizable E-Storefronts attached to their profile, using the templates we provide, and then start earning money immediately. To fill your shop you will be able to choose from thousands of popular products, services, YouthBloc products, local daily deals, and coupons, to sell or offer through your own e-storefronts. Allowing youth the opportunity to gain valuable hands on business experience and important marketing skills. All sales and advertising profits from each E-Store will be split with majority always going to the E-Store owner.

Contribute $75 now for a guaranteed beta signup and some YouthBloc swag!


YouthBloc Job Board

Youth unemployment in America is nearly triple the norm, we are prepared to help eliminate the employment gap by helping you build the right job seeking skills and matching each user with the perfect job, specifically chosen for them.

  • Comprehensive list of available local internships and jobs

  • Enhanced with YouthBloc algorithm ensuring youth are matched with the best job, specifically chosen for them.

  • Resume design lab for crafting the perfect resume.


Virtual Mentor System

We understand the benefits of mentoring young people when we hear the powerful stories of teens whose lives have been changed by a single, caring adult. If you listen, those stories are everywhere. Like us, you likely have a story of a mentor from your own past. We want to make sure everyone gets their own story.

Unique algorithm matches youth users with the best possible matched mentor for ongoing guidance.

Mentors will include:

  • Select Celebrities,

  • Business Professionals

  • Community Leaders

A large five year study, sponsored by Big Brothers Big Sisters found that children with mentors were more confident and had fewer behavioral problems. Young people showed increased belief in their abilities to succeed in school and felt less anxiety related to peer pressure. By evaluating data from Big Brothers Big Sisters, we can see:

  • 59% of mentored teens get better grades

  • 27% of mentored youth are less likely to begin using alcohol

  • 52% are less likely to skip school

  • Mentored young people are more likely set career goals and to start taking steps to realize them.

Make a $150 contribution now and skype with the whole team to learn more about how we came together to create YouthBloc.

Where Your Money Is Going

With this campaign we hope to raise at least $25,000. That's a good amount of money, and believe us we are aware of it. But, building a platform like this is not cheap. We're going to need at least $20,000, in addition to what we were fortunate enough to already have, just to get the beta platform to up for our beta testers. To fully bring the YouthBloc platform to public, we will need to raise a total of $100,000. We know it seems like a lot but for the cost of the average tuition at a 4 year university, we will be able to help transform today’s youth into tomorrow’s entrepreneurs.



Perks!

story:
A cool, cozy tea house and art gallery. 

Start-up money needed to secure the location and set up the space. In addition to a full service tea house with an extensive selection of wonderful organic teas, there will be an art gallery and a room for artists' events and workshops. This tea house will be a cozy, comfortable place for folks to meet, relax, study, make art or just stock up on some great tea. Theme and decor will be inspired by Wes Anderson and his films.

About the tea house:

Inspired by other tea houses I have visited in other towns, I wanted to bring to Charlotte a space that is warm and cozy; an oasis away from the world to sit, relax and sip organic tea in partitioned “tea rooms” on cushions on the floor or at small tables. 

About the art space:

Inspired by the grass-roots organization, Papergirl Charlotte, I wanted to create a space where there will be a permanent place for artists and art groups to meet and make art on a regular basis. We will provide art supplies and artists are also encouraged to bring their favorite medium. Weekly art meet-ups and events.

I am in the process of looking for just the right space, in the arts district of Charlotte called NoDa. I will post photos and updates on the location as I progress. 

About me:

I come from a long line of artists, musicians and writers. I am a professional graphic designer/art director, a jewelry designer, an illustrator and a painter. I have been in the commercial arts for most of my career however my dream has always been to move more into purpose and serving the art community. 

My previous entrepreneur experience is that I have run my own design business here in Charlotte including owning, designing and publishing a magazine. Prior to that I ran a mountain bike touring company, in Vermont.

I have secured the domain name for this project and with my extensive marketing and design background, I am capable of handling all of the promotion, marketing, signage, logo design, web design, and social media for this project as well as managing the day-to-day responsibilities of the tea house,  gallery and art space.

I am very excited about creating this space and I believe it will be very well received and successful here in Charlotte. Your help at any level brings a great tea house and art experience to life!

Thanks!

story:
We have served our community's families with a center for kids and parents to enjoy each other and spend some family time. We don't want to go quietly into the night, we like our center want to make as much noise possible and hope we have touch enough people to make a difference.

We have fought hard to keep our center going these last few months and we hope to continue to reopen and operate our center.

If we are able to raise enough funds we may have a chance to reopen our doors to our friends and community.
