We have fought hard to keep our center going these last few months and we hope to continue to reopen and operate our center. If we are able to raise enough funds we may have a chance to reopen our doors to our friends and community.

story:
Korte versie:

VlenoVi® wordt een webshop waar je simpel en snel je vlees en vis vervangers van top kwaliteit kan kopen. Als vegetariër help je mee aan de reductie van CO2. Je kunt ook een halt toebrengen aan de wantoestanden in de bio-industrie en je kunt helpen dierenleed te verzachten. Is de stap van vleeseter naar vegetariër te groot voor jou overweeg dan om flexitariër te worden. Met de producten van VlevoVi® heb je niet het gevoel dat je vlees of vis mist.

Short version:

 VlenoVi® is a webshop where you can easily and quickly buy your meat and fish substitutes of top quality. As a vegetarian, you can help to reduce CO2. You can also bring a halt to the abuses in factory farming and you can help to mitigate animal cruelty. If the step from being a meat eater to vegetarian is too big for you then consider to be a flexitarian. With VlevoVi® products you do not feel that you are missing any meat or fish.

De lange versie:
Als vegetariër blijft het voor mij nog steeds een probleem om goede vlees- en vis vervangers te vinden. In de meeste supermarkten ligt er wel een assortiment van vleesvervangers, maar het is uiteindelijk allemaal hetzelfde; een mix van eieren met wat groenten, een mix van kaas of iets van soja of tofu en worsten die, zodra ze in contact komen met vocht, 3 tot 4 keer uitzetten en op je bord eruitzien als enorme gedrochten. 

                             


Nu 5 jaar later zijn wij  in Nederland nog steeds in het beginstadium voor wat betreft het vervaardigen van vleesvervangers.

 Er is een land dat al decennia lang vlees- en visvervangers vervaardigd omdat de roep hierom heel groot was. Vlees- en visvervangers, die bijna niet van echt vlees en vis te onderscheiden zijn. 

         


Dit (ei)land is Taiwan waar boeddhisme een belangrijke religie is. Boeddhisme en vegetarisme gaan aldaar hand in hand. Taiwan telt 23 miljoen inwoners waarvan 24% boeddhisten (5.5 miljoen). Uit een studie blijkt dat 7 tot 15 % van de bevolking streng boeddhistisch is (1.5 tot 3.5 miljoen mensen) en zich dus streng houden aan de regels van het vegetarisme. 

       


Het idee:
Het bedrijfsidee is dus om een webshop te exploiteren waar vlees- en visvervangers besteld kunnen worden.

De levering zal plaats vinden via reguliere pakketpost waarbij het streven is om elke dag te leveren behalve zondag.

De producten worden in speciale diepvriesverpakking verzonden, zodat de producten gegarandeerd vers blijven.


De naam:

                                  


VlenoVi® is de samenvoeging van de woorden "Vlees noch Vis".

Made in Taiwan.


Assortiment:

Er zal een groot assortiment aanwezig zijn waar de klant uit kan kiezen. In het begin zal een assortiment bestaande uit circa 30 producten worden aangeboden welke langzamerhand wordt aangevuld met nieuwe producten. Wanneer de webwinkel in bekendheid en omzet verder groeit, zal aldus het assortiment stapsgewijs worden uitgebreid.

Productkwaliteit:

De producten van VlenoVi®  zullen van goede kwaliteit zijn. Dit houdt in dat er onder andere goed wordt gekeken naar de ingrediënten van de producten, de herkomst en de houdbaarheid. De vlees- en visvervangers zijn uniek te noemen als we kijken naar wat de directe concurrenten aanbieden.

Veel vleesvervangers die momenteel in Nederland worden aangeboden zijn uit dezelfde soort ingrediënten opgebouwd. Taiwan is een land dat zich, in tegenstelling tot de Westerse wereld, al een lange tijd bezig houdt met vegetarische recepten. Deze zijn opgebouwd uit natuurlijke ingrediënten en worden in Taiwan in groten getale gebruikt. Deze natuurlijke en unieke samenstellingen van voedsel worden momenteel nog nauwelijks aangeboden in Nederland.


Service:

Vlenovi®  zal haar klanten een goede service verlenen:

  • De prijs/kwaliteitverhouding zal uitstekend zijn. Deze wordt bepaald aan de hand van de kostprijs en benodigde inkomsten om de kosten te dekken;
  • Een groot aanbod aan vlees – en visvervangers;
  • Relatief snelle en goedkope levering;
  • Klanten hebben de mogelijkheid om op verschillende manieren te betalen;
  • Klachten en suggesties worden op gepaste wijze afgehandeld.

Kwalitatieve doelstelling.

De kwalitatieve doelstelling is om een levensvatbare zaak winstgevend te maken en daarnaast streef ik er naar naamsbekendheid te kunnen opbouwen als de enige volwaardige specialist in vis- en vleesvervangers op het web.

Kwantitatieve doelstelling.

De kwantitatieve doelstelling is het genereren van een gezonde cashflow uit de onderneming binnen 2 jaar om zodoende de kosten te dekken en voldoende ondernemersloon uit de onderneming te onttrekken. Daarnaast zal er getracht worden gedurende de jaren reserves op te bouwen.

Concurrentie:

Wat betreft de positie in de markt kan worden geconstateerd, dat er enige (indirecte ) concurrentie aanwezig is, maar gezien mijn specialistische benadering van de markt zal ik zeker een plaats kunnen innemen. Er worden namelijk tegen een aantrekkelijke prijs kwalitatief goede en smakelijke producten aangeboden.

Onze producten zijn over het algemeen tweemaal zoveel per verpakking als wat u op dit moment te koop krijgt aangeboden, maar voor ongeveer de zelfde prijs.

Cijfers:

In de Europese Unie lag het aantal vegetariërs in 2013 tussen 2 en 10 procent. Volgens een onderzoek van LEI Wageningen UR was in 2012 zo’n 4,5% van de Nederlandse bevolking vegetariër of veganist (circa 750.000). Daarnaast eet 14,8% hooguit een à twee dagen per week vlees.

Volgens de vereniging Ethisch Vegetarisch Alternatief zou in 2012 zo’n 2 à 3 procent van de Belgen totaal-vegetariër zijn.

In Vlaanderen en Brussel zou zo’n 5 à 6 procent van de inwoners deeltijd-vegetariër zijn. Volgens een onderzoek voeren Nederlandse vegetariërs gemiddeld kleinere huishoudens, hebben vaker een hogere opleiding genoten, hebben in het algemeen een hogere socio-economische status, en gezondheid speelt vaak een belangrijke rol in hun leven dan bij vleeseters.


Missie:

VlenoVi®  zal starten als een kleinschalige eenmanszaak. Met uitgekiende promotie en aanbevelingen van tevreden klanten kan ik het concept verder uitbouwen.

Het is dus de bedoeling om deze producten in Nederland en Vlaanderen aan de man te brengen in een zo groot mogelijke variatie

Hierdoor ziet VlenoVi® het als haar opdracht om de service en klantgerichtheid- stap voor stap - uit te breiden en toegankelijk te maken voor Nederland en Vlaanderen om zodoende iedereen in staat te stellen hoogstaand vegetarische producten online aan te schaffen.

De producten waar geen ei en melk componenten in voorkomen zijn bij uitstek geschikt voor de veganist.

Ik wil voor VlenoVi® een Halal-certificaat aanvragen, want zolang er geen dierlijke gelatine in voorkomen is het namelijk Halal.

Met betrekking tot het koosjer zijn ligt dit ingewikkelder. Ik zal de producten dus niet als koosjer zijnde aanbieden.

Eindelijk, vegetarisch producten niet alleen voor de dierenliefhebbers onder ons, maar  ook voor iedereen die gewoon dol is op lekker eten. Ik streef ernaar om producten voor het hele gezin te creëren. Niet alleen zijn onze producten gezond en voedzaam, maar uiteindelijk verrassend en absoluut heerlijk! Ik garandeer u dat u na het eten van onze producten u niet terug wil naar het oude.
Via de website worden (op termijn) suggesties gegeven voor gerechten waarin de vlees- en visvervangers heel goed toegepast kunnen worden.
Bij iedere hap die u neemt van onze producten zal u zich afvragen  "is dit echt vegetarisch?"

Wees voorbereid u zal verbaasd zijn ...


Wat hebben wij nodig:
Een investering van €25000.

Investeringsbegroting:
Openings- en  aanloopkosten: €400
Webshop: €1150
Promotiecampagne:  €2500
Diepvries faciliteiten: €4300 
ICT:  €2100
Voorraad: €3000
Seal- en pakmateriaal: €4300
Liquide middelen: €2200
Waarborghuur 3 maanden: €1500
Algemene voorwaarden: €500

Wat krijg jij van ons:
Kies een "perk" uit de lijst aan de rechterzijde.
Je mag ook een donatie doen zonder een "perk" te kiezen.
Iedere donatie is welkom.

Je hebt gedoneerd! Wat kan je nog meer doen?

Deel deze pagina via social media of e-mail.

Ken je donateurs? Verwijs ze naar deze pagina.

Deel deze actie met je familie, vrienden en kennissen.


What do we need:

An investment of € 25000.

Investment Budget:

Opening and start-up costs: € 400

Webshop: € 1150

Promotional campaign: € 2500

Freezer facilities: € 4300

ICT: € 2100

Stock: € 3000

Sealing and packing material: € 4300

Cash: € 2200

Deposit 3 months rent: € 1500

General business conditions: € 500


What do you get from us:

Choose a "perk" from the list on the right.

You can also make a donation without specifying a "perk".

Every donation is welcome.


You have donated! What more can you do?

Share this page via social media or email.

Know any donors? Refer them to this page.

Share this campaign with your family and friends.


Wat als we ons doel niet halen?

Elk bedrag boven de €10.000 is de moeite waard om te starten met de webshop.

Halen wij dit bedrag niet dan gaat het opgehaalde bedrag naar Stichting Wakker Dier.


Enkele weetjes over:

Vegetarisme:

Bij het vegetarisme word geen vlees of vis gegeten. Dit word vegetarisch voeding genoemd. Soms word vegetarisme verward met veganisme. Bij veganisme worden alle dierlijke producten vermeden. Dus ook melk, eieren en roomboter.

Een flexitariër kiest er voor om één of meerdere dagen per week geen vlees of vis te eten. Dit word ook wel semi-vegetariër genoemd. Er bestaan nog meer varianten van het vegetarisme:

  • De lacto-ovo-vegetariër: Dit is de grootste groep vegetariërs. Er word geen vlees en vis gegeten, maar wel eieren en zuivel:

  •  De lacto-vegetariër: Er wordt wel zuivel gegeten en gedronken, maar geen eieren, vlees en vis;                                     

  •  De ovo-vegetariër: Er worden wel eieren gegeten, maar geen vlees, vis of zuivel gegeten of gedronken. 

    Verschillende redenen kunnen aanleiding zijn voor het kiezen van vegetarisme.

    Een vaak gehoorde motivatie is het principieel tegengaan van dierenleed.

    Vooral de bio-industrie en het bijkomende dierenleed is in de ogen van vegetariërs niet goed. Andere redenen om vegetarisch te eten zijn:

  • Milieu: Dierlijke voedingsmiddelen hebben een grotere impact op het milieu dan plantaardige voedingsmiddelen. De hoeveelheid CO2 uitstoot is een stuk groter. CO2 uitstoot is schadelijk voor het milieu;

  • Gezondheid: Veel vegetariërs zijn ervan overtuigd dat een voeding zonder vlees en vis gezonder is. Recente onderzoeken laten zien dat vegetariërs langer leven en minder last hebben van overgewicht, suikerziekte en hart- en vaatziekten;

  • Smaak: Sommige mensen vinden de smaak van een vegetarische maaltijd beter:

  • Godsdienst: Een voorbeeld van vegetarisme door godsdienst is het Boeddhisme. Bepaalde stromingen in dit geloof stellen dat iedere boeddhist  zich moet onthouden van het doden van dieren.

De motieven om vegetariër te worden, worden niet door iedereen begrepen. Zodra iemand vegetariër wordt, krijgt hij of zij voor zijn omgeving vaak een "geitenwollensokken imago". Het kan dan soms lastig zijn om de motieven van vegetarisme goed te beargumenteren. Redenen om niet vegetarisch te eten:

  • Smaak;
  • Godsdienst;
  • Kans op tekort aan bepaalde voedingsstoffen.

Vegetarische voedingsmiddelen zijn te herkennen aan een keurmerk. Dit is het Internationale Vegetarische keurmerk. Dit keurmerk geeft aan dat het product volledig vegetarisch is. En toch zijn er producten niet geheel vegetarisch waarvan je het niet zou verwachten. Voorbeelden daarvan zijn pudding of sommige snoepjes. Hierin is gelatine verwerkt. Gelatine is gemaakt van huid en beenderen van runderen of varkens.


Voeding:

Bij een vegetarische voeding wordt geen vlees en vis gegeten. Een vegetarische voeding kenmerkt zich vaak door meer plantaardige producten.  Hierdoor is de voeding vaak rijker aan vitaminen, mineralen en voedings-vezels. Er kan prima gezond vegetarisch worden gegeten. Bepaalde voedingsstoffen komen minder voor bij een vegetarische voeding. Sommige vegetariërs gebruiken daarom naast hun voeding een supplement. Dit wordt gedaan om tekorten aan bepaalde voedingsstoffen te voorkomen. Een vegetariër moet goed opletten of bepaalde voedingsstoffen voldoende binnenkomen. Het gaat dan om:

  • Eiwit: Eiwit heeft veel functies in het lichaam. De belangrijkste functies van eiwit is die als bouwsteen van spieren en weefsels. Als er te weinig eiwit binnen komt kunnen spieren aangetast worden;
  • Vitamine B1: Deze vitamine is voornamelijk belangrijk voor het zenuwstelsel. Een tekort kan problemen geven zoals geheugenverlies of concentratieproblemen;
  • Vitamine B12: Een tekort aan vitamine B12 geeft pas na lange tijd problemen. Dit komt omdat het lichaam in staat is een bepaalde hoeveelheid in het lichaam op te slaan. Als er maanden tot jaren te weinig binnenkomt kan er bijvoorbeeld bloedarmoede ontstaan. Bloedarmoede geeft klachten als vermoeidheid en duizeligheid;
  • Vitamine D: Een tekort aan vitamine D kan de kans op botontkalking vergroten;
  • Ijzer: Te weinig ijzer kan ook bloedarmoede veroorzaken;
  • Omega 3: Weinig omega 3 geeft geen problemen. Toch kan omega 3 heel nuttig zijn voor een gezond lichaam. Bij voldoende inname verlaagt het bijvoorbeeld aanzienlijk de kans op hart-en vaatziekten.
Van al deze voedingsstoffen kan er een tekort ontstaan omdat ze voornamelijk in dierlijke producten voorkomen.
              

Gezondheid:

Bij een vegetarische voeding wordt er veel plantaardig gegeten. Dit is vaak positief voor de gezondheid. Een vegetarische voeding met weinig verzadigd vet en veel vezels werkt risico verlagend op hart- en vaatziekten, Parkinson en Alzheimer. Een beperking van de vleesconsumptie kan al voldoende zijn om gezondheidswinst te behalen. Wanneer er te veel rood vlees wordt gegeten verhoogt de kans op darmkanker.

Het blijkt dat vegetariërs minder lijden aan hart-en vaatziekten en suikerziekte. Ook hebben vegetariërs minder last van overgewicht. Een duidelijke reden hiervoor is nog niet aan te wijzen. Overigens is het aangetoond dat vegetariërs er een volledige gezondere leefstijl op na houden. Meer beweging en het eetgedrag lijkt bij te dragen aan de gezondheidswinst.

Overigens kan een vegetarische voeding ook ongezond zijn. Dit gebeurt wanneer er onvoldoende rekening wordt gehouden met het feit dat vlees en vis in de voeding ontbreekt. Er kan daardoor een tekort ontstaan aan bepaalde voedingsstoffen. Als hier wel rekening mee wordt gehouden kan een vegetarische voeding gezonder zijn dan reguliere voeding met vlees en vis. Voeding met vlees of vis bevat overwegend meer verzadigd vet. Te veel verzadigd vet is weer nadelig voor de gezondheid. Het kan het risico op hart- en vaatziekten verhogen. 

Voordelen:

  • Bij een gevarieerde voeding met oog voor tekorten is gezondheidswinst te behalen;

  •  Bijdragen aan een beter milieu. Voor de productie van vlees is veel water en energie nodig. Daarnaast levert de productie veel CO2 uitstoot op, wat schadelijk is voor het milieu;

  • Het eten van minder vlees draagt bij aan beter dierenwelzijn. Het soort vlees dat wordt gegeten is hierbij erg belangrijk. Bij biologisch vlees hebben dieren beter leefomstandigheden gehad;
  • Geldbesparing. Vlees is overwegend duur. Door minder of helemaal geen vlees te eten kan geld bespaard worden. Overigens kunnen vleesvervangers ook prijzig zijn.

  Nadelen:

  • Minder aanbod in restaurants;
  • Risico op tekorten aan ijzer, eiwit, vitaminen B12 en B1;
  • Sociale problemen. Bij andere mensen gaan eten kan problemen geven. Sommige mensen vinden het lastig een vegetarisch voeding op tafel te zetten. Dit kan als vervelend ervaren worden.
story_txt:
Korte versie:
VlenoVi® wordt een webshop waar je simpel en snel je vlees en vis vervangers van top kwaliteit kan kopen. Als vegetariër help je mee aan de reductie van CO2. Je kunt ook een halt toebrengen aan de wantoestanden in de bio-industrie en je kunt helpen dierenleed te verzachten. Is de stap van vleeseter naar vegetariër te groot voor jou overweeg dan om flexitariër te worden. Met de producten van VlevoVi® heb je niet het gevoel dat je vlees of vis mist.Short version:
 VlenoVi® is a webshop where you can easily and quickly buy your meat and fish substitutes of top quality. As a vegetarian, you can help to reduce CO2. You can also bring a halt to the abuses in factory farming and you can help to mitigate animal cruelty. If the step from being a meat eater to vegetarian is too big for you then consider to be a flexitarian. With VlevoVi® products you do not feel that you are missing any meat or fish.

De lange versie:
Als vegetariër blijft het voor mij nog steeds een probleem om goede vlees- en vis vervangers te vinden. In de meeste supermarkten ligt er wel een assortiment van vleesvervangers, maar het is uiteindelijk allemaal hetzelfde; een mix van eieren met wat groenten, een mix van kaas of iets van soja of tofu en worsten die, zodra ze in contact komen met vocht, 3 tot 4 keer uitzetten en op je bord eruitzien als enorme gedrochten. 

                             




Nu 5 jaar later zijn wij  in Nederland nog steeds in het beginstadium voor wat betreft het vervaardigen van vleesvervangers.
 Er is een land dat al decennia lang vlees- en visvervangers vervaardigd omdat de roep hierom heel groot was. Vlees- en visvervangers, die bijna niet van echt vlees en vis te onderscheiden zijn. 

         

Dit (ei)land is Taiwan waar boeddhisme een belangrijke religie is. Boeddhisme en vegetarisme gaan aldaar hand in hand. Taiwan telt 23 miljoen inwoners waarvan 24% boeddhisten (5.5 miljoen). Uit een studie blijkt dat 7 tot 15 % van de bevolking streng boeddhistisch is (1.5 tot 3.5 miljoen mensen) en zich dus streng houden aan de regels van het vegetarisme. 



       


Het idee:

Het bedrijfsidee is dus om een webshop te exploiteren waar vlees- en visvervangers besteld kunnen worden.


De levering zal plaats vinden
via reguliere pakketpost waarbij het streven is om elke dag te leveren behalve
zondag.
De producten worden in speciale diepvriesverpakking verzonden, zodat de producten gegarandeerd vers blijven.


De naam:

                                  
VlenoVi® is de samenvoeging van de woorden "Vlees noch Vis".
Made in Taiwan.

Assortiment:
Er zal een groot assortiment aanwezig zijn
waar de klant uit kan kiezen. In het begin zal een assortiment bestaande uit
circa 30 producten worden aangeboden welke langzamerhand wordt aangevuld met
nieuwe producten. Wanneer de webwinkel in
bekendheid en omzet verder groeit, zal aldus het assortiment stapsgewijs worden
uitgebreid.

Productkwaliteit:
De producten van VlenoVi®  zullen van goede
kwaliteit zijn. Dit houdt in dat er onder andere goed wordt gekeken naar de
ingrediënten van de producten, de herkomst en de houdbaarheid. De vlees- en
visvervangers zijn uniek te noemen als we kijken naar wat de directe
concurrenten aanbieden.
Veel vleesvervangers die momenteel in
Nederland worden aangeboden zijn uit dezelfde soort ingrediënten opgebouwd. Taiwan
is een land dat zich, in tegenstelling tot de Westerse wereld, al een lange
tijd bezig houdt met vegetarische recepten. Deze zijn opgebouwd uit natuurlijke
ingrediënten en worden in Taiwan in groten getale gebruikt. Deze natuurlijke en
unieke samenstellingen van voedsel worden momenteel nog nauwelijks aangeboden
in Nederland.



Service:
Vlenovi®  zal haar klanten een
goede service verlenen:



De prijs/kwaliteitverhouding zal
uitstekend zijn. Deze wordt bepaald aan de hand van de kostprijs en benodigde
inkomsten om de kosten te dekken;


Een groot aanbod aan vlees – en
visvervangers;


Relatief snelle en goedkope levering;


Klanten hebben de mogelijkheid om op
verschillende manieren te betalen;

Klachten en suggesties worden op gepaste
wijze afgehandeld.


Kwalitatieve doelstelling.
De kwalitatieve doelstelling is om een levensvatbare zaak winstgevend te maken en daarnaast streef ik er naar naamsbekendheid te kunnen opbouwen als de enige volwaardige specialist in vis- en vleesvervangers op het web.
Kwantitatieve doelstelling.
De kwantitatieve doelstelling is het genereren van een gezonde cashflow uit de onderneming binnen 2 jaar om zodoende de kosten te dekken en voldoende ondernemersloon uit de onderneming te onttrekken. Daarnaast zal er getracht worden gedurende de jaren reserves op te bouwen.
Concurrentie:
Wat betreft de positie in de markt kan worden geconstateerd, dat er enige (indirecte ) concurrentie aanwezig is, maar gezien mijn specialistische benadering van de markt zal ik zeker een plaats kunnen innemen. Er worden namelijk tegen een aantrekkelijke prijs kwalitatief goede en smakelijke producten aangeboden.
Onze producten zijn over het algemeen tweemaal zoveel per verpakking als wat u op dit moment te koop krijgt aangeboden, maar voor ongeveer de zelfde prijs.
Cijfers:

In de Europese Unie lag het aantal
vegetariërs in 2013 tussen 2 en 10 procent. Volgens een onderzoek van LEI
Wageningen UR was in 2012 zo’n 4,5% van de Nederlandse bevolking
vegetariër of veganist (circa 750.000).
Daarnaast eet 14,8% hooguit een à twee dagen per week vlees.
Volgens de vereniging Ethisch Vegetarisch
Alternatief zou in 2012 zo’n 2 à 3 procent van de Belgen totaal-vegetariër
zijn.
In Vlaanderen en Brussel zou zo’n 5 à 6
procent van de inwoners deeltijd-vegetariër zijn. Volgens een onderzoek voeren
Nederlandse vegetariërs gemiddeld kleinere huishoudens, hebben vaker een hogere
opleiding genoten, hebben in het algemeen een hogere socio-economische status,
en gezondheid speelt vaak een belangrijke rol in hun leven dan bij vleeseters.



Missie:



VlenoVi®  zal starten als een kleinschalige eenmanszaak. Met uitgekiende promotie en aanbevelingen van tevreden klanten kan ik het concept verder uitbouwen.
Het is dus de bedoeling om deze producten in Nederland en Vlaanderen aan de man te brengen in een zo groot mogelijke variatie
Hierdoor ziet VlenoVi® het als haar opdracht om de service en klantgerichtheid- stap voor stap - uit te breiden en toegankelijk te maken voor Nederland en Vlaanderen om zodoende iedereen in staat te stellen hoogstaand vegetarische producten online aan te schaffen.
De producten waar geen ei en melk componenten in voorkomen zijn bij uitstek geschikt voor de veganist.
Ik wil voor VlenoVi® een Halal-certificaat aanvragen, want zolang er geen dierlijke gelatine in voorkomen is het namelijk Halal.
Met betrekking tot het koosjer zijn ligt dit ingewikkelder. Ik zal de producten dus niet als koosjer zijnde aanbieden.

Eindelijk, vegetarisch producten niet alleen voor de dierenliefhebbers 
onder ons, maar  ook voor iedereen die gewoon dol is op lekker eten. Ik streef 
ernaar om producten voor het hele gezin te creëren. Niet alleen zijn onze producten gezond en voedzaam, maar uiteindelijk verrassend en absoluut 
heerlijk! Ik garandeer u dat u na het eten van onze producten u niet terug wil naar het oude.
Via de website worden (op termijn) suggesties gegeven voor gerechten waarin de vlees- en visvervangers heel goed toegepast kunnen worden.

Bij iedere hap die u neemt van onze producten zal u zich afvragen  "is dit echt vegetarisch?"



Wees voorbereid u zal verbaasd zijn ...





Wat hebben wij nodig:


Een investering van €25000.

Investeringsbegroting:


Openings- en  aanloopkosten: €400
Webshop: €1150
Promotiecampagne:  €2500
Diepvries faciliteiten: €4300 
ICT:  €2100
Voorraad: €3000
Seal- en pakmateriaal: €4300
Liquide middelen: €2200
Waarborghuur 3 maanden: €1500
Algemene voorwaarden: €500


Wat krijg jij van ons:

Kies een "perk" uit de lijst aan de rechterzijde.
Je mag ook een donatie doen zonder een "perk" te kiezen.
Iedere donatie is welkom.


Je hebt gedoneerd! Wat kan je nog meer doen?
Deel deze pagina via social media of e-mail.
Ken je donateurs? Verwijs ze naar deze pagina.
Deel deze actie met je familie, vrienden en kennissen.


What do we need:
An investment of € 25000.
Investment Budget:
Opening and start-up costs: € 400
Webshop: € 1150
Promotional campaign: € 2500
Freezer facilities: € 4300
ICT: € 2100
Stock: € 3000
Sealing and packing material: € 4300
Cash: € 2200
Deposit 3 months rent: € 1500
General business conditions: € 500

What do you get from us:
Choose a "perk" from the list on the right.
You can also make a donation without specifying a "perk".
Every donation is welcome.

You have donated! What more can you do?
Share this page via social media or email.
Know any donors? Refer them to this page.
Share this campaign with your family and friends.

Wat als we ons doel niet halen?
Elk bedrag boven de €10.000 is de moeite waard om te starten met de webshop.
Halen wij dit bedrag niet dan gaat het opgehaalde bedrag naar Stichting Wakker Dier.
Enkele weetjes over:
Vegetarisme:





Bij het vegetarisme word geen vlees of vis gegeten. Dit word vegetarisch voeding genoemd. Soms word vegetarisme verward met veganisme. Bij veganisme worden alle dierlijke producten vermeden. Dus ook melk,
eieren en roomboter.

Een flexitariër kiest er voor om één of meerdere dagen per week geen vlees of vis te eten. Dit word ook wel semi-vegetariër genoemd. Er bestaan nog meer varianten van het vegetarisme:


De lacto-ovo-vegetariër: Dit is de grootste groep vegetariërs. Er word geen vlees en vis gegeten, maar wel eieren en zuivel:


 De lacto-vegetariër: Er wordt wel zuivel gegeten en gedronken, maar geen eieren, vlees en vis;                                     


 De ovo-vegetariër: Er worden wel eieren gegeten, maar geen vlees, vis of zuivel gegeten of gedronken.

story:
HUZZAH!!!

When I first started thinking about what kind of restaurant I would want to open, I immediately envisioned an unpretentious, warm, friendly neighborhood sort of place with simple, good food and a dizzying choice of excellent adult beverages! A year and eight months in, I think we've got a part of that picture put together (if you were to believe our Yelp reviews!) but are obviously still missing a HUGE chunk of it.

WE GOTS OUR LICENSE

The process and costs to get our Beer & Wine license was grueling. It wasn't so much the ABC license itself, but the Conditional Use Permit from the City of LA. Talk about bureaucratic clusterf$ck. Wanting to learn about the process, I basically did everything myself. And boy was that fun! But, now I know WHY you pay someone else $10K+ to handle it for you! 

WHY MO MONEY

So the Permit and License are just the beginning. We could just sell cans of PBR out of some picnic coolers (and we might try!) but we want to be more classy. I want to be able to offer you some AMAZING LOCAL CRAFT DRAFT BEER. And Wine. And Sake. And Shochu. That's a lot of refrigeration, supplies, and inventory! Upgrading our Electrical system (MORE POWER!) is about $4,000. A 3-Keg Draft system is about another $4,000. An under-counter Bottle Cooler is about $2,000. And so on. We could maybe get a loan or some credit cards to do this, but unmanageable debt is the NUMBER ONE KILLER of restaurants. I would like to avoid that if we can. Because debts, we already gots. So this is where you come in!

YOUR SUPPORT MEANS EVERYTHING

We have the BEST customers in the world. That's no B.S. We would not be here today, if it weren't true. And we have the BEST friends in the world. Otherwise, we could never have opened in the first place. Your support has meant everything.

Our mission: "To provide high-quality, affordable dining with friendly, sincere service in a fun, relaxed atmosphere." has been met with wide approval. We are proud of that. Still, financially, without adult beverages, it has been a struggle. Your support here will ensure that we reach a level of sustainability.

You deserve the BEST from us! And you will get it! We will continue to support you and our community: our local schools and charities; our local brewers and vintners! Please help us in our quest! 

ANY AMOUNT COUNTS

Seriously. Any amount helps. Not just financially, but it helps us to know that we are doing something that is important to you. Something that you like. Something that makes you happy. And that is what makes this the best business in the world—making you happy.

Cheers.

With deep gratitude,

Michael
story_txt:
HUZZAH!!! When I first started thinking about what kind of restaurant I would want to open, I immediately envisioned an unpretentious, warm, friendly neighborhood sort of place with simple, good food and a dizzying choice of excellent adult beverages! A year and eight months in, I think we've got a part of that picture put together (if you were to believe our Yelp reviews!) but are obviously still missing a HUGE chunk of it.
WE GOTS OUR LICENSE
 The process and costs to get our Beer & Wine license was grueling. It wasn't so much the ABC license itself, but the Conditional Use Permit from the City of LA. Talk about bureaucratic clusterf$ck. Wanting to learn about the process, I basically did everything myself. And boy was that fun! But, now I know WHY you pay someone else $10K+ to handle it for you! 
    WHY MO MONEY So the Permit and License are just the beginning. We could just sell cans of PBR out of some picnic coolers (and we might try!) but we want to be more classy. I want to be able to offer you some AMAZING LOCAL CRAFT DRAFT BEER. And Wine. And Sake. And Shochu. That's a lot of refrigeration, supplies, and inventory! Upgrading our Electrical system (MORE POWER!) is about $4,000. A 3-Keg Draft system is about another $4,000. An under-counter Bottle Cooler is about $2,000. And so on. We could maybe get a loan or some credit cards to do this, but unmanageable debt is the NUMBER ONE KILLER of restaurants. I would like to avoid that if we can. Because debts, we already gots. So this is where you come in!

YOUR SUPPORT MEANS EVERYTHING
We have the BEST customers in the world. That's no B.S. We would not be here today, if it weren't true. And we have the BEST friends in the world. Otherwise, we could never have opened in the first place. Your support has meant everything.
Our mission: "To provide high-quality, affordable dining with friendly, sincere service in a fun, relaxed atmosphere." has been met with wide approval. We are proud of that. Still, financially, without adult beverages, it has been a struggle. Your support here will ensure that we reach a level of sustainability.
You deserve the BEST from us! And you will get it! We will continue to support you and our community: our local schools and charities; our local brewers and vintners! Please help us in our quest! 

ANY AMOUNT COUNTS
Seriously. Any amount helps. Not just financially, but it helps us to know that we are doing something that is important to you. Something that you like. Something that makes you happy. And that is what makes this the best business in the world—making you happy.
Cheers.
With deep gratitude,
Michael

story:
Cook@Home is a social platform enabling everyone to become a guest cook. Share your culinary culture by going to another person's home and teaching how to cook it.  Through this network, everyone can enjoy the authentic taste of food from every corner of the world!

Cook@Home is a brand new service that will open your eyes to a new way of buying, preparing, and eating food. Our social platform bring the culinary delights of world cuisine to your very home. Have you heard of companies like Uber, AirBnB and BlaBlaCar? Why not do the same with cooking?


  • WHY use Cook@Home
  • HOW does it works
  • WHEN will it happen
  • WHERE funds will go
  • WHO meet the team
  • JOIN US
  • FAQ




From all American grandma's special apple pie recipe to Italian macaroni to a Spanish paella, the world is full of delicious and particular dishes. The problem is that most are so far away and rare, which means some of us will never get the chance to try them.  This will no longer be a problem with Cook@Home.


With Cook@Home, anyone can be your guest cook: a foreign exchange student, your neighbor, a housewife. Perhaps they come from another country, but they live in your city and can prepare a special dish for you: one that comes from their culinary tradition –maybe their family's recipe, handed down through the generations.

You can actually learn recipes from every corner of the world right in your kitchen. Your guest cook can show you how to prepare that dish step by step, so you can make it yourself later on.

Benefits

•  Learn how to prepare and enjoy that special dish from home, with your guests;

•  Have someone that makes grocery trips for you and be able to monitor the quality and freshness of the ingredients;

•  Sit back and relax while your guest cooks and washes the dishes afterwards;

•  Save money and enjoy the chance to eat something that is normally only a "family recipe";

•  Learn about cuisines you've never tasted before (Slovenian, Cambodian, Estonian, Mayan, Sudanese and many others).

HERE you can find a preview of the coming shape of social platform.

How does it work

There are two main ways to use Cook@Home: the guest cook comes to your place or you go to theirs at his.

Either way, the guest-cook teaches you how to prepare and cook a special dish.

 HERE you can find a preview of the coming shape of social platform.




Where Funds Will Go

We need to raise at least $20,000 USD to complete website development and to take Cook@Home into the US and EU markets. Around 50-55% of the total amount reached by the campaign will go for Indiegogo fees, payment processing, taxes, and rewards fulfillment.

That said, what actually remains in our pockets to develop the project and make it grow is roughly a bit less than half of the total.


If executed properly, we can reach a large number of people in need of an easier way to cook unique meals. Our features make us incredibly qualified to succeed in the sharing economy industry. Our mission is to take care of every backer, supporter and customer with the utmost respect and care. This is the key to our growth.

If we don’t reach the whole goal, we will still be able to deliver you the perk you have chosen. It will just be delayed, not canceled.


Stretch Goals:


$30.000 - C@H Last Minute Booking: we will create a new research method that will allow patrons to create last-minute ads. Guest-cooks can freely browse among these ads and offer their service (as opposed to the normal search, in which a patron looks to book a guest cook on a specific date)


More stretch goals to be announced.



WHO? - Meet the Team


Alessio Massagrande  – Founder

Alessio has always had a passion for cooking. He originated this idea from his strong experience in IT, his creative talents and design skills. Now, he leads C@H’s vision and development. He started from scratch by reading books about everything that could help him to carry out his vision. He will always be grateful to Marcin Kleczynski (CEO@Malwarebytes) and Fernando Francisco (VP@Malwarebytes).

Marco Pravettoni - Co-Founder

Marco works as managing director in a recycling plant and he helped and contributed to C@H since the very beginning. He joined us because he believed in Alessio's vision of this new social platform that provides everyone the opportunity to be cook and patron at the same time, in every corner of the world.


Alexander Wong - Co-Founder

Alexander is a highly experienced IT and Information Security leader.Over the last ten years, he has helped hundreds of software companies and start-ups by overseeing their technical needs, while keeping the bad guys out of the door.He grew-up in the multicultural environment of Hong-Kong and has since traveled all over the world with one goal: to provide innovative projects like Cook@Home with the most secure and efficient technology.


Andrea Grandi - Founding Collaborator

Andrea is an engineer and graphic designer. He joined the team after he learned about this project by his childhood friend Alessio, and gladly embarked with him in this adventure! He loves cooking (mostly eating it!) and American football, which he played for nine years.




Merike Heidelberg - Founding Collaborator

Merike is currently finishing her Bachelor's degree in computer science and is responsible for making Cook@Home's ideas visible. She has a strong passion for music and cooking as well as graphic design.


We all have worked tirelessly over the past year to plan and bring this project to life.


Join Us

A social platform is nothing without users, and that’s why we would love to have you among us. Your contribution will give you the opportunity to be one of the first Cook@Home users. Funds will go towards the development and testing.

Cook@Home has endless possibilities: we plan to incorporate enterprise solutions, to further customize the first version and create additional products and services.

“Cook@Home” needs pledges, but above all, it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do, then please take a moment to click on our support page and share your support for us with only 3 clicks! Help us spread the word and get things started!


How to Donate

This campaign accepts only contributions by credit and debit cards and Apple Pay only, for safety reasons we do not accept contributions from PayPal.

Indiegogo accepts card payments including Visa, MasterCard, Discovery and American Express credit or debit cards, but not prepaid cards. (more in FAQ)

Make your pledge and join us in making Cook@Home a reality.

If you decide to join our project and donate, please remember to share your passion for us on your Facebook and Twitter account!
You can do that easily with 3 clicks on our support page


Risks & Challenges

We are committed to bringing you a great service, and won't settle for anything less. During our final development stage, we will actively work with our developers and quality assurance specialists to make sure that everything exactly matches our standards of quality. We recognize that not getting fully funded might result in a big delay for our effective Launch Day, but rest assured that we will notify everyone of what's going on so there will be no nasty surprises. Help us remain on time with a small donation, your help is necessary!


Thank You For Joining Us

We feel so grateful to everyone who has contributed and helped us spread the word. We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute. So thank you to all of our generous supporters. Please know that your efforts, even the smallest ones, don’t go unnoticed. We will keep you posted on what your contribution helped us to achieve. You are part of our Cook@Home family.

If you cannot donate but you still want to help, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

You can contact us at:  info@cookathome.net


FAQ


1. What about a national, regional or ethnic dish that cannot be prepared abroad without certain ingredients?

We often get this question!
We know that some dishes need ingredients that can be found only in a certain countries or regions. We also know that all cuisines use a base of ingredients found anywhere in the world. You can also find "exotic" ingredients in supermarkets, hypermarkets or big grocery stores. In big cities you can find specialty stores that provide almost anything coming from other countries.

That said, certainly some dishes are impossible to cook outside their country of origin because of a lack of special ingredients. Nevertheless those represent a small minority of dishes that a country has to offer. If you want to taste those particular dishes we suggest you to either contact a guest-cook coming from that country to check if they are able to provide those after a trip to their homeland or by traveling yourself to that country. That way, you can discover every taste and flavor that part of the world has to offer.


2. Why doesn't my credit card work?

Indiegogo accepts card payments including Visa, MasterCard, Discovery and American Express credit or debit cards, but not prepaid cards.

For further clarification, even though it's called a debit card, a prepaid debit card is very different from a bank account debit card. A bank account debit card is linked to your checking account; a prepaid debit card is not. Instead, you pay in advance to load funds onto a prepaid card, and then use the money you have loaded onto the card. 

3. About Dinner in the Sky, Airship/Helicopter tours perk rewards

We understand that not all of our supporter are in the US or EU; in those cases we will try to arrange for awarding those perks in that supporter's specific geographic zone. Helicopter tours are pretty common. Unfortunately airship tours are currently present only in Europe. You can still choose that option but then you would have to travel to central Europe.

4. About Cook@Home website service fees

To sustain the whole project and a platform that reaches and supports every country in the world, we will charge a small percentage fee every time a reservation is be made. This fee will be shared by both parties, mostly by the guest cook, and it will be calculated on the basis of entire amount of the transaction. The fee itself will be between 7% and 12%, depending on the amount of the reservation. This way, patrons can save money when booking large reservations (i.e. for many patrons or reserving many dishes). This will cover the cost of running the platform while providing a high standard of quality. These fees might also change because of promotions and geographic locations.

5. So, who exactly can become a guest cook?

Simply put, anyone who knows how to cook and has the passion and patience to cook for others. We believe that, in most cases, people who cooks out of passion know recipes that aren't found in any cookbook or restaurants. Each person can add a culinary flavor that cannot be found anywhere. In any case, there are some folks who could probably make more use of this platform, such as exchange students, expats, professional chefs (why not?) , the unemployed, pensioners and the retired etc. Imagine a Japanese ,Greek or Maltese student living in your city that will teach you how sushi is prepared  or even a person that can teach you how to prepare and cook some exotic historical cuisine, like Medieval, Aztec or Ottoman! The possibilities are so many, there is an entire world of aromas and flavors out there, maybe closer to you than you think!


6. I am afraid you will not deliver my perk. What can I do to be sure?

Campaign owners are held by Indiegogo Terms of Use (http://www.indiegogo.com/about/terms) to fulfill perks. If for any reason they're unable to offer you the perk you claimed, campaign owners are obligated to reach out to their contributors and work out a mutually satisfactory resolution- this resolution could be an alternative perk, a promise to issue the promised perk at a later date if the campaign owner is able to raise additional funds, or a refund. We always recommend opening up a conversation with the campaign owner if you have any question about what will happen to your contribution if the campaign owner is unable to raise the funds they need to complete their project.

story:
Hey everybody – Let's make awesome healthy Smoothies!

Everyone knows that you should eat healthy and do sports.

But here's the thing. It´s often difficult to know what to should I eat or what is healthy?

We know many ways how to eat and drink healthy.

We want to share this information for free so everybody has a better healthy life. We love to make great apps, that's why we decided to start with a smoothie app for free!

Until Now

We've made a smoothie app called "Smoothie-Maker" that'll show you beautiful designed smoothie recipes. ----- Easy to make for everyone.

- Information on ingredients that are good for the body.

- And of course a Shopping list to make it more comfortable for you.

You already can download it if you have an I phone!

Here´s the Link :

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/smoothie-maker/id977573680?l=de&ls=1&mt=8


Who are we? 

Hi, we are Raphael and Marvin, two young brothers who love to develop apps.

Inseparable during our childhood, especially when it came to computers. In 2014 we founded the Square Apps Company and started to develop apps. When we discovered our shared dedication to smoothies, it was clear that it would be our first major project. However, each of us two founders has another reference on this subject.

Marvin is always in search of new and interesting recipes. He tried many different smoothie apps, but there was always a lack of the ease of use, the design and the pictures disappointed.

 Raphael plays his experience as a professional bartender and a cook. He knows what is important for recipes and explains that it does not have to be complicated. After several long summer days and lots of delicious smoothie creations, we came to the decision to bring the public closer to smoothies. It should be possible for anyone to be able to make delicious smoothies.

Now we want wo share this app with the world!.

So this is the point where we need your support. If our campaign is successful, Square Apps will do two things: 

1. Make more recipes

2.Keep our apps for free so everyone can download it. 

That's right, while you're out there enjoying smoothies, we'll be hunched over our computers, making sure even more of you can enjoy these delicious smoothies.

And if you guys are super awesome, and we get even more than our goal, we also make an Android version. Help us make it happen.

A few notes.

Awesome rewards!

We make a limited T-shirt just for you! 

T-shirts are in men's or women's cut -- you'll get your size when the campaign ends.


Your choice in men's or women's cut

 

And finally -- we have anew shopping bag ($30)for carrying all your smoothie stuff.


More about our rewards:

For our business friends who want us to build them an app, that flat fee gets you a customized build-out of the recipe app. Depending on your needs, we also can create photos of your meals or juices, you may want even more customization, which could run into additional dev and/or hosting fees. But we'll be really upfront about that and try really hard to honor that flat fee. Email office@square-apps.at with your questions. 

You're awesome. We love you. 

Honestly, we're just so excited to get this app to you. We've been working on it a long time. It's going to be great and we thank you so much for your support. 

Risks and challenges

The iphone version of our app is already working great and approved by Apple. No risk there.

After the Smoothie Maker project we will make more awesome apps for free, because we just love it to design and build apps.

it. 
That's right, while you're out there enjoying
smoothies, we'll be hunched over our computers, making sure even more of
you can enjoy these delicious smoothies.
And if you guys are super awesome, and we get
even more than our goal, we also make an Android version. Help
us make it happen.
A few notes.
Awesome rewards!
We make a limited T-shirt just for you! 
T-shirts are in men's or women's cut -- you'll get
your size when the campaign ends.

Your choice
in men's or women's cut
 

And finally
-- we have anew shopping bag ($30)for carrying all your smoothie stuff.



More about our rewards:
For our business friends who want us to build them
an app, that flat fee gets you a customized build-out of the recipe app.
Depending on your needs, we also can create photos of your meals or juices,
you may want even more customization, which could run into additional dev
and/or hosting fees. But we'll be really upfront about that and try really hard
to honor that flat fee. Email
office@square-apps.at with your questions. 
You're awesome. We
love you. 
Honestly, we're just so excited to get this app to
you. We've been working on it a long time. It's going to be great and we thank
you so much for your support. 
Risks and challenges
The iphone version of our app is already working
great and approved by Apple. No risk there.
After the
Smoothie Maker project we will make more awesome apps for free, because we just
love it to design and build apps.

story:
Tried to come to a show lately?


Oh man, we're heartbroken! 3 years of work, 7 months of renos. This is our heart and soul, and it's meant to bring the same to our city.



500 + performances in 1 year! Markets, comedy, poetry, improv, jazz, blues, DJs, rock, funk, folk, hip hop, fundraisers...

On May 7th, Lacey-Lou locked its doors and declared an unexpected hiatus from operations.  This has been an unwelcome shock to Victoria’s art community.

Lacey-Lou opened its doors on April the 5, 2014, and has since hosted over 500 performances, and showcased work from dozens of local visual artists, while offering high quality yet affordable local food and drink. It has become a social hub that fosters creativity, inspiration and the sharing of ideas.

With 4 months of daily events scheduled, the decision to close wasn’t an easy one and has already created a lot of commotion. “We have been operating day-by-day from the moment we opened” says Natasha Grau-Ensminger, founder of Lacey-Lou. “It is astonishing that we made it one year in the restaurant industry with no working capital. We haven’t been shy in discussing our difficulties with our patrons, however it is difficult for any person to comprehend how severe the problem is when we’re filling our space almost every day.”

These challenges began in 2013, when it was discovered that the heritage space had more structural issues than could have been predicted. “Plans had to be re-drawn, meaning the building permit had to be updated, and everything was put on hold many times over. Our two months of renovations turned into seven, during which time we were paying rent and generating no income” Natasha explains. “By the time we were ready to open, our operating money was gone but we chose to give the business a chance regardless. After the thousands of volunteer hours, over 20 inspections and 12 permits obtained, we couldn’t not give this business a chance. Everyone believed in it.”

What happened next they could not have predicted. The lounge was quickly flooded with requests for musical acts, comedy, improv, live painting, and art displays. The waitlist grew, as did attendance. “The space turned into a cultural hub, connecting people and fostering creativity, with affordable exposure.”

The building in which Lacey-Lou is located is owned by the University of Victoria. “This building was donated by Michael Williams, whose passion was in art and creating community. I hope he would have been over the moon to see what has been created” says Natasha.

So what now? “This business can float itself; it is the initial debt that has caught up with us to the extent that had we not decided to close, that decision would have been made for us within days. Once we have dealt with that, we’ll work hard to ensure that Lacey-Lou becomes a staple to downtown Victoria. Sadly we aren’t eligible for funding or grants as we are a for-profit business, despite the many community events we hold. We want to keep the space accessible for all, where students and artists can continue to hold their events with low cover charge and rental fees.”

“If we can’t hold events in our venue, then we will organize what we can in public spaces in order to continue connecting and inspiring people through art and creativity!”

Lacey-Lou hopes to reopen its doors on June 1st.

Where oh where does the funding go?

As the renovations left the business with no operating capital, Lacey-Lou has fallen behind on various payments. The first $38,000 will primarily go to the essentials such as payroll, taxes, hydro, and rent. Anything above this will serve as operating capital, and help with the cost of stage equipment, lighting, and general upkeep and maintenance of the lounge.

Want to help?

For updates and events, check the Lacey-Lou Facebook page: facebook.com/laceyloulounge, or take part by emailing Natasha at Natasha@lacey-lou.com.

Don’t forget to share our campaign on social media!

story:
A 239-page exclusive book for (new) women investors and entrepreneurs.



WILL YOU SETTLE FOR LEAVING HALF THE WORLD’S WEALTH ON THE TABLE?

In a world where women’s capital remains underused, angel investing—providing money, human capital, and expertise for start-up or early-stage companies—offers a potent opportunity for women to impact the future. The authors—all seasoned players in the global business and investment community—share their personal stories and insiders’ insights in a clarion wake-up call intended to activate new women angel investors.

Both inspirational and actionable, Impact With Wings is the only book offering the necessary tools and information for evaluating whether angel investing is an appropriate financial asset class for you. Whether you’re a woman who wants to tap into your previously dormant financial clout or an entrepreneur—of any gender—who wants to understand the huge potential of women’s economic influence, Impact With Wings will inform, educate, and inspire you.



ABOUT WINGPACT

We cofounded Wingpact because we believe that when women begin to apply their financial resources to projects they care about, a more just and equal world will be created. We wrote this book as the first step toward catalyzing change, pursuing our vision of a world in which everyone has the opportunity to successfully express their talents and realize their dreams. Though we come from diverse backgrounds, cultures, and phases in our lives—from a single career woman to a mother of four—we are united by our passion for empowering women and improving the global culture around investment.



USE OF FUNDS

Crowdfunding campaign funds will be used for book editing, publishing, and PR expenses and to build curriculum for programs to further Wingpact's mission of working to inspire and mobilize women angel investors and entrepreneurs.

story:
That's the mission of The Community Project, an organization that believes that by providing a safe, sustainable place to call home and connecting residents with the resources they need to develop their lives, we can create a better world.

What if more people had a place to call home?

The Community Project wants to find out. Our first project will create a small community of tiny houses that can be rented for as low as $200 per month, or less depending on income. Working with a variety of local organizations, we'll connect tenants with invaluable resources to improve their lives - like financial advisers and opportunities for education.

This is where we need help!
By June 2015, we hope to construct our first tiny home in Oak Ridge, Tennessee. We hope to use this tiny home as a model to showcase to community leaders, donors, and the public to prove that these tiny homes are affordable, practical, and aesthetically pleasing.

Where will the money go?

The majority of the funding for this project will go to purchasing and building a NOMAD Micro Home. We chose the NOMAD because of its small footprint, ease of construction, and durability. This home costs approximately $28,000. (Learn more about NOMAD here.)

The initial home will be located on a tract of land along the Oak Ridge Turnpike being loaned to us for this project. Because of ordinances and permits, some of the funds will be used to pay for those. We will also use funds to host fundraisers, incorporate our organization, and market our cause.

Additional funds raised will go to the development of our first community. With the location yet to be determined, we hope to build our first community on ten acres of land with 15-20 homes, a small "community center" and an outdoor picnic pavilion and recreation area.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to give financially, please share this campaign within your social networks. Help your community by volunteering at a local shelter, or cleaning up your local park.


Thank you for your support!

story:
Together we can HACK the Angel & VC community! Who's in? We need your help...

Validayt.com is leveling the playing field for all founders and aspiring entrepreneurs.

  • I am Josh Jermaine, Founder, 2x entrepreneur and generally frustrated startup consultant.
  • Ryan Buss is the cofounder of Validayt.com and has his Masters in Cognitive Behavior and is a data scientist.
  • This campaign is near and dear to my heart because I have been in the shoes of every frustrated founder and cofounder this side of the Mississippi. 
  • By helping Validayt.com complete our algorithm and get off the ground, you will be enabling startup companies to become a reality. This is going to change the entire ecosystem for the better and we need your help!

We need $25,000 to make Validayt.com a reality

Here's the deal:

  • We need the $25,000 to get the appropriate data in order for Ryan and the team to make the algorithm extremely robust. 
  • We want you to participate in this project with us. We are gathering a huge list of founders & entrepreneurs to be our BETA testers as well as hundreds of Angel and Venture Capital investors to have input get us their input on what questions we need to ask in order to achieve the best possible outcome.
  • We are using this massive amount of data to create what we have coined the "V-Score." This score will eventually become the baseline for many investors as well as founders. Much like an SAT score in higher learning, we are going to be using the V-Score to help make the transition from "dreamer" to  real-life entrepreneur. 

Your Impact

This campaign is not being run to pay a salary or make a website. This money goes directly to the following:

  • Software to be able to complete the algorithm through data science and behavioral study.
  • Creating the data sets in order to harness the best results from both the end user (founder) and Investor (Angel & VC) 
  • Consulting. Part of the funds will go directly to education consultants in order to create the very best Q&A templates in order to get the most out of each question.

Other Ways You Can Help

If nothing else, please go to Validayt.com and sign up to be a BETA tester! 

~We thank you in advance~

story: Second Breakfast is a farm to table breakfast restaurant concept. Opening in the Pittsburgh Public Market to rave reviews in late 2014, we are well on our way to expanding into a food truck! We completed a Kiva Loan, a crowdfunded loan, for $5000 in a record-breaking 5 days recently - unfortunately, $5000 is the maximum for first time borrowers on Kiva, and we need at least another $10000 to get on the road. You can help by contributing here! Thanks for all your support, and waffle on!

story:
The most powerfull System for peoples prosperity and better fellings to be a human. Crossing`s System is a unique technique for Improving Life. I`ve combined allmost every knowledge about how to make Life better, added My own skills, thoughts and energy. And now it might be ready to something magical and impressive cause Crossing`s System has power to make your Life much more better !

You will have opportunity to test it`s Effects first, the others can earn My gratefulness for each donations, which I`ll reward by Crossing`s System.

Crossing`s workers get their first !


SPECIAL OFFER - first 13-20 persons who will claim Archangel`s Bless will have a choice to receive first level Buff or Effect instead as Crossing`s System presentation gift ! ;)

How Does It Works.

Crossing`s System uses various mind algorithms that decide how much energy and what type of it should get each living person and each sphere of life. This is one System which is compiling work of many systems to reach it`s targets such as balance, justice, worldwide harmony, consciousness love and quality enough for the most Life being. 

Crossing`s System has powerfull astral server (astral is what people see when use visualisation - energy vision). This server has information about current energy status of a person or a group of people, or an object and about every other detail. As you might know everything live, move and act cause of energy amount, so the more energy the more actions you can perform on both planes of Life - material and energo, unite they calls Reality, and for good results they both should be in well status ! By fulfilling required energy stocks of each person it is possible to move this world to better side or make personally yours or someone`s Life better or worst,but cause of valuable reasons (such as contributions to this project or ignoring it).Crossing`s System also has enough powerfull components which perform their roles in System`s 24/7 stable work and billions  the-other-world`s workers (Heaven`s included). But I need funds to describe more of this very complicated mechanism ! 

Sure you want to Read this again !)

So I`ll continue. There are three options, three types of work that performed by Crossing`s System  :

1.Maintenance of existence such things like justice, good life and deserved fate, reward  for good and high moral acts and punishment for evil and bad things in worldwide magnitude.

2.Maintenance of Life individually for each person and in different group types   (typology method). Improvements for people`s relationships and social status changings. I work on  this System for it to be able to change social status from present to what it should or must be (in both vectors), based on prosperity and rightness by complaining most of Lifes forces to bring Equity to the modern Societies.

3.Focus most of its power on one target to elaborate all necessary Life changing algorithms which includes following target for a certain time period  untill job`s done. Sometimes it is 2 or 3, even 5 hours Session (My record is 25 not stop hours) of instant work without afterwork, but with powerfull post effects. I hope for the solution of the most problems I need not more then half an hour of focus. Of course time bases on work amount.


So I have it. I`m its owner. And I use it wherever I want or have to. 

And now I`m here for crowdfunding, cause I`m in stuck without cash.

I want to offer you same equivalent  Life energy for your Donations to Me and to My part of this project. I have so much of it so I offer to have a change. Everyday for the  5 last years I make this world better, now I want to receive funds for this. 

So Life energy will transform Your Life by a Perk you have full opportunity to choose !)

(In most cases you need more Life energy to achieve your goals & to live like you want it).

I will use My own energy and power to improve you or someone I mark, who are attached to your Life quality, that`s why  you will have Life improvement from three streams - from Crossing`s System, from Me and from peoples that surround you. This is like an episode from film "Secret" - you can change your environment with your inner power, Crossing`s System will do the same, but with more power and from outside. That`s simple ))

I used to make huge amount of Job with astral energy systems, more level of perk grants the better effect (I repeat - I used to much more energy amount). Higher level perks are preferable, thank you ! ; )

Anyway every contributions will be pleased, I`m sure even those who want to stay anonymous or want to make simple donation without perks will earn My gratefulness & gratefulness from this Life for each contributed $,€ or £ to this Project and Me. I am really in close contact with she ;) 


Go on, its a good keep project, wonderfull Life changings and betterments are waiting for Crossing`s System contributors, and you can be one of them.I believe you shall like what am I offer here for funds - Distance Buffs & Effects provided by Me & Crossing`s System.


For those who can and going to contribute more then 1000 $ :

<<<<Don`t miss your chance to be one of 18-th limited Crossing`s System Buff & Effect claimer. Each contributor, who will claim 1 sized limited Life Perk shall be (if I`ll have their agreement for that) in the Crossing`s System Memorial of beta Desk,when I`ll find well enough realisation project for it>>>>


Once again - I can fullfill and restore all your energy stocks by unique technology & Crossing`s System will make your Life better, just click there to contribute !)

Material effects such as easy targets, unexpected gifts, allowances, good news, solvings of the old problems, better arterial pressure etc. are hihgly expected !) The point is that System has more opportunities to change your energy status, relationships with Life, Fate and Feelings, and all the Heaven`s forces, so you will feel the power of the transformation force performed by Crossing`s System methods.

Prepare for something special!


Note, that during Beta period  I`ll be much more gratefull!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Small part of history of creation Crossing`s System.

I`ve started in 2010. That year first I was succesfull in Life betterments of Me and others. I did it by My thoughts, energy and will. I`ve used hundreds of yoga, meditations, visualisations, goal targeting and wishes fulfillment methods of energy impacts, Trance, subconscious programms and configuration of both - conscious and subconscious, Templar`s Knowledges, Tibetian and Dzen practices. After several years of hard working I had write first System`s work algorithms and rules in simple journal / diary, but called Book of the Crossing, which was dated 21-23 of December,2012. First part which includes 300 hand writing pages I`d finished in 1 month. Now I have over 700+ pages of Code both handwritten and typed.

So I have to open it for crowdfunding and continue My job to create a perfect Life betterment System.


How Does it looks like in material world.

So, Crossing`s System consists of 3 parts – handwritten Code (books and datebooks), typed Code and methods (PC documents,images and other files), and Me, who knows how to use them.




Instructions:

1.After you choose your reward you have to send Me e-mail at GeorgeVol.f@yandex.ru or write Me a message to Facebook where I want you to provide Me one or several (depends on Perk) from the followings:

1)Link on Your Facebook page

2)Link on Your Instagram page

3)Link on Facebook page of your Partner (for Love Potion)

4)Link on Instagram page of your Partner (for Love Potion)

5)Link on Your Business site/page (for Job Upgrade)

6)Other preferred photos, selfies fine too ;)

7)Your Skype number

8)Short (or long) story about Effect you are expecting for. I want your description of Crossing`s System target!

For example, if you choose Love Potion I want you to describe your relationships, and I need to have a watch of you and your Love ^_^ )))

2.Average time for the Perk completing  is up to 1 month, after System`s Job done I`ll send you a message, but Effect could starts immediately after I`ll watch your Facebook or Instagram.

3.This Systems works with your Conscious, Subconscious, Mind, Habits, Soul, Spirit, Fate, Life and Feelings. It has very difficult structure, which has influence on whole World`s Lifestreams, so it isn`t something that I can proove by clicking fingers. It works, you`ll have Equivalent Effect  for any sized Contribution, but do not expect too much, I`m not Messiah and I can`t make wonders. But I know how to make this Life and this World much more better !)

4.Listen to your inner voice (intuition)!!! Crossing`s System works primary through it – it could change the way you think, and if everything will be like I configured, you will find that your own inner voice helps you in Effect achievement. Or some others voices in your head ;) Anyway listen to those which positive, it is very important! 

5.This is BETA version, this is Life betterments, here works Telepathy, White Magic, Energies & Powers, Life Streams & Sources etc, so I cant give you any guaranties but My own and My side that We will manage our goal (Beta), but I can guarantee that you`ll get Life energy Equivalent for every donated $,€ or £ which will make its job to improve your Life.In most cases you need more Life energy to achieve your goals & to live like you want it!


Requirements:

  1. You have to be light person, I won`t work with bad people. Crossing`s System has reverse effect for evil and bad persons, so be carefull. Otherwise I can make you lighter for your donations.
  2. Moderate English for communication.

story:
Short Summary

AdvocateSaga is a business community of brand advocates who support their favorite technology vendors by sharing marketing content, submitting referrals, creating testimonials, giving feedback to product development, or supporting sales processes and brand awareness with their presence during prospective calls or at events.

In the age of customer-centric marketing, each vendor tries to capitalize on customer loyalty, and brand advocates are overwhelmed with requests to endorse hardware, software, applications, networks, services, communication platforms, and much more.

AdvocateSaga
• Bundles advocacy efforts for multiple technology vendors on a single platform, maximizing time investment for both advocates and vendors
• Helps advocates define themselves as technology experts, rather than product or brand experts
• Brings a company’s advocates together in a competitive and funny environment
• Creates networking opportunities within the advocates communities of multiple technology vendors
• Consolidates vendor rewards, enabling advocates to make greater social impact

AdvocateSaga uses gamification techniques to motivate advocates and help them track performed actions on a free-to-use platform. Technology vendors can receive actionable insight on the efficiency of their advocacy program for a monthly subscription.

What We Need & What You Get

To take the idea to market we need to raise money for programming and web development. In return, we offer a few perks—from eBooks to consulting hours (please see right column).  We have designed the perks to be tangible and immediate, so you don’t have to wait until we finish programming or even finish raising funds.

In addition, we offer free membership to all our supporters once the AdvocateSaga platform is online.

Risks & Challenges

 

Information is the most powerful force in the world of business. Content is king when it comes to generating sales leads. And the most valuable content is generated directly by customers: reviews, success stories, endorsements.

In the hunt for content, tech companies demand more and more time from their brand advocates. AdvocateSaga comes to their aid as a consolidated platform for all advocacy activities.

As with most new projects, there’s always a risk they won’t come to fruition. However, what we think works to our advantage is more than ten years of experience in the customer advocacy business, and excellent knowledge of the tech industry. To find out more about us, please visit www.advocacymaven.com.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign with the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
The Dreams and Hopes of 38 Brain Injured Children Are at Risk To Be Discontinued

THE B2B SPECIAL CENTER FOR BRAIN-INJURED CHILDREN REHABILITATION  is a modern facility in CONSTANTA, ROMANIA addressing - as the name suggests- the rehabilitation for all brain-injured children. The center started as an idea in 2012 and became reality in September 2014, was funded entirely throw charity and is managed by a Romanian NGO Organization called “COPII SUFLETE SPERANTE”, in translation “CHILDREN SOULS HOPES”. B2B Special means “BORN TO BE SPECIAL”.

The “COPII SUFLETE SPERANTE” NGO organization was founded by brain-injured children families as they decided to donate their time, resources and efforts to overpass the lack of such facilities within the Romanian public welfare system. It is a parent’s fight with an imperfect system and against disabled child abuse and discrimination. Besides having enthusiastic parents, in order to survive on the long run this NGO needs funding and public support.

What We Need & What You Get

The center needs funding of 21.500 USD or more in order to be able to run with minimum costs for the remaining of 2015. It is VITAL that the B2B Center is co-funded throw charity to allow its current 38 disabled  little patients to maintain their chances for rehabilitation and keep their hope for a better future. Without this funds the center will be forced to close.

Your reward is priceless; restoring smile on a crippled face, giving hope to a broken heart; your generous gesture can draw a major impact somewhere in a corner of this world; You can become one of the few flowers among 6 billion leaves in this planet's  tree of life. You can change destinies! You can deliver hope!

Moreover your name will enter a special Thank you list called " The Book of Gratitude". It will be available online on our website www.copiisuflete.ro  at first and later on the volume will be printed and displayed in the center to remind future generations about their predecessors noble gesture and their true vibrating hearts.

W E   N E E D   Y O U R   H E L P!



W E  N E E D   Y O U R   H E L P!

15 Reasons to Get Involved

1.  It helps brain-injured children (Cerebral-palsied, Epileptic, Down’s Child, Autistic, ADHD, Mentally Retarded, Mentally Deficient, Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorders, Athetoid, Developmentally Delayed) to stay in a therapy program, otherwise not available for them.

2.  If you are a disabled child, Romania is not the best place to be. Nor is for parents of disabled children. Brain-injured children in Romania are being neglected by the public welfare programs and their rehabilitation options within the country are very low.

There is no regulated infrastructure for the disabled, no real rehabilitation support, no modern facilities to assist disabled children.

The B2B Special center is a start to change that.

3.  Reduces the number of children being abandoned by their families. B2B Special center offers hope for families having brain-injured disabled children contributing to reduce brain-injured children abandonment. Romania is known for its negative background with institutionalized children.

4.  Locally, the county of Constanta recorded in 2013 a total of 932 brain-injured children while the public rehabilitation centers total capacity could accommodate 107 children only, meaning that 90% of the brain-injured children do not fit into the system.

5.  In this moment there are 38 children attending the B2B Center services regularly and the capacity can be doubled with proper funding. The administrative costs in the center are partly covered with charity funds allowing therapy costs to be as low as 10 to 12 EUR (12 to 14 USD) hourly rate per therapy.

6.  Brain-injured children will receive expert medical advice from a neuropediatric specialist and take benefit of modern EEG (Electroencephalograph) technology for brain screening.

7.  Being built on a NGO structure, it helps unprivileged children to unlock the community resources and benefit from local companies programs sponsorships.

8.  B2B Special Center is a modern facility, with spacious and comfortable rooms and with adapted infrastructure for disabled children.

9.  The center works in ambulatory regime, meaning that parents will join their children at the center for one or more activities and at the end of the session the children will return home within their families. There is no overnight stay, children are always returning home within the warmth of their families.

10.  B2B Special is greatly improving the social life of brain-injured children, most of them being rejected by public schools or kindergartens while the system is permissive to such abuses and even if brain-injured children would be accepted as such,  most public educational institutions lacks proper infrastructure and trained teachers that can handle brain injured children.

11.  B2B Special offers psychological support and counseling for parents having brain-injured children; it is known that families having a brain-injured children tends to get a low balanced social life.

12.  B2B Special established an active role within the community, raising community awareness on brain-injured children problems and difficulties through integrated activities with normal children, normal adults or using media and public campaigns.

13.  B2B Special offers volunteering options for individuals willing to expand their knowledge and social activities or for young professionals willing to train and improve their expertise. The management of the center is made through volunteering.

14.  B2B Special is set on a path of embracing the most advanced technology medical or non-medical, new visions and new ideas, continuously expanding its potential in order to deliver best practices and proper knowledge to brain-injured children and their families.

15.  B2B Special rehabilitation approach for brain-injured children is joyful and non-invasive, keeping in mind that this category of unprivileged children are able to discover the world in their own pace and although most of brain-injured children are not actually aware of their limitations, we strive to enlighten their daily routine, while delivering therapy in the same time.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • You can get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • If you cannot help, find a close friend that can help! If he or she is offering help means that you helped too!

Thank You For Supporting Us!


                                        " Hope see the invisible,
                                          Feels the intangible and 
                                          Achieves the impossible.”

                                                                      Charles Caleb Colton
