story:
Springfield is a unique neighborhood consisting of special people and places. Crispy’s will emerge as the new hub of art, dining, and socializing in historic Springfield rejuvenating the energy and vibrancy of Main Street. More importantly, Crispy’s will raise the expectations of what is possible for a new business in Jacksonville. Crispy’s original ideas will blend together the old with the new, art with obtain ability, and fill numerous needs with exceptional service.

What will Crispy’s bring to Springfield?


  • An Art Gallery- showcasing local artists and art obtained during Crispy’s travels.
  • A Restaurant- serving incredible pizza, paninis, sandwiches, and salads.
  • A Full Liquor Bar- featuring 24 craft beers, many locally brewed.
  • A Unique Neighborhood Gathering Spot- located in the historic Akra Brother’s Department Store, built in 1933 during the Great Depression, which features many seldom seen original architectural features being meticulously restored.
  • A Pedi-Cab Service Hub- private bicycle rickshaws.
  • A Dry Cleaning Service- with home pick-up and delivery.

The owner, known to friends and neighbors simply as Crispy, lives in the neighborhood and embraces its potential. His 25 years in the restaurant and bar business has taught him the importance of the service experience beginning with a welcoming attitude and exceeding expectations.

With your advanced purchases of merchandise and special offers during this campaign you can demonstrate your own excitement and support for this project and the rebirth of Main Street in Springfield. A large portion of the money raised will go to fund a large iconic mural to be painted on the front side of the building by renowned local artist Shaun Thurston. Visible from both Main Street and 8th Street, this mural will become recognizable and synonymous with Historic Springfield throughout Jacksonville.

Crispy’s, located in the historic Akra Brother’s Department Store, pays homage to Springfield’s rich architectural history by returning the facade of the building to its original glory with black porcelain tile. 

Inside, the bar and tables will be built from beautiful reclaimed wood discovered during restoration. Natural sunlight will radiate throughout the restaurant and gallery from two giant original skylights illuminating the various offerings of local artists. Spectacular terrazzo marble floors throughout the building lead to a grand staircase which opens to the second floor mezzanine allowing for a lofty dramatic socializing space overlooking the main gallery restaurant and 42 foot bar. Crispy’s bar, made of 80 year old reclaimed wood, will be a beautiful showpiece of craftsmanship that will become Springfield and Jacksonville’s gathering spot for all occasions. Whether to enjoy a cocktail of fine spirits or one of our 24 craft beer selections, Crispy’s will quickly become your frequent destination. It’s our mission to make you a regular!

Crispy’s will be a casual dining experience, welcoming to everyone who enjoys freshly prepared food using the best local ingredients to make a variety of pizzas, paninis, sandwiches, and salads open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Also featured will be locally roasted and freshly brewed Brass Tacks Coffee.

What will make Crispy’s Special?

Crispy’s can’t be confined by conventional business models. He sees a need and wants to fill it. Crispy’s will offer a dry cleaning service to the busy professionals who call Springfield home. Let us know and we can deliver your pizza and dry cleaning to your home at the same time. It might sound like a strange combination at first, but the convenience will quickly become apparent. Taxi service is spotty at best in Springfield, so weather permitting, our exclusive Pedi-Cab service will save you the hassle of driving and parking by picking you up at your home in Springfield in our bicycle carriage, bring you to Crispy’s to enjoy food, drink, and socializing, then safely return you home to complete the Crispy’s experience. Only in a unique neighborhood like Springfield could this be possible.

       

Making it happen! 

Thank you for your support!

story:
Why THINK NEXT GENERATION?

Every time a child is born, it is God reaffirming He wants the world to go on. In the words of Judge Glenda Hatchett, “Children are God’s gift to the world”. 

As we intensify our efforts to reach children in the Bahamas, Jamaica and the United States we are calling on our partners and friends to support our THINK NEXT GENERATION Campaign. Our ministry exists to:

  • EVANGELIZE Children
  • EQUIP Parents &
  • TRAIN Children's Ministry Workers

Here's How YOU Can Help...And What You'll Get BACK

During the month of March we will be doing Child-Evangelistic Crusades & training workshops: in the Bahamas (March 2-7 & March 19) and in Jamaica (March 19-23). 

Here are more specifics:

  • Our budget for these 3 evangelistic trips is $3,232.45. The budget covers travel, lodging, supplies and materials we will provide for children & children workers. 
  • For your generosity, we would like to send you a special gift. 
  • We will send you a Ricardo Miller Children's Ministries Coffee/Tea Mug or your choice of two Teaching CD's "Lord Help Me With My Mind" or "The Crippling Effect of Excuses"
  • If we don't reach our entire goal funds will still be used toward these evangelistic efforts.

The Impact

With your gift of just $10 or more, you will be helping us continue to spread the gospel to children in these nations. Thank you for your support in helping us reach the Next Generation

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Spread the word and make some noise about our campaign and 
  • Pray for our efforts!

story:
ABOUT THE CREDIT REFORMER

The Credit Reformer assures our customers credit reports are free of inaccurate, incomplete, or unverifiable information.  With your help we can stand up for consumer credit rights and make sure they're not being abused by illegal credit reporting tactics and practices that happen everyday.

Why This Campaign Is Important To Me

I was personally affected by a collection agency in a small claims lawsuit. I wanted to defend myself so I did countless hours of research.  In the process I learned an invaluable about consumer rights I never knew I had. I also uncovered most collection agencies operate under complete and utter deception and get away with it which makes and still makes me sick. I discovered many collection agencies can't provide information which proves you owe them anything! If you write them asking for information and they can't provide it they legally are obligated to remove or delete it from your credit report!


Collection Agencies Breaking the Law

I wanted to test the collection agencies to see if they were indeed violating the law. I pulled up my credit report and discovered several collection agencies were reporting on it. I wrote the collection agencies challenging the debts. The collection agencies could not respond with proof showing I owed them anything. In return, the collection agencies stopped collection activity and deleted the entry's from my credit report completely. This confirmed to me that most collection agencies are nothing but a complete and utter racket taking advantage of people who don't know their rights.



Positively Impacting Peoples Lives

With your generosity we can start helping our people improve their credit scores and reports while protecting their rights under the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act, the Fair Credit Reporting Act in addition to many other Consumer Protection Laws. I'm very passionate about this once in a lifetime opportunity to turn my business venture into a reality.  As a entrepreneur I could not think of a better business to start because I'm very passionate about protecting people against corporate greed fueled by most collection agencies.



Risks and challenges

With every business venture there are challenges but I don't for see any dramatic obstacles that we can't overcome. One challenge would be not getting enough customers per month to make a profit. I don't believe that will be a problem because I've been getting interest on Facebook challenging friends debts and proof of them being removed on our Facebook page. After a year of being established I I don't foresee a problem generating funds because simply because our proven method of operation.


I need funding for Phase 1 of the business

  • 1 Year Prepaid - Bond insurance for $25,000 with the State of Wisconsin (quite expensive)! $3400 rounded up per year.
  • License to practice consumer credit disputes in the State of Wisconsin. $100 for a 2 year license.
  • Legal representation to obtain proper legal documents and contracts necessary to operate at 110% compliance the law. Including but not limited to power of attorney forms and legal advise and guidance. $8000 needed right before we start fighting for consumer rights.


  • Cloud based software so our customers can log in 24/7 to track changes on their credit reports. In addition our customers will be able to send us messages,  keep track of payments and be able to update services from any computer, tablet, or smartphone. The fee for this service is approximately $2200 per year.
  • Many small extras that add up fast such as a website to bring in additional clientele, business computer, monitor, being listed in the yellow pages and the list goes on from there. $5,000.
  • Plus an $1300 for campaign fees and other miscellaneous expenses.

Perks for donating

  • $10 You've Got Mail - Receive a personal handwritten thank-you card sent to your residence.
  • $25 Stop Collection Calls & Mail - Documentation explaining how to effectively stop collection agencies from calling your phone and sending you mail. Successfully submitted templates included!
  • $25 Challenge Collection Agencies - Documentation explaining how to effectively challenge collection agencies by disputing the questioned debt. If successful the collection agencies have to delete or remove it from your credit report. Successfully submitted templates included!
  • $25 Challenge Credit Bureaus - Documentation explaining how to effectively challenge items on your credit report and have them removed. Successfully submitted templates included!

  • $25 Challenge Debt Before It Hits - Documentation explaining how to effectively challenge the 30 day notice from a collection agency so it doesn't hit your credit report. Successfully submitted templates included!

  • $25 Collect On Abusive Practices - Documentation explaining how to make collection agencies pay you for their violations in small claims court. Collection agencies break the law on a regular basis. I'll tell you collect in small claims or federal court for violating your rights up to $1,000.00 per occurrence.

  • $99 Special Value Package - Stop Collection Calls & Mail - Challenge Collection Agencies - Challenge Credit Bureaus - Challenge Debt Before It Hits & Collect On Abusive Practices all bundled into a special value package. 5 in 1!
  • $199 Value Package Plus - Includes everything mentioned above with successfully submitted templates showing you how to effectively write letters plus 1 hour of Skype talk time with me
  • $299 Value Pkg - Letters -Talk Time - Everything included in the package above plus 3 hours of Skype talk time per month for 3 months answering all your questions your about consumer credit rights plus helping you through the process.
  • $499 Ultimate & Unlimited Talk Time - Everything included in the packages above plus unlimited Skype time for 3 months answering all your questions about your consumer credit rights plus helping you through the process.


Support Us

Please donate :) With your contribution today we'll be one step closer to turning peoples lives around who are being abused by greedy collection agencies and incomplete information being published on credit reports.

If you're serious about reforming your credit or what to help someone else s why wait? Make a small donation to one of our packages so you can start reaping the benefits immediately!  

Other ways you can help 

- Make some noise about our campaign with people that would benefit from our perks!

-See items we've removed from TransUnion and SUPPORT US on our FACEBOOK page.

We truly appreciate your help and undivided attention to our cause and hope you have a wonderful 2015!

story:
Short Summary

Version 1.0 website splash image

We started developing ScreenTag back in 2012, with the vision to offer a seamless way to replace paper-based printed business cards and bring this most basic form of advertising and personal communication to the digital era.

v. 1.0 aired in October of that year. V. 2.0 came about a year later in the form of a mobile web app. However, our user metrics showed that this was not useful. So we started researching about how ScreenTag would be easy to use and fast. Our user research showed that users prefer something readily available upon switching on their phones; and this is how we ended up with v. 3.0.

For v. 3.0 we re-configured our servers and file system to make our QR codes super readable even with screens under 3 inches, secured easy delivery system without relying solely on e-mail messages, we re-built our ordering system making it easily accessible even on mobile devices and secured flexible and more secure storage that can host up to 9,000,000 ScreenTags. What is missing, is only a back system to interconnect all those components together. And this is where you get in, since our available funds are not enough to cover the cost.


What We Need

Actually, we roughly need £2,000 - that's the net campaign target of £2,500 - to get the back office system up and running. This will cut to half the time needed to get a ScreenTag up and running and will eliminate delivery notification failures. This covers the minimum requirements to get the new version of the ScreenTag aired.

Any amount we get over our campaign target will go towards adding more features to the ScreenTag service:

- at £3,500 secure end-to-end connection through SSL encryption will be added, making your contact details more secure

- at £7,000 CDN will be activated making it super fast for your recipients to receive your contact details

- at £15,000 installation will get automated through a native app for the three most popular smartphone platforms (Android, iOS and Windows)

- at 25,000 ScreenTag will get its own QR code reading native app (for Android and iOS), rather than relying on third party reading apps

and

- at £50,000 a companion native app will be developed for the three most popular smartphone platforms (Android, iOS and Windows), for those who like changing their lockscreen and startscreen backgrounds often (or they simply don't want their contact details available in their lockscreen or startscreen - yes, there are those people too...)

Reaching the £50,000 stretch goal within the campaign period - so, this does not cover the InDemand campaign - will also allow us to reduce the ScreenTag annual subscription fees by 20% at £4 - $4 - €4. Everyone wins!


What You Get

Just like most crowdfunding campaigns, supporters will be getting the product they backed with their contributions - except, of course, from those who will choose just to support our vision for paperless visual contact exchange.

Basic edition is well, just as the word says; it serves only basic contact exchange needs by featuring a generic image. Contact details exchanged are just your name, e-mail and cell phone number.

Personal edition offers more contact details (social media profile link, home address and phone number) as an option and of course it features your favourite image (that is anything you like your recipients to see).

Professional & Associate editions are serving the purpose of the standard printed  business cards; all contact details you wish to share with potential customers or partners (business or office address, phone, fax, e-mail, cellphone, website or social media profile or page, anything you choose), featuring a promotional or business image of your choice or you order us to design for you. The difference among the two is limited to confirmation of business image use for the associate edition (e.g. if you say that you work for Citibank, we are not allowed to use their logo unless you actually work or you are somehow associated to them - typically, an e-mail address containing their domain name is enough proof).


Risks & Challenges

If the minimum campaign target is not reached, implementation of the back office system will be delayed and delivery of ScreenTags to our supporters will take a few days, since we'll continue doing everything manually. Although this is not actually a risk, waiting time could spoil the overall ScreenTag experience. In any case, we will start delivering ScreenTags to our supporters from day 1 of this campaign.

Delivery of stretch goal added features - especially the native companion and automated installation apps - are subject to submission acceptance by each platform. Although we are confident that the companion and installation apps are acceptable by current guidlines for all three major platforms, this may change in the future.


FAQs

Q: Do I have to be connected to the internet to use ScreenTag?

A: Not at all. However, your recipient will have to be connected in order to download your contact details from our servers.

Q: Can I change the featuring image?

A: Unless you have the Basic Edition, you definately can through the support section of the website for a small fee.

Q: Once I have signed up for any edition, can I upgrade it?

A: If you use one of the Editions for individuals (Basic and Personal Editions) you may use Anytime Upgrade option in the support section of the website. Associate Edition may also be upgraded to Business Edition.

Q: How many ScreenTags can I have on my phone?

A: Actually, as many as you like. A widely used choice is a combination of a Basic or Personal with a Professional or Associate Edition, but there is no limitation about how you may combine your ScreenTags.

Q: If I change my device what happens with my ScreenTag?

A: Your ScreenTag is always available in the cloud and can be easily downloaded whenever needed for free. No worries.

Q: What happens if any of my contact details is changed?

A: You only need to notify us through the support section of the website. Your annual subscription covers changing your contact details once per year. If your recipients' address book supports automatic updates, they will receive your updated details the next time they open your contact entry in their address book.

Q: Does ScreenTag support other languages than English?

A: That's one of the new features in Version 3.0. ScreenTag supports all left-to-right languages. Although we tried hard to find a way to support right-to-left languages as well, we discovered that they are not properly supported by address book apps provided with most smartphones out of the box.


Other ways you can help

As we strive to return back to our users the trust and support we receive from them, we have many features we are ready to implement as added features along the way. So, spreading the word about this campaign, not only helps us building a better service, but also gives you the chance to receive those added features sooner. So even if you cannot financially support our campaign, spreading the word among your friends about it and about ScreenTag is equally appreciated.

To show your support to this campaign, you only need to use the Indiegogo sharing tools on the left and to support ScreenTag, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter by using the links underneath.


Thank you!
story_txt:
Short Summary 

Version 1.0 website splash image
We started developing ScreenTag back in 2012, with the vision to offer a seamless way to replace paper-based printed business cards and bring this most basic form of advertising and personal communication to the digital era.
v. 1.0 aired in October of that year. V. 2.0 came about a year later in the form of a mobile web app. However, our user metrics showed that this was not useful. So we started researching about how ScreenTag would be easy to use and fast. Our user research showed that users prefer something readily available upon switching on their phones; and this is how we ended up with v. 3.0.

For v. 3.0 we re-configured our servers and file system to make our QR codes super readable even with screens under 3 inches, secured easy delivery system without relying solely on e-mail messages, we re-built our ordering system making it easily accessible even on mobile devices and secured flexible and more secure storage that can host up to 9,000,000 ScreenTags. What is missing, is only a back system to interconnect all those components together. And this is where you get in, since our available funds are not enough to cover the cost.

  What We Need 
Actually, we roughly need £2,000 - that's the net campaign target of £2,500 - to get the back office system up and running. This will cut to half the time needed to get a ScreenTag up and running and will eliminate delivery notification failures. This covers the minimum requirements to get the new version of the ScreenTag aired. 
Any amount we get over our campaign target will go towards adding more features to the ScreenTag service:
- at £3,500 secure end-to-end connection through SSL encryption will be added, making your contact details more secure
- at £7,000 CDN will be activated making it super fast for your recipients to receive your contact details
- at £15,000 installation will get automated through a native app for the three most popular smartphone platforms (Android, iOS and Windows)
- at 25,000 ScreenTag will get its own QR code reading native app (for Android and iOS), rather than relying on third party reading apps
and
- at £50,000 a companion native app will be developed for the three most popular smartphone platforms (Android, iOS and Windows), for those who like changing their lockscreen and startscreen backgrounds often (or they simply don't want their contact details available in their lockscreen or startscreen - yes, there are those people too...)
Reaching the £50,000 stretch goal within the campaign period - so, this does not cover the InDemand campaign - will also allow us to reduce the ScreenTag annual subscription fees by 20% at £4 - $4 - €4. Everyone wins!

 
What You Get Just like most crowdfunding campaigns, supporters will be getting the product they backed with their contributions - except, of course, from those who will choose just to support our vision for paperless visual contact exchange.


Basic edition is well, just as the word says; it serves only basic contact exchange needs by featuring a generic image. Contact details exchanged are just your name, e-mail and cell phone number.
Personal edition offers more contact details (social media profile link, home address and phone number) as an option and of course it features your favourite image (that is anything you like your recipients to see).
 Professional & Associate editions are serving the purpose of the standard printed  business cards; all contact details you wish to share with potential customers or partners (business or office address, phone, fax, e-mail, cellphone, website or social media profile or page, anything you choose), featuring a promotional or business image of your choice or you order us to design for you. The difference among the two is limited to confirmation of business image use for the associate edition (e.g. if you say that you work for Citibank, we are not allowed to use their logo unless you actually work or you are somehow associated to them - typically, an e-mail address containing their domain name is enough proof).

  Risks & Challenges  If the minimum campaign target is not reached, implementation of the back office system will be delayed and delivery of ScreenTags to our supporters will take a few days, since we'll continue doing everything manually. Although this is not actually a risk, waiting time could spoil the overall ScreenTag experience. In any case, we will start delivering ScreenTags to our supporters from day 1 of this campaign.
 Delivery of stretch goal added features - especially the native companion and automated installation apps - are subject to submission acceptance by each platform. Although we are confident that the companion and installation apps are acceptable by current guidlines for all three major platforms, this may change in the future.

  
 
FAQs  Q: Do I have to be connected to the internet to use ScreenTag?
A: Not at all. However, your recipient will have to be connected in order to download your contact details from our servers.
Q: Can I change the featuring image?
A: Unless you have the Basic Edition, you definately can through the support section of the website for a small fee.
Q: Once I have signed up for any edition, can I upgrade it?
A: If you use one of the Editions for individuals (Basic and Personal Editions) you may use Anytime Upgrade option in the support section of the website. Associate Edition may also be upgraded to Business Edition.
Q: How many ScreenTags can I have on my phone?
A: Actually, as many as you like. A widely used choice is a combination of a Basic or Personal with a Professional or Associate Edition, but there is no limitation about how you may combine your ScreenTags.
 Q: If I change my device what happens with my ScreenTag?
A: Your ScreenTag is always available in the cloud and can be easily downloaded whenever needed for free. No worries.
 Q: What happens if any of my contact details is changed?
A: You only need to notify us through the support section of the website. Your annual subscription covers changing your contact details once per year. If your recipients' address book supports automatic updates, they will receive your updated details the next time they open your contact entry in their address book.
Q: Does ScreenTag support other languages than English?
A: That's one of the new features in Version 3.0. ScreenTag supports all left-to-right languages. Although we tried hard to find a way to support right-to-left languages as well, we discovered that they are not properly supported by address book apps provided with most smartphones out of the box.


Other ways you can helpAs we strive to return back to our users the trust and support we receive from them, we have many features we are ready to implement as added features along the way. So, spreading the word about this campaign, not only helps us building a better service, but also gives you the chance to receive those added features sooner. So even if you cannot financially support our campaign, spreading the word among your friends about it and about ScreenTag is equally appreciated.
To show your support to this campaign, you only need to use the Indiegogo sharing tools on the left and to support ScreenTag, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter by using the links underneath.

Thank you!

story:
Help us make our fantastic greenhouses even more affordable for everyone. We need to raise funds to cut out the middle man and purchase our own fabrication machines. This should cut the price nearly in half of what we are currently having to charge and make these American made greenhouse kits affordable for everyone who wants one.


Features:

Our greenhouses are made from heavy duty Galvanized steel frames. They have a hard polycarbonate exterior siding that will withstand high winds, heavy snow loads and even medium sized hail. 

They are anchored to the ground every 4 feet with a 3' anchor driven into the ground, so high winds will never destroy your new greenhouse.

A weekend project for most people to set up. Nothing too heavy for the average person to lift. Once installed it should be virtually maintenance free for life.

Currently featured in this months editions of Mother Earth News magazine & Countryside magazine. Also featured in Hobby Farms magazine.

ORDERS WILL BE FILLED AND SHIPPED OUT IN THE ORDER THEY ARE RECEIVED. So the sooner you place your order the sooner you will get it.

story:
This is Crazy!  

        Let’s Level The Playing Field!


Inventors and Entrepreneurs are stuck!  There are millions of great ideas but very few resources to make an idea a reality.  InventionIntention.com is a marketing, sales, networking and launching platform for the creative thinker.  We bring inventors and entrepreneurs together for retail connections, business partnerships, product sales, investors, and business resources -  all to advance their ideas. 


We do NOT invest in or take equity of any idea, product or company!  Your ideas belong to you!

So many ideas are lost to history because an inventor or entrepreneur doesn't have the contacts, the capital or the resources to get their idea to the public.  


Inventors and Entrepreneurs need YOUR help in bringing new and useful products to the world market.  We have built a digital platform to bring retailers, wholesalers and consumers to InventionIntention.com to help move creative and useful new products into the hands of consumers.

InventionIntention.com is a fully functional website business ready to expand the dream for the creative individual.  We are looking to help YOU succeed and secure YOUR future.

We do invest in or take equity interest in any idea, product, or company.  We do not take any commission from any sale or partnership created. Our mission is to bring new products and ideas to market in a fair, honest way.  Our platform is for YOUR use to self-market your invented product, find the right businesses to move your idea forward, or find an investor or business partner.  The more new inventions are sold or new businesses are opened, the better it is for the world's consumers.


So, Where Does an Inventor or Entrepreneur           Go for Help?

Where does an inventor go if he or she has questions on development or distribution?  Where do they go to become inspired or re-inspired?  How do they find a reputable manufacturer or learn how to make a professional prototype?

General information can be found on the internet.  However, tangible and practical information is still too hard to come by.  We want to be the one-stop destination for those who want to launch their idea as well as for those who want to do business with inventors and entrepreneurs.

We are in control of our own destiny!  


A Few Facts

More than half a million patents are filed each year with the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office and over 300,000 patents are actually granted.  Over time, that adds up to millions upon millions of patented inventions.  So, where are these inventions anyway?  Some of these inventions and patents are owned by big corporations and a few others you will see on store shelves.  Where are the rest of the millions of great ideas?  These inventions are owned by individual inventors and small companies who are trying very hard to market their product(s) and sell them locally, nationally or globally.  Many of these great ideas are sitting in attics,  basements, and garages collecting dust because the inventor has run out of resources.  

Keep in mind that inventions are created and patented around the world.  The United States is just a small portion of the real number of inventors and inventions.

A few sample patent years of the United States are shown below:

  http://www.uspto.gov/web/offices/ac/ido/oeip/taf/us_stat.htm



What If?

So, what if a person has the idea, dream, and drive but no resources or contacts to make it happen?  Wouldn't it be great to have a way to showcase those inventions, sell them, connect with other inventors, partner with professional resources, and find salespeople to make your dream come true without being taken advantage of by big money corporations?

You've seen those commercials on TV promising that they will take your great idea and turn it into millions of dollars.  The truth is only a very tiny fraction of inventions actually become successful enough through a third party company to make the inventor any money at all.  Have you ever met anyone who has actually been successful through a third-party company?  Of course not.  It rarely happens to anyone.

What's worse is that if these companies actually do accept your idea and develop it, they in return will take a large equity ownership of the product or company.  This leaves the inventor and/or entrepreneur with little or no control over his/her company or idea and the majority of revenue produced by the product going to the investing company - not the inventor.

What if inventors of the past did not have the resources, business savvy, networking opportunities or marketing skills to get their products into the marketplace?  Where would we be today without rubber, transistors, plastics, sewing machines, internet, etc.  The list goes on and on.  There are so many inventions that are solving many of the world's problems and they are in jeopardy of a premature death...unless we can mix things up a bit.


There is a Better Way!

At InventionIntention.com, we have developed a platform which enables inventors to keep total control over their products while they showcase their invention, connect with retailers and wholesalers, find quality professional resources, interact with other inventors, partner with investors, and sell to the general public.  Inventors may even find talented salespeople who can sell their inventions in locations never dreamed of by the inventor generating income for both!

We do not invest in or take control or equity of any product, idea, or company.  Our purpose is to provide an environment where inventors can show what they do best and make connections and business arrangements to make their idea come to life.


You Want Examples?

Let's say there is an inventor in Allentown, PA and he/she is trying to connect with retailers to sell their product.  A retailer from Dallas, TX sees this unique and fascinating product on InventionIntention.com and purchases several to sell in his/her store.  This is not only a big win for the inventor, but also a big win for the retailer who now has a profitable product that few others have.  This is also a huge win for the consumer by offering them useful products which had not been previously available.

Here's another:  Perhaps there is a talented and creative salesperson living in Boca Raton, FL.  They visit InventionIntention.com and connect with 6 or 7 inventors on the site to sell their product on a commission basis.  This is not only a great deal for the inventor by extending his or her sales reach, but also for the salesperson who now has an income based on his or her efforts.

The possibilities are endless as to whom the inventor can sell their product or to whom they can create a business partnership.  Individual consumers may also purchase products through the platform providing a richer sales history and much needed exposure for the inventor while at the same time  giving the consumer a desired product.


Ease of Use

InventionIntention.com was designed to be friendly and intuitive.  It has many useful features including search and filter capabilities email/contacting capabilities, product sales via the website, product analytics, and much more.

This platform allows users to search in a large variety of ways such as: 

·  by products or inventions

·  by country, state, city

·  by product category

·  by the interests of inventors and entrepreneurs (Do they want to sell patent, look for local inventors, etc.)

Future capabilities will include inventor and entrepreneur matching to purchasers and businesses, webinar learning services (web educational seminars), discussion rooms, live video chat and many more.


Currently

Our platform currently has hundreds of members.  Some are inventors who are selling products, others are entrepreneurs who are still in the process of creating and developing their idea.  Others still are companies looking to do business with inventors and entrepreneurs. 

There is even a space on our platform for investors who can research inventions and ideas and perhaps create partnerships and business arrangements.  



We are looking to increase our membership numbers dramatically in the next several months.  We want to open the website to all inventors, entrepreneurs, retailers, wholesalers, consumers, businesses and investors.  We want to give all members the advantages they need to succeed. 


Where The Money Will Go

Our platform currently has a strong foundation.  We needs to cultivate a fair and healthy website so that our members can prosper and grow. 

It is time to build upon this success and expand the services and functionality of the platform.  We need to increase visibility of the site, improve the way users interact on the platform, and make it easier to connect, network and sell products.


Our most immediate goals are the following:

$4,500  Increase member participation through online marketing (because, let's face it, if nobody knows about us, nobody wins)

$2,000  Improve the functionality of the website to make the user experience smoother 

$2,500  Add programming for matching capabilities (matching inventors to retail store owners for example)

$1,000  Website visual enhancements




Future goals are:

·  add community discussion boards

·  add live chat with businesses and retailers/wholesalers

·  add additional communications capabilities

·  sell professional educational and improvement products

·  add RSS feed to Home Page

·  create mobile site

·  add a matching feature to match inventors to business or investors

·  add testimonials

·  add calendar for upcoming events, conventions, seminars, webinars, etc.

·  add webinar capabilities

·  add group video conferencing capabilities

·  create a video upload page which allows users to upload informative videos



FAQ

Why do I need InventionIntention.com?  Why can't I just go to Wal-mart or Target and show them my great invention?  Surely they will buy it, right?

The truth is, without a proven sales history or very strong track record, "Big Box" retailers usually won't give you the time of day.  InventionIntention.com allows you to market your product and create the sales history you need to negotiate with retailers and investors.

Does InventionIntention.com buy inventions or invest in inventions?

No.  We do not invest in, or develop inventions.  We provide the platform so the inventor can market and sell their product.  The inventor keeps total control over their product.  The inventor can use this platform in place of a private website for marketing and selling purposes to lift the burden and costs of developing and maintaining a separate website.

Can non-subscribers use InventionIntention.com?

Yes!  Anyone can take advantage of the features and functions of the platform.  In fact, users (including retailers and wholesalers) can contact the inventor or entrepreneur via the contact feature or they can purchase products directly through the site.

Will there be an annual fee for members?

InventionIntention.com is a membership-based platform.  Currently there are no membership fees.  However, in the future we believe it will be necessary to charge a small annual fee to subscribers (never to consumers) to prevent unwanted, silly, non-related, non-serious posts.  We believe this will make the website more valuable to the user.  There will never be a fee to browse, purchase or contact subscribers.

Can I contact an inventor and sell for them on commission?  Will I be charged a fee?

InventionIntention.com takes no fee or commission off of any sale or business agreement.  You can definitely contact an inventor and negotiate a sales position.  Many inventors would be very willing to talk to you to help expand their product reach. 

Can I purchase products for myself or do I need to be a retailer or wholesaler?

The majority (if not all) inventors on the platform would be more than happy to sell their product to the average individual consumer as well as to any retailer or wholesaler.

Is InventionIntention.com different from other invention business websites?

YES!  There are many invention websites that promise to invest in your invention only to charge you with outlandish fees or take a large portion of the equity in your company or product.  InventionIntention.com provides the platform and the resources for the inventor and entrepreneur to do it themselves, thereby allowing them to keep total control over their property.  We have NO equity interest in your idea, product, or company.  You are in control of your own destiny.  We provide the assist.


Thank you VERY MUCH for your generous support!

Many inventors would be very willing to talk to you to help expand their
product reach.  
Can I purchase products for
myself or do I need to be a retailer or wholesaler?
The majority (if not all) inventors on the platform would be more
than happy to sell their product to the average individual consumer as well as to
any retailer or wholesaler.
Is InventionIntention.com
different from other invention business websites?
YES!  There are many
invention websites that promise to invest in your invention only to charge you
with outlandish fees or take a large portion of the equity in your company or
product.  InventionIntention.com provides the platform and the resources for
the inventor and entrepreneur to do it themselves, thereby allowing them to keep
total control over their property.  We
have NO equity interest in your idea, product, or company.  You are in control of your own
destiny.  We provide the assist.



Thank you VERY MUCH for your generous support!

story:
Here is the text first in English. Text in Finnish, German and Portuguese at the end.

AN IDEA:Could you or a business you know of maybe help us to promote the campaign by starting a "Give your dog friend a valentines day present - Research on their feeding!"? Then we would soon know what is healthy - and have published evidence on it!  Please?

For supporting, please press one of the perks to the right - there are some more suitable for interested owners and some more for the pet food industry.

For larger donations and receipts; contact me on anna.hielm-bjorkman@helsinki.fi

And...if you cannot pay via a credit card (as Indiegogo no more supports pay pal); there are other ways you can help at the end of the English text. E.g. link this campaign or the dogrisk site to your friends!

 

LETS FIND OUT WHAT A DOG WOULD COOK AND EAT, IF IT COULD CHOOSE!

 

VALENTINES DAY IS COMING UP - THERE IS STILL A REASON TO GIVE YOUR DOG A PRESENT. GIVE HIM AND US EVIDENCE-BASED KNOWLEDGE - DO IT TODAY!

Help us do research on associations between dog diets and disease. A touchy subject - but Oh! - so important!

  We, the DOGRISK research group, are a group of researchers in Finland, Europe that have dedicated our research to solving the riddles of diseases that we suspect are due to non-optimal nutrition. We mean diseases like cancer, heart disease, osteoarthritis, epilepsy, diabetes, chronic gastrointestinal diseases, hypothyroidism, teeth and gum problems, and many more. We call ourselves the DOGRISK research group as we are looking for DOGs’ RISK factors for diseases.

Although we do appreciate that other things, such as genes, obesity and environment also have a big impact, our primary focus is on what the dogs eat and how the diet associates with disease. We look at:

  • macro and micro nutrients in the foods and in the dog,
  • gut microbiota (=the bacteria in the gut),
  • nutrigenomics (=how nutrients and food effect to gene expression) and
  • epidemiology (=where we look at data on what dogs eat and what diseases they have and see if there is an association).

Our ongoing projects:

  • 1) A population based epidemiology study: Over 11.000 dog owners have now answered our extensive, validated questionnaire. We ask about their dog’s characteristics, environment, their human and furry family, their activity, the diseases they have had or have, and their diet. Owner owned dogs have usually happily eaten the same diet for months, or even years. Different dogs have been fed different diets: low quality kibble, high quality kibble, “sausages”, canned foods, home-cooked diets, raw diets, BARF, mixed diets etc. Because of this we can now see what diets have led to less disease and what diets have led to more disease. We just need some salary money so that we can analyze the 11.000 cases. YOU can help us getting this done.
  • 2) Diet intervention studies: We have already made the first diet intervention study where about 45 dogs ate one of two balanced diets for 4-5 months. They were otherwise living normal lives with their owner families. We took feces, urine, blood samples, biopsies and hair from the dogs before and after the trial. Then we analyzed the samples for serum values, vitamins, fatty acids, organ function biomarkers, blood cell values, gut microbiota, RNA expression and some other things but now we have no money to do the statistics, write the articles and publish the results. AND we would need to do at least one more similar study to confirm the results! YOU can help us doing this as well!

 

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET:

We need research funding and you will get evidence-based information and published data on how different diets associate with dog diseases.

We would need 25 $ from EVERYBODY that gets this message. For that you can e.g. get this awesome ribbon  to tell others that you care:

Or a VERY SMALL SUM from everyone on earth that owns, or has ever owned, a dog or that has had a 2-or 4 legged family member with any of the diseases above. Here is what we need and what we can do with the money:

  • For every 1.000 $: we can analyze one dog, at one time point (all analyses). So for a trial of 50 dogs with 3 times sampling, we need 150.000 $. Expensive - but sooooo interesting!
  • For every 2.000 $: we can publish one article in a peer-reviewed, open access journal. In two years we anticipate to publish 15 so we would need 30.000 $
  • For 10.000 $: we can send our researchers to international veterinary and dog nutrition conferences to present independent diet-related research results
  • For 10.000 $: we can use statisticians and bioinformatics for our papers
  • For every 150.000 $: we can pay salary for one year for  our researchers and we hope to get enough money to work undisturbed for 2 years, meaning 300.000 $.
  • THIS MAKES A TOTAL OF  2 YEARS OF WORK FOR 500.000 $ - Research is expensive!

BUT - if we do this together we researchers can continue the work. This is something to give your dog friend this year as a Valentines gift. We suggest you give your dog a hug and a kiss and let it know that this years present went to trying to figure out diseases. If you send us a picture of your dog as a message to our Facebook page "dogrisk", we will also insert a text into the picture, saying something like "My owner supports DOGRISK research!" This you can then use when you let your friends know about the campaign on social media (as you spread the message, this will also help us). It will look something like this:

 

As we get to continue we will publish peer-reviewed journal articles on associations between diet and atopy, osteoarthritis, epilepsy, cancer, tartar and many other diseases. As we go we will all learn at least some more things about what we SHOULD  or SHOULD NOT feed our friends. The good thing is that we are already more than half way as we already have the data from our questionnaire and from our first feeding trial, BUT WE JUST DO NOT HAVE ANY FUNDS RIGHT NOW TO ANALYZE them. To be able to do it, we need funding and therefore we have some perks that will leave lots of money for research. So please also consider our expensive - but unique- perks!

YOUR SUPPORT WILL HELP US CONTINUE OUR IMPORTANT RESEARCH!

 

THE GROUP

If You still want to read on we will now introduce ourselves briefly:

  • Anna Hielm-Bjorkman, DVM, PhD, CVA, Adj.Professor, PI, DOGRISK group leader:     I am 54 years old and have been working in my own clinic and at the University of Helsinki for  nearly 30 years. I treat all the diseases above and have been getting frustrated over the fact that we doctors (animal and human doctors, in fact) really have no clue why our patients get these diseases. The same is true for our family members and friends; why do we humans get cancer, diabetes, epilepsy etc...? In the work we do here we can get answers for risk factors for both dogs and humans. Modern medicine seldom treats the disease anyway, mostly we just hide symptoms. In my work I use  supplements, surgery, pharmacological and non-pharmacological treatments and would like to use nutrition much more that we do today. My work in nowadays 80% research but with a zero internal budget. This means I have to get research funding for the whole group from outside the University. And studying dog food is not a top priority in any country's financial plan! Therefore we hope that we who are dog owners could maybe fix this together - as no one else will - and we think we need this information.
  • Website:   https://tuhat.halvi.helsinki.fi/portal/en/person/hielmb   www.dogrisk.com
  • Liisa Uusitalo, MSci, PhD (Human/dog nutrition epidemiology): I am a nutritional scientist with a doctor's degree in epidemiology. I have been involved in human nutrition epidemiology studying  the associations of diet with type 1 diabetes. I have been working in the DOGRISK project for a year and a half, and I am really excited about using my epidemiologic insight for the benefit on animals, as well as of humans, now. There are so many inspiring analysis waiting: epilepsy, cancer, diabetes, atopy, joint diseases...all important for both dogs and humans!
  • Website: https://www.linkedin.com/in/liisa-uusitalo-b66a...
  • Johanna Anturaniemi, MSci (animal breeding), PhD student (nutrigenomics, metabolomics): I am an agronomist and graduated in 2010 having animal breeding (genetics!) as my major. Since then I have worked in the DOGRISK research group. I am really interested in nutrition and its impact on health and diseases. I would like to know much more about the complex network of genes, nutrients, and metabolism. To study these associations in dogs will help us understand their role in our dogs' and also our own life. My inspiration for this work has been my atopic Staffy 'Elvis' who passed away in 2014.
  • Website: https://tuhat.helsinki.fi/portal/en/persons/johanna-anturaniemi(eea11397-1f2f-4343-a2f5-af5aa71c0993).html

  • Noora Sjögren, DVM, MSci (Animal nutrition), PhD student, Animal nutrition diplomate student: I am a 36 years old veterinarian, I have a MSc in animal nutrition and I am an agronomist. In spring 2016 I was accepted as a  ECVCN (The European College of Veterinary and Comparative Nutrition) resident, and my goal is to be a diplomate in the area of clinical animal nutrition.  Animal nutrition has always been my interest and specially the opportunities it brings in to treating both diseases and preventing them. In my everyday practice as a vet I want to treat my patients as good as possible, and rather prevent the diseases than treat them. I want to find the diseases that can be prevented by nutrition. Website: https://fi.linkedin.com/in/noora-sj%C3%B6gren-8...

  • Robin Moore, Masters student (biochemistry, organic chemistry)  I am 23 years old, and began studies at the University of Helsinki in Fall 2012, majoring in chemistry and minoring in molecular biology. In Dogrisk, I use statistical and biochemical analysis of metabolomic data in order to study how dietary intake can cause disease risks in dogs. The metabolome of an organism is primarily influenced by diet, and hence so is their overall health This is a novel field which has important implications towards our understanding of what can cause disease, as well as how diet can be used as a preventative for various disorders.
  • Website: https://tuhat.helsinki.fi/portal/fi/persons/rob...

    DOGRISK homepage: http://www.dogrisk.com/research-group

  • Susanna Paavilainen, Anna Loimaranta and Niina Siljander and their dogs are in the DOGRISK cancer sniffing dogs project. We will campaign for that project later.

  • We also have Sara Zaldivar-Lopez from Spain, Stella Barrouin-Melo from Brazil, Ziga Gerber from Slovenia and others that ave been working on the project when visiting Finland. Also, many not here mentioned PhD students and licenciate vet students have worked on the project.

All in all - The strength of the group is being curious, looking outside the box, love for research, not having any predetermined ideas of what we will find, not going where the fence is lowest, not being pushed around by big companies or big pharma, and having a group of top researchers on the job! In the DOGRISK project we have no other agenda than learning why and how diseases happen, how this is linked to nutrition - and therefore if and how we can prevent disease, and, if possible, cure it. But like so many, we are suddenly without funding.

Further down we will open up the total impact of our work

 

THE IMPACT

This project is awesome! We have already sneaked at the data and KNOW that we will find associations between diet and diseases. Some foods are really protecting while other foods are not so healthy. We do have a lot of hypotheses on why, but to be honest, at this time we still have no clue of what the "why" is. Here are some of the hypotheses we work with: Is it that high temperatures during processing make food more unhealthy? Would a high fat, low carb diet be healthier for dogs? Do dogs need vitamin C to be added into the diet? Are kibbles un-physiological as they are so dry? Does the food lack trace-elements that we have not considered? Has the food become too sterile for the good of the patient? Does wrong food mean wrong gut microbiota - and wrong gene-expression? -In the end we will know and will not have to speculate anymore. And we are not at all against any type of diets (dry, canned, raw, home-made) but hope that all results we get will benefit ALL types of diets. If they are too sterile then we might have to put more probiotic bacteria into all type of foods, if dry food is too dry then the industry would write that it has to be mixed with water, if raw food makes dogs get diarrhea then raw food companies would have to write that it takes 3 weeks for the intestines to switch to raw diet etc.

Another great impact of this research is what it has on human nutrition research. It is hard to look at how nutrition and diets associate with human disease as human disease often comes late in life and the diet has been so varied during the persons life. People also cheat, and will not put all the wine and chocolate into the diet diaries. Dog owners seldom cheat and the dogs diet is often the same for months, even years and therefore good to use in calculating risks. As dogs also live in the same environment and has the same diseases as humans they are excellent "models" for human disease. Much better that lab rats or mice and much more ethical as we can use happy owner-owned dogs. So this research has a direct impact also on your own and your family's life!

Your contribution will make all the difference. Please try to spread this message to all breeder, kennel, pet store, groomer and vet internet sites that  you know of! We in the research group are also vets, nutritionists and breeders ourselves and we want to know - so why would not your friends want to know? On top of that, we are also routinized researchers with a good track record of publishing in the best journals in the veterinary or nutritional field (see the researcher pages at http://www.dogrisk.com/publications). We are also proud of how this research will be conducted: dog owners, pet lovers, people interested in the same diseases in themselves or in friends and relatives, hopefully also the dog food industry, maybe even the medical industry, will go in here together and fund impartial and independent, ethical dog food research. Thank You for helping us doing it this way!

 

ARE THERE RISKS?

Why do we want to do this crowdfunding? Because we have just spent 2 years trying to get funded and we are tired of getting a "YES! Super project! But a bit too NEW for us", "Interesting...but we cannot help you" or "Next year maybe...". We have therefore put a 500.000 $ goal, as we would like to work now at least for a couple of years, before we would need to gather money again. To work with what we are good at; research!

So what are the risks? There is no risk. We work for the University of Helsinki; number 67 on the QS sacle and number 103 on the THE scale (these are scales that put universities on lists of being number x in the world) so we work in a good research environment. Research money is scarce in Finland now due to a financial recession, and it is hard to get money for ambitious, innovative, new projects that need a lot of funding due to costly analyses: metabolomics, RNA-sequencing, DNA GWAS, gut microbiota analyses etc. We will do as much analyses as we get money for - most of the analyses for our first diet intervention are already done so we know they work for dog samples. All money we get in will go to finance the work in our research group. That is also why the perks are expensive, although what you get is cheap for us to make. And we will keep you updated on what we do and where we publish through our own net pages at http://www.dogrisk.com/publications

What are the risks if we do not get funded? That we will misuse our brains and start a nice cafeteria instead...! No...even if we get only a part of what we hope to get in we will continue this work. It stated in 2009 and will continue on a pace that our finances permits. If we get only a little bit of money only one of us will work and we will do no more analyses and no more diet interventions. If we get lots we can work for 20 more years! We can take in new researchers, do new diet interventions, work on what we have and what we will get in. We have struggeled for 8 years now and will either struggle on, or then, with YOUR help-fly over the hurdles!

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP IF YOU HAVE NO MEANS OF HELPING US FINANCIALLY

If you cannot pay via a credit card (as Indiegogo no more supports pay pal); here are some other ways you can help:

1.  Please send this page as a message (e-mail, twitter, facebook...) to all friends, relatives and people that own an animal and ask them to contribute and make some noise about us. Lets see how many $ you can get to our campaign! Together we can! Merry X-mas!

2. If 1000, 100 or 25 $, € or £ is too much for you, then please consider giving us 10 $. Or 5 $. Send us an e-mail (anna.hielm-bjorkman@helsinki.fi) and we will put in a new perk for you.Thank You!

3. If you have ideas about associations between diseases and diets in dogs that you have thought of as a dog owner or breeder, please send us a mail on anna.hielm-bjorkman@helsinki.fi. We are interested in what you have seen! Thanks

 

Please let us show you that grass root funding can do great things! Just press any of the perk buttons and you will be on your way to help a small innovative research group to help both YOU and YOUR DOG!

PLEASE MAKE THIS GO VIRAL!

 

------------------------

  Ja tässä osa tekstistä suomeksi:

Mitä ruokaa koira laittaisi: raakaravintoa, kuivamuonaa, koiranmakkaraa? Millainen ruoka olisi lemmikeillemme parasta? Tue eläinten ruokintaa käsittelevää tieteellistä tutkimusta!

Jos haluat tukea kampanjaa niin skrollaa sivu ylös alkuun niin näet oikealla puolella vastikkeita (engl. "Perks"). Valitse sopiva itsellesi seuraavista: Vain yksi ilmoitus niistä on suomenkielellä eli kannatusnauha (25 $ + 5$ postitus) mutta myös 3 x vuodessa ilmestyvä DOGRISK uutiskirje lähetetään suomenkielisenä sähköpostiisi (1 vuosi 50 $, 3 vuotta 100 $). Sitten myymme "haluatko olla Tutkija päivän Viikissä (1000 $) sekä raakaruokaseminaaripäivä huippututkijoiden kanssa (Englanniksi - 1000 $). Hinnat ovat korkeat ja tuotteet pienet, jotta kate olisi iso ja tutkimus saisi pelinappuloita ;c)) Kun olet valinnut yhden paina punaista "GET THIS PERK" niin sinut ohjataan korttimaksuun.

Koirille on tarjolla erilaisia ruokavalioita, joiden suosio vaihtelee ja jotka joutuvat helposti kiistelyn kohteiksi. Tieteellistä tutkimustietoa ruokavalioiden paremmuudesta ei tällä hetkellä juurikaan ole. Helsingin yliopistossa on käynnissä tutkimusprojekti koirien ruokinnan ja terveyden yhteyksistä. Rahoita projektiamme ja auta meitä saamaan työmme valmiiksi!

DOGRISK on suomalainen tutkimusryhmä, joka selvittää koirien ruokinnan yhteyttä niiden sairausriskeihin. Tutkimme esimerkiksi syöpää, sydänsairauksia, nivelrikkoa, epilepsiaa, diabetesta, ruoansulatuskanavan sairauksia, kilpirauhasen vajaatoimintaa ja hammassairauksia. Sairausriskeihin vaikuttavat ruokinnan lisäksi muut ympäristötekijät ja geneettinen perimä, mutta meidän pääasiallinen tutkimuskohteemme on juuri ruokinta, jota tutkimme monipuolisesti eri tieteenalojen menetelmiä ja kysymyksenasetteluja hyödyntäen. Projektissa käytetään kahta erilaista tutkimusasetelmaa: 1) havainnoivaa epidemiologista kyselytutkimusta ja 2) ruokintainterventiokokeita.

1) Olemme keränneet laajalla kyselylomakkeella tietoa jo lähes 11 000 koiranomistajalta. Kysely käsittelee koiran ominaisuuksia, käyttöä, elinympäristöä, ruokintaa ja sairauksia. Koirat syövät tyytyväisenä samaa ruokaa päivästä ja vuodesta toiseen, mutta ruokavalion koostumus vaihtelee koirien välillä. Jotkut syövät kuivamuonaa, jotkut koiranmakkaraa ja tölkkiruokaa, jotkut taas kotiruokaa tai raakaruokaa. Tässä suhteessa koirilla on helppo jäljittää ruokinnan ja sairauksien välisiä yhteyksiä. Tarvitaan vain rahoitusta, jotta aineisto saadaan nyt analysoitua. Tähän tarvitsemme apuasi!

2) Olemme jo toteuttaneet ensimmäisen ruokintainterventiotutkimuksemme, jossa 45 koiraa noudatti kahta erilaista, tasapainoista ruokavaliota 4-5-kuukauden ajan. Koirat jatkoivat tavallista elämäänsä omistajaperheissään tutkimuksen ajan. Tutkimuksen alussa ja lopussa niiltä kerättiin uloste-, virtsa-, veri-, karva- ja kudosnäytteet. Näytteistä on tehty jo monenlaisia mittauksia (mm. vitamiineja, rasvahappoja, verisoluja, suolistomikrobeja ja RNA-geeniekspressiota), mutta mittaustulosten analysoimiseen ja julkaisemiseen meillä ei tällä hetkellä ole rahoitusta. Tutkimus pitäisi myös toistaa tulosten varmistamiseksi. Tässäkin voit auttaa rahoittamalla projektiamme!

Katso miten voit auttaa oikeanpuoleisista ”Perkseistä” (=vastineet). Esim. newsletterin (=uutiskirjeen) voit tilata myös suomenkielisenä! Ja support ribbon on vihreä DOGRISK-kannatusnauha jota voit pitää koirasi kaulapannassa, valjaissa, remmissä tai vaikka omassa takissasi! Näytä hyvää esimerkkiä muille ja anna koirasi olla ylpeä siitä, että tuet koiratutkimusta. Saat ylläolevan tapaisen tekstin koirasi kuvaan, jos laitat kuvan viestinä Dogriskin Facebook-sivuille!

HUOM: Kaikki vastikkeet ovat kalliimpia kuin niiden arvo; sillä juuri keräämme tutkimusvaroja.

________________________________________________

   And here is the text in GERMAN:

 

Was ist gesünder: Fertigfutter, Selbstgekochtes oder BARF?

Welche Art von Futter ist für unsere Hunde ideal? Hilf uns dabei, unabhängig von der Futtermittelindustrie zu forschen und diese wichtige Frage endlich zu beantworten.

 

Futtertrends kommen und gehen, stets begleitet von hitzigen Diskussionen darüber, welche Ernährungsform die gesündeste ist: Die Hundehalter schlagen sich deswegen förmlich die Köpfe ein. Bis heute gibt es dazu keine ernstzunehmenden, wissenschaftlichen und vor allem unabhängigen Fakten. Deswegen haben wir beschlossen, etwas dagegen zu unternehmen. Wir, die DOGRISK Forschungsgruppe, wollen es genau wissen! Allerdings ist professionelle Forschung teuer und die Suche nach Sponsoren ist schwierig, wenn es um alternative Fütterungsmethoden geht und keine multinationalen Konzerne hinter der Forschungsidee stehen. Deswegen brauchen wir die Unterstützung der Hundehalter, deswegen brauchen wir Deine Unterstützung! Hilf uns dabei, unabhängige Forschung zu betreiben.

 

Unterstütze unsere Forschung: Im Sinne gesunder Hunde

Beteilige Dich jetzt! Jeder Euro zählt!

Hilf uns, die Zusammenhänge zwischen Fütterung und Erkrankungen zu belegen!

 

Wie Du helfen kannst

 

Du kannst uns dabei helfen, unabhängig zu forschen – selbst, wenn Du kein Geld ausgeben kannst.

 

Perk / Prämie kaufen

Du kannst einen finanziellen Beitrag leisten, indem Du eine unserer Prämien kaufst. Du erhältst also eine Gegenleistung für Dein Geld. Angefangen vom DOGRISK Newsletter, über Studien und Bücher bis hin zu einem Tag in unserem Labor, haben wir interessante Prämien zusammengestellt. Die Einnahmen fließen direkt in unsere Projekte. 

 

Kleinen Betrag spenden

Wenn Dir die Perks zu teuer sind, kannst Du natürlich einfach einen kleineren Betrag spenden. Jeder Euro zählt! Denk daran, es gibt Millionen von Hundehaltern in Deutschland, Österreich und der Schweiz. Wenn jeder nur 10 Cent spenden würde, könnten wir unabhängig forschen.

 

Aktion teilen

Auch wenn Du gar keine finanziellen Mittel beisteuern kannst, kannst Du uns helfen. Teile diese Aktion auf Facebook, bei Twitter oder per E-Mail. Informiere jeden, den Du kennst darüber.

 

Wer wir sind

Wir, die DOGRISK Research Group, sind eine Gruppe von unabhängigen Wissenschaftlern aus Finnland und widmen unsere Forschung zur Lösung des Rätsels, ob bestimmte Erkrankungen die Folge nicht optimaler Fütterung sein könnten. Gemeint sind Krankheiten wie Krebs, Herzkrankheiten, Arthrose, Epilepsie, Diabetes, chronische Magen-Darm-Erkrankungen, Schilddrüsenunterfunktion, Zahn- und Zahnfleisch-Probleme ... und viele mehr. Wir nennen uns die DOGRISK Research Group, wie wir nach Risikofaktoren für Erkrankungen von Hunden suchen. Uns ist selbstverständlich bewusst, dass andere Einflussfaktoren wie Genetik oder Umwelt ebenfalls eine große Rolle spielen, dennoch liegt unser Hauptaugenmerk auf der Ernährung und darauf, ob Erkrankungen mit der Fütterung in einem Zusammenhang stehen. Wenn Du genaueres über uns wissen willst, scrolle nach unten, wir möchten, dass Du alles über uns und unsere Arbeit erfährst.

 

Woran wir arbeiten

 

Im Moment konzentriert sich unsere Forschung auf 2 sehr interessante Projekte:

  1. Halterbefragung zur Entstehung von Krankheiten: 11.000 Hundebesitzer haben bisher unsere umfangreichen, validierten Fragebögen beantwortet. Wir befragen die Tierhalter nach Lebensumständen, Aktivität, etwaigen Erkrankungen und natürlich nach der Art der Ernährung. Ob nun Fertigfutter, Tischreste oder BARF – wir können anhand dieser Daten auswerten, welche Fütterungsart mit welchen Erkrankungen in einem kausalen Zusammenhang steht. Wir benötigen nur noch die notwendigen finanziellen Mittel, um diese riesige Datenmenge auszuwerten. Hilf uns dabei!
  2. Studie zum Einfluss einer Ernährungsumstellung: Wir haben 45 Hunde in zwei Gruppen unterteilt. Jede Gruppe bekam über einen Zeitraum von 4 bis 5 Monaten jeweils ein bestimmtes, ausgewogenes Futter. Dabei lebten sie zuhause bei ihren Familien. Wir haben Kot-, Urin- und Blutuntersuchungen vor und nach der Futterumstellung durchgeführt. Leider fehlen uns nun die finanziellen Mittel, um eine statistische Auswertung durchzuführen, Artikel zu schreiben und diese zu veröffentlichen. Außerdem müssen wir natürlich noch eine weitere Studie durchführen, um die Ergebnisse zu bestätigen. Du kannst uns dabei helfen, das umzusetzen!

 

Was wir brauchen

Wir benötigen natürlich Forschungsgelder für diese Projekte… denn Forschung ist teuer:

 

Es kostet allein 1.000 €, eine komplette Analyse für einen einzigen Hund durchzuführen. Nehmen 50 Hunde an einer Studie teil und jeder Fall muss 3-mal ausgewertet werden (vor, während und nach der Futterumstellung), so sind das schon 150.000 €.

 

Es kostet 2.000 €, einen wissenschaftlichen Artikel in einer anerkannten Fachzeitschrift zu veröffentlichen. Und nur dann wird eine Studie in Fachkreisen Beachtung finden. Wir gehen davon aus, in den nächsten beiden Jahren 15 Artikel zu veröffentlichen, das macht 30.000 €.

 

Es kostet 10.000 € statistische Analysen durchführen zu lassen, die für ernstzunehmende Forschung unerlässlich ist.  

 

Es kostet 150.000 € das Jahresgehalt aller beteiligten Wissenschaftler der DOGRISK Research Group zu finanzieren. Das macht 300.000 € für 2 Jahre Forschung.

 

Wir benötigen also 500.000 €, um 2 Jahre lang im Sinne gesunder Hunde forschen zu können.

 

Die Mitglieder der Forschungsgruppe

Damit Du ganz genau weißt, wen Du unterstützt, möchten wir uns gern einzeln vorstellen.

 

Anna Hielm-Bjorkman, DVM, PhD, Professor, PI, DOGRISK Group Leiterin: 

Ich bin 54 Jahre alt und habe 19 Jahre lang als praktizierende Tierärztin gearbeitet. Seit 9 Jahren bin ich im Bereich Hochschulforschung, als Dozentin und Tierärztin tätig. Ich behandle alle oben genannten Krankheiten und bin unglaublich frustriert darüber, dass wir Ärzte wirklich keine Ahnung haben, warum unser hündischen Patienten eigentlich erkranken. Und das gleiche gilt für unsere zweibeinigen Familienmitglieder und Freunde: Warum bekommen wir Krebs, Diabetes, Epilepsie usw. ...? In meiner Arbeit war ich schon immer daran interessiert, Krankheiten zu vermeiden, an Stelle sie nur zu behandeln. Die moderne Medizin behandelt die Krankheit sowieso meist nicht, sondern kaschiert nur die Symptome. In meiner Arbeit konzentriere ich mich auf die Ernährung und behandle mit Nahrungsergänzungsmitteln, aber auch Chirurgie, pharmakologischen und nicht-pharmakologische Behandlungen, um zu einer echten Gesundung zu gelangen. Meine Arbeit konzentriert sich zu 80% auf die Forschung, allerdings wird mir von der Universität gar kein Budget zur Verfügung gestellt.  Dies bedeutet, dass ich meine Finanzierung selbst bewerkstelligen muss. Und Hundefutter scheint nicht die oberste Priorität im Finanzplan von Finnland zu sein…

Ich habe natürlich auch einen Vierbeiner zuhause. Sie heißt Lyra, ist ca. 2 Jahre alt und kommt aus Griechenland. Sie wird roh ernährt.

 

Webseite:  https://tuhat.halvi.helsinki.fi/portal/en/person/hielmb   

 

Liisa Uusitalo, MSCI, PhD (Mensch / Hund Ernährungsepidemiologie): Ich bin eine Ernährungswissenschaftlerin und habe im Bereich Epidemiologie promoviert. Ich war seit meinem Studienabschluss im Bereich der menschlichen Ernährungsepidemiologie tätig, wobei ich mich auf die Entstehung von Typ-1-Diabetes konzentriert habe. Seit anderthalb Jahren engagiere ich mich für das DOGRISK Projekt und ich warte gespannt darauf, endlich meine epidemiologischen Erkenntnisse zum Nutzen von Mensch und Tier einzusetzen. Es gibt so viele spannenden Themen zu denen wir noch viel zu wenig wissen: Epilepsie, Krebs, Diabetes, Allergien, Gelenkerkrankungen ... alle samt wichtig für Hunde und Menschen!

 

Webseite: https://www.linkedin.com/in/liisa-uusitalo-b66a74a4?authType=NAME_SEARCH&authToken=Rhie&locale=en_US&srchid=46914541481919461126&srchindex=1&srchtotal=4&trk=vsrp_people_res_name&trkInfo=VSRPsearchId%3A46914541481919461126%2CVSRPtargetId%3A372904062%2CVSRPcmpt%3Aprimary%2CVSRPnm%3Atrue%2CauthType%3ANAME_SEARCH

 

Johanna Anturaniemi, MSCI (Tierzucht), Doktorandin (Nutrigenomik, Metabolomik): Ich bin Agrarwissenschaftlerin und schloss mein Studium im Jahr 2010 im Bereich Tierzucht mit dem Hauptfach Genetik ab. Seitdem arbeite ich bei der DOGRISK Research Group. Der Einfluss der Ernährung auf die Gesundheit und Erkrankungen ist ein hochinteressantes Forschungsgebiet. Ich möchte unbedingt die komplexen Zusammenhänge zwischen Genetik, Ernährung und Stoffwechsel erforschen. Solche Erkenntnisse würden uns helfen, die Bedeutung für unser Leben und auch das unserer Hunde zu verstehen. Meine Inspiration für diese Arbeit war mein Staffi 'Elvis', der unter Allergien litt und 2014 leider verstorben ist.

 

Webseite: https://tuhat.helsinki.fi/portal/en/persons/johanna-anturaniemi(eea11397-1f2f-4343-a2f5-af5aa71c0993).html

 

Noora Sjögren, DVM, MSCI (Tierernährung), Doktorandin im Bereich Tierernährung: Ich bin eine 36-jährige Tierärztin, ich habe einen Master of Science in Tierernährung. Außerdem bin ich Agrarwissenschaftlerin. Im Frühjahr 2016 wurde ich bei ECVC (The European College of Veterinary and Comparative Nutrition) angenommen und mein Ziel ist es, im Bereich der klinischen Ernährung Tieren zu forschen. Tierernährung hat hat mich schon immer interessiert, vor allem die Behandlung und Prävention von Erkrankungen.  In meiner täglichen Arbeit als Tierärztin möchte ich meine Patienten so gut wie möglich behandeln und Krankheiten lieber verhindern, als sie zu threrapieren. Meine zwei Westies "Tarmo" und "Tyyne“ sowie mein Zwergdackel „Hilkka“ sind meine Inspiration – auch für Sie möchte ich herausfinden, welche Erkrankungen man mit Hilfe einer optimalen Ernährung verhindern kann.

 

Außerdem gehört Robin Moore zu unserem Team, er ist eine 23-jähriger Bachelor Student im Bereich Biochemie.  

Webseite: https://tuhat.helsinki.fi/portal/fi/persons/robin-moore(3ce9d107-a531-470b-b5b3-39199985bff5).html

 

Zusätzlich unterstützen uns Susanna Paavilainen, Anna Loimaranta, Niina Siljander,

Sara Zaldivar-Lopez, Stella Barrouin-Melo und Ziga Gerber.

 

Die Stärke unserer Forschungsgruppe liegt darin, neugierig zu sein, auf der Suche nach Antworten auch über den Tellerrand zu schauen, Forschung im Sinne der Tiere zu lieben, keine vorgefertigten Meinungen zu haben, auch mal um die Ecke zu denken und vor allem, sich nicht von großen Futtermittelherstellern oder der Pharmaindustrie „herumschupsen“ zu lassen. Außerdem sind wir – bei aller Bescheidenheit – hervorragende Wissenschaftler. Die DOGRISK Forschungsgruppe hat nur ein Ziel: zu lernen, wie Krankheiten entstehen und dies mit der Ernährung in Verbindung gebracht werden kann. Vor allem aber, wie man diese Erkrankungen verhindern und behandeln kann. Im Sinne der Tiere und nicht mit Gewinnen, Margen und Marktanteilen im Hinterkopf.

 

 Positive Auswirkungen unserer Forschung

Unser Projekt ist einfach genial! Wir haben die Daten bereits in Augenschein genommen und die verraten uns bereits, dass es einen Zusammenhang zwischen Erkrankungen und der Ernährung gibt. Einige Lebensmittel wirken sich tatsächlich positiv aus, während andere wirklich ungesund sind ... Wir haben eine Theorie, warum das der Fall sein könnte, aber um ehrlich zu sein, wissen wir es eben noch nicht genau. Um mal einige Beispiele zu nennen: Führt das Erhitzen von Lebensmitteln dazu, dass sie ungesünder werden? Ist eine fettreiche, aber kohlenhydratarme Ernährung gesünder für Hunde? Benötigen Hunde wirklich kein Vitamin C im Futter? Ist Trockenfutter einfach „zu trocken“? Fehlen im Fertigfutter Nährstoffe, die wir vielleicht gar nicht auf dem Schirm hatten? Ist das Futter für eine gesunde Ernährung vielleicht einfach zu „steril“? Wenn wir das erforschen können, werden wir es wissen und müssen nicht mehr spekulieren.

 

Eine weitere große Auswirkung unserer Forschung bezieht sich es auf die menschliche Ernährung. In Bezug auf uns Menschen ist es noch schwerer, Zusammenhänge zwischen Ernährung und Erkrankungen festzustellen, da wir meist erst im Alter erkranken und die Ernährung sich im Laufe eines Menschenlebens ständig verändert. Menschen neigen außerdem dazu, Fragebögen nicht ganz so ehrlich auszufüllen und die abendlichen Chips, Schokolade oder das Glas Wein nicht mit in den Fragebogen einzutragen. Das ist bei Hunden anders, da dort der Mensch das Futter zuteilt. Außerdem bleibt die Ernährung der Tiere über Monate oder gar Jahre gleich. Weil Menschen und Hunde aber ansonsten in der gleichen Umgebung leben und oftmals unter den gleichen Erkrankungen leiden, können wir Rückschlüsse auf die menschliche Ernährung ziehen. Das ist bei Laborratten nicht in dem Umfang möglich, da sie eben unter Laborbedingungen gehalten werden.

 

Bitte unterstütze uns! Dein Beitrag kann den Unterschied machen. Teile diese Aktion in Sozialen Medien und informiere andere Hundehalter, Deinen Züchter, Deinen Tierarzt oder Tierheilpraktiker, den Zooladen um die Ecke oder das örtliche Tierheim.

 

Wir sind routinierte Wissenschaftler mit einer beeindruckenden Reihe von Publikationen in den besten Fachzeitschriften für Veterinär- und Ernährungswissenschaften (siehe: http://www.dogrisk.com/publications). Wir sind stolz auf unsere Forschung und hoffen, einen Beitrag zur Gesunderhaltung unserer Hunde leisten zu können. Wir forschen für alle Hundebesitzer, Tierliebhaber und Menschen, die vielleicht unter den gleichen Erkrankungen leiden wie ihre geliebten Vierbeiner. Wir hoffen, mit unserer Forschung einen Einfluss auf die Futtermittel- und Pharmaindustrie zu nehmen. Aber das geht nur, wenn wir unabhängig forschen können und dafür brauchen wir Deine Hilfe!

Vielen Dank für Deine Unterstützung!

 

-------------------------

       And here is part of the text in Portuguese:

 

O que os cães cozinhariam; carne, gorduras, ossos, ração seca, alimentos crus,…?

Todos nós perguntamos que tipo de alimento devemos dar aos nossos animais de estimação. Ajude-nos a fazer pesquisa baseada em evidências! Financiamento colaborativo é uma forma democrática de angariar fundos para apoiar as necessidades de sua comunidade. Faça hoje sua contribuição" As dietas para cães vêm e vão. Os donos parecem entrar em discussões acaloradas sobre qual é a dieta mais saudável, qual é a mais nutritiva, qual é a mais balanceada, e por aí vão. Até o momento, não existem fatos baseados em evidências sobre isso, se uma dieta é melhor do que outra. Nós decidimos fazer algo a respeito disso: nós queremos saber! A Finlândia é um país onde você pode fazer pesquisa independente e desenvolvida em Universidades. Mas como as pesquisas são dispendiosas, nossos benefícios (perks) também são. Entretanto, o dinheiro que conseguirmos arrecadar vai direto para o projeto. Por favor, ajude-nos a continuar nossa pesquisa!

Benefício: Nossos próximos 5 artigos científicos:

Com a ajuda da sua contribuicão, nós poderemos publicar dados que temos reunido desde 2009. Mal podemos esperar por mergulhar nesses dados! Você terá acesso a cada um dos artigos em seu e-mail no mesmo dia em que eles forem publicados. Um artigo adicional, o primeiro já publicado em revista científica editada por especialistas, em cujo texto validamos parte do questionário de frequência alimentar, será enviado ao seu e-mail logo que esta campanha termine.
story_txt:
Here is the text first in English. Text in Finnish, German and Portuguese at the end.
AN IDEA:Could you or a business you know of maybe help us to promote the campaign by starting a "Give your dog friend a valentines day present - Research on their feeding!"? Then we would soon know what is healthy - and have published evidence on it!  Please?

For supporting, please press one of the perks to the right - there are some more suitable for interested owners and some more for the pet food industry. 
For larger donations and receipts; contact me on anna.hielm-bjorkman@helsinki.fi
And...if you cannot pay via a credit card (as Indiegogo no more supports pay pal); there are other ways you can help at the end of the English text. E.g. link this campaign or the dogrisk site to your friends!
 
LETS FIND OUT WHAT A DOG WOULD COOK AND EAT, IF IT COULD CHOOSE!
