story:
Mobile technology is evolving so fast that hardly anyone leaves home without a mobile device. We carry it all the time. So why wouldn’t we use it to make and (which is also important) accept payments.

Our goal was to come up with a universal mobile solution for users and vendors, which would make cash, credit card terminals, card readers and even credit cards unnecessary.

We believe we came up with a solution.

Pay or Sell anywhere with the PayFon one-tap payment mobile app. It's a simple solution for lightning-fast payments with no hidden fees, no extra hardware, and high security standards.

4 EASY STEPS TO A BETTER WAY TO PAY:


  1. Download the free PayFon app and sign up
  2. Link your debit/credit card
  3. Scan a vendor QR code and pay in one tap
  4. Confirm your purchase

EASY SETUP FOR VENDORS

Vendors can open PayFon, set a price, and generate a QR code in just a second. Once it's done, customers scan the newly made QR code right off-screen, and pay in one tap. It's as simple as it sounds.

SECURITY IN MIND

NO information is transferred between vendors and users. None of your information is stored on your phone. PCI DSS compliant servers coupled with our dedication to safety means that your information stays completely secure.

NO READERS, UNIVERSAL APPLICATION

You don't need any extra hardware for any transaction. All that's needed is a couple of Android or iOS devices running the PayFon app. Use PayFon for your e-shop, restaurant, or retail store as a quick alternative or a main payment method.

OUR FEATURES

  • Simple interface: a clean, no-frills design for simple navigation and easy payments.
  • Easy card linking: Link your card in a few seconds, remove or replace whenever you want.
  • High security: no information is transferred between devices OR stored on your phone.
  • One app for all: no separate apps for vendors and users, no more extra downloads.
  • No hidden fees: no surprises. Your card is only charged when you make a purchase.
  • Easy, fun, and convenient: one-tap payments on your phone. Leave the wallet at home.
  • Easy online retail websites integration
  • PayFon mini app - dedicated application for waiters and delivery men (incoming payments only)

PayFon is about ease of use. It's a modern payment method that only takes a few taps to set up and one tap for your customers to close the deal. By using QR codes, you can turn your mobile device  into a payment terminal that works in tandem with any customer using the PayFon app. PayFon can also be used for e-shop checkouts. Your customer just has to scan the QR code of the screen and it's just as easy and safe as an in-person transaction.

What does it mean for you?

Using PayFon to sell is just about as easy as using it to buy. Credit card machines and cash exchanges can be a hassle, and apps like Paypal Here and Square can be equally frustrating for customers and vendors alike. Whether you run a small business, an online store, or a massive corporation, PayFon will help expedite the flow of sales and keep you ahead of the curve for the future of payment methods.

 How does it work?

Once you've downloaded the PayFon app and signed up for your account, you'll have access to "receive" mode. To make a QR code for a sale, just set the transaction amount and tap “Generate QR code.” A randomly generated QR code will appear on your device and customers will scan and tap to pay. The customer is charged, you receive the funds, and the transaction is recorded on the transaction history page. It couldn't be simpler.

One-for-all:

  • The PayFon app is designed to make and accept payments
  • Both seller and buyer use same app
  • PayFon uses any phone's screen and built-in camera to exchange data

PayFon suits us all:

  • Online stores
  • Brick-and-mortar shops
  • Cafés and restaurants
  • Business on wheels (ice-cream van etc.)
  • Hot dog stands, flowers, newspapers, souvenirs
  • Taxi
  • Delivery and courier service
  • Donations and charity
  • Peer-to-peer transactions


Security:

  • No need to risk your personal info nor credit card data
  • QR code does not contain any sensitive or meaningful information
  • Non of sensitive information is being transferred during the transaction
  • PayFon app is PIN protected for extra security
  • When you set up your account, a one-time pass code is texted to your device, which links your phone number to the account for an extra layer of security

Usability:

  • Forget your wallet, plastic cards and cash at home. All you need is you phone
  • It only takes 1 or 2 taps to complete transaction
  • The seller receives funds instantly
  • No need for hardware like credit card terminals or card readers
  • Free app (iOS and Android) and easy, 2 line registration which only takes 1 minute
  • Same account is used both to receive payments and to pay for goods and services

Novelty and WOW customer experience:

  • Very easy and intuitive user interface
  • One-tap payment
  • Paying with PayFon is so cool
  • Users like the idea so they start using it right away
  • You can borrow or lend money to you friends even via Skype video call. Just show him you phone with a QR code and he will scan it right from the screen


At PayFon, security is the most important piece of the puzzle. Our dedication to your safety is apparent in our strict adherence to PCI DSS guidelines and constant attention to evolving standards.

Maximum Security for Users and Vendors

Your linked cards become completely encrypted data as soon as they enter our systems. That means that nobody (we mean nobody) has access to the card on your account, technically not even yourself. This encrypted data is stored on maximum-security, 100% PCI DSS compliant servers.

QR Codes

Vendor QR codes are randomly generated stamps that are used to form an encrypted “bridge” for payments. Nothing on a QR code dictates any information about vendors' or customers' accounts, and they cannot be used to breach any security measures. Once paid for, the QR codes are reset each time to keep each purchase exclusive and randomized.No sensitive data is transferred during a transaction.

No Swapping

Your phone acts like a card that never leaves your sight. There is no physical exchange in a PayFon transaction, so you can be sure that you're in control of your payment tool each step of the way. Your vendor or seller will bring the device and code to you, as opposed to the traditional method of taking your card or money behind the counter or out of sight at a restaurant. No more entering card numbers and private information and risking your security.

Account Pass and Pin Code

Your account is secured with a user name and password that's just as rigorously protected as your personal information. No one will have access to your account but you, and you can change your password at any time for any reason. You can set a PIN code to your app so that no one besides yourself can even open your PayFon application. When you set up your PayFon account, a one-time pass code is texted to your device, which links your phone number to the account for an extra layer of security.

If your phone is stolen or lost, you can rest easy. Two levels of security are used to bar third parties from entering your app, and your account will allow you to remotely remove or reset your card as soon as possible. 

We are a team of PayFonApp.com, and we are passionate about creating brilliant solutions for modern problems.

We've developed PayFon, in order to change the way people go about making and accepting payments. We realized that smartphones and mobile devices were evolving quickly, and we set our minds to work on an app that could help people with a daily issue.

Credit cards are inherently risky. When you use them at a restaurant, they're taken out of view; when you use them at online stores, you have to type down your credentials and risk your security. Cash can easily be stolen, and poses another financial risk when you carry it out every day. PayFon is here to change that.

Customers and businesses should feel safe when a transaction is under way, and we want both sides to have an easy way to transfer money. By using QR code technology, we've come up with a method that only requires one tap to complete and is as secure as money transactions could possibly be.

Vendors set a price, generate a code, and their customers scan it to pay. No cards or money change hands, eliminating any threats to a customers security. The transaction can be completed in just a few seconds using two mobile devices. The software is locked down and completely safe for both customer and seller, and no sensitive information is stored on your device or transferred during the sale.

Our goal is for PayFon to help people and revolutionize payment security and speed. We want push the envelope in this modern era and make positive changes for companies and customers everywhere.

We hope our product helps us all make simpler, more comfortable payments.


We will donate every single penny we collect here to a charity within 2 years out of our future proceeds. Let's help to provide protection, health care, education and nutrition to needy children in the developing nations together. 
Remember, $50 can feed a child in Africa for a year!!!

Your linked cards
become completely encrypted data as soon as they enter our systems. That
means that nobody (we mean nobody) has access to the card on your account,
technically not even yourself. This encrypted data is stored on
maximum-security, 100% PCI DSS compliant servers. 
QR
Codes
Vendor QR codes
are randomly generated stamps that are used to form an encrypted “bridge” for
payments. Nothing on a QR code dictates any information about vendors' or
customers' accounts, and they cannot be used to breach any security measures.
Once paid for, the QR codes are reset each time to keep each purchase exclusive
and randomized.No
sensitive data is transferred during a transaction.
No
Swapping
Your phone acts
like a card that never leaves your sight. There is no physical exchange in a PayFon
transaction, so you can be sure that you're in control of your payment tool
each step of the way. Your vendor or seller will bring the device and code to
you, as opposed to the traditional method of taking your card or money behind
the counter or out of sight at a restaurant. No more entering card numbers and private
information and risking your security.
Account
Pass and Pin Code
Your account is
secured with a user name and password that's just as rigorously protected as
your personal information. No one will have access to your account but you, and
you can change your password at any time for any reason. You can set a PIN code
to your app so that no one besides yourself can even open your PayFon application.
When you set up your PayFon account, a one-time pass code is texted to your
device, which links your phone number to the account for an extra layer of
security.
If your phone is stolen or lost, you can rest
easy. Two levels of security are used to bar third parties from entering your
app, and your account will allow you to remotely remove or reset your card as
soon as possible. 





We are a team of PayFonApp.com, and we are passionate about creating brilliant solutions
for modern problems.
We've developed PayFon, in order to change the way people go about making and accepting payments.
We realized that smartphones and mobile devices were evolving quickly, and we
set our minds to work on an app that could help people with a daily issue.
Credit cards are inherently risky.
When you use them at a restaurant, they're taken out of view; when you use them
at online stores, you have to type down your credentials and risk your
security. Cash can easily be stolen, and poses another financial risk when you
carry it out every day. PayFon is here to change that.
Customers and businesses should feel
safe when a transaction is under way, and we want both sides to have an easy
way to transfer money. By using QR code technology, we've come up with a method
that only requires one tap to complete and is as secure as money transactions
could possibly be.
Vendors set a
price, generate a code, and their customers scan it to pay. No cards or money
change hands, eliminating any threats to a customers security. The transaction
can be completed in just a few seconds using two mobile devices. The software
is locked down and completely safe for both customer and seller, and no sensitive information
is stored on your device or transferred during the sale.
Our goal is for PayFon
to help people and revolutionize payment security and speed. We want push the
envelope in this modern era and make positive changes for companies and
customers everywhere.
We hope our
product helps us all make simpler, more comfortable payments.









We will donate every single penny we collect here to a charity within 2 years out of our future proceeds. Let's help to provide protection, health care, education and nutrition to needy children in the developing nations together. 

Remember, $50 can feed a child in Africa for a year!!!

story:
The Founder

Moody Demetry is an Egyptian American who spent his adolescence in Egypt. At the age of 19, decided to travel to the States in 1996 to finish his studies. Since his move, Mr. Demetry has been volunteering with many organizations in the U.S (Egypt Negma, Egypt Rise, and Big brother big sister and many more) giving him valuable experience to lead a grassroots movement and motivate others to join in at the ground level of something remarkable and transformational in the lives of young women in Egypt.

In 2013, having seen first hand how education in the U.S empowers people and changes lives, Mr. Demetry started his initiative “Heya Masr” (She is Egypt). His belief in the power of education motivated him to invest in the lives of Egyptian young women.  He believes that the educational activities provided by Heya Masr will foster the growth and development of strong character for those young women of Egypt that participate in this program . Many of these girls reside in slums and do not have access to education, while many others who have dropped out of school. We believe in the potential of each and every girl and with proper support, guidance, and education, she can fully reach her potential.


The need for Heya Masr!

Why Heya Masr? The statistics for Egypt are a powerful reason,. based on 2011 UN report.

  • 97% of women were subject to some type of sexual harassment 
  • Approximately 1 in 4  girls are victims of physical violence. 
  • Sexual abuse of children represents 18% of the total incidences related to children. 
  • For 53% of incidents the offender is a child's relatives, and in 45% of cases there is no family relationship. 
  • 48.5% of women aged 25-46 years old facing the risk of developing high blood pressure.
  • From 2010 to 2012  more than 26,000 children dropouts from basic education. Of the 26,000,  76% of the drop outs were girls. 
  • 2.3% of adolescent girls are married and 12% are in the process of getting married. There was more than 40,000 cases of underage marriage, resulting in 150 thousand births from these adolescent girls.

     [TS1]What year?

Why is Heya Masr different and unique? 

Our efforts are unique because we rely on UN studies* that report behavior changes take place at an earlier age and equip women with mechanisms to empower themselves against the negative impact of extreme deprivation, abuse, and other adversities they face during their formative years.  In this way, we believe we adopt a proactive strategy rather than a reactive one. We believe empowering women during adolescence to be stronger, stable, more confident, and independent will impact the future generations of Egypt and will reduce these numbers of abused, and drop outs. 

What is Heya Masr impact to date?

Though our 2 years old initiative, we have developed a long term program that is focused on character development building and emotional intelligence education.  Our goal is to develop strong and healthy minds and valuable critical skills to develop healthy nutritional habits and raise sexual harassment awareness. This is achieved in part with 
self-defense basic training to boost self-confidence and self esteem. 

We believe this program is a key point to build a well rounded personality that challenge the present circumstances and builds a better future for girls and for Egypt. We are currently focusing on girls in the slums and underprivileged areas in Cairo and Giza ages 9 to 18 years old. We are working towards a vision to expand in all areas of Egypt. Our program runs for 9 months to create a permanent character life transformation. In the past year we graduated four classes and reached to 60 girls. Moreover, our impact doesn't stop at the girls, those girls who graduate from our program, go back to their homes and communities and impact them as well.  Please check out our website: Heya Masr Classes.

Why we need your help!

During the past two years the initiative has been running with personal funds that the founder and his team pledged to support the cause.   Now, four classes have graduated with many success stories~ Please check out our success stories.

Your contribution will help us move forward with the next phase:

  • to expand our classes from four to six  classes 
  • to reach and empower more girls, expanding to 200 girls. 
  • to expand with more qualified trainers.
  • to provide enough tools and supplies for classes.
Your contribution will:
  • Help us expand and reach more girls.
  • Empower more girls to speak up for themselves and communicate effectively.
  • Impact the community and transform the culture 
  • Educate the girls on healthy nutritional habits.
  • Strengthen and equip the girls to stand up for themselves against sexual harassment.
  • Rewarding the girls by supporting their dreams to reach the potential that they poses inside of them.

What We Need & What You Get

contribution will be used for the following: 

  • Nonprofit registration: 30,0000 egp ~ $4200 
  • Rent a location to be used as training facility 20,000 egp ~ $2800
  • Two full time staff: 48,000 egp ~$6000 
  • Tools for classes 15,000 egp ~ $2000 
We are asking for your support and for your help as we make the change is needed to improve the lives of many girls and to pave the road for better future for them and for the country as a whole. for more picture check out our website gallery. 

Perks

For your contributions we will send items to express our appreciation and thanks. Personal picture cards signed by the girls themselves along with a thank you notes will be included with tshirts, and pins and even personal recognition interview on our website and all our social media.

Our Team

Our team is a very committed team of volunteers. They are all very educated and experienced working with young girls on many issues like harassment and sexual abuse. They build a personal relationship with each and every girl in order to create mutual trust that builds character and motives them to communicate

effectively. 

Please see our website for team members bios


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute financially at this time, we still welcome your support in the following ares:

  • Please get word out and make some noise about our effort and campaign.
  • Please use  the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Thank you!

They are all very educated and experienced working with young girls on many issues like harassment and sexual abuse. They build a personal relationship with each and every girl in order to create mutual trust that builds character and motives them to communicate effectively. 

Please see our website for team members bios




Other Ways You Can Help



If you cannot contribute financially at this time, we still welcome your support in the following ares:

Please use  the Indiegogo share tools!


And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

Appealing for support for the three Zubair children in Lahore who suffer from Muscular Dystrophy and are in dire need of medical diagnosis and treatment.

What would you do if someone told you that all three of your children have a rare and sometimes fatal genetic disorder and that they will be confined to wheelchairs for the rest of their lives? We are the Zubairs and all three of our children have Muscular Dystrophy. We need your help. Support us in finding the best available treatment and management options for our children. Learn more. www.miracleforthree.com

What We Need & What You Get

 

We need help in meeting the children’s ongoing needs and are hoping to take our children to U.S. for Scoliosis Surgery and participating in latest research going . at some point to have them participate in  several of the ongoing MD trials and gene therapies underway. We are also looking into getting Scoliosis surgery for Nida which is very costly. Please help us by donating. Click on the button below to learn of the various ways in which you can help.

Donate Online

We have partnered with Indiegogo to raise funds for the children. It accepts all major credit cards. Remember every penny counts. Please help us meet our goal by notifying your friends and families. Click on the button below to donate online.For another way to support us, please consider donating to our banks in Pakistan.

Standard Chartered Bank

Branch Code: 138
PECO Road Branch
893-D Block, Faisal Town, Peco Road
Lahore, Pakistan

Account Title: Shahid Zubair 

Account # 01222499201

IBAN No. PK70SCBL0000001222499201

Lahore, Pakistan 

UBL Bank Johar Town Branch
Branch Code: 1937
Lahore, Pakistan
Account Title: Shahid Zubair 
Account # 1937-0100779-2
Swift Code: UNILPKKA028

We thank you for your support and contribution.

Other Ways to Support

Please know that we are open to any ideas and suggestions that can get us the timely help we need. For those of you who are parents, you understand our desperation and the urgency with which we need the diagnosis and treatment for our children.

For questions, suggestions or concerns, please contact me at the information below.

Tel: 0092-300-8424479
Email: info@miracleforthree.com

story:
Fundraising Overview

We are running this campaign to ask for your help to raise funds to increase our manufacturing capabilities to produce the thousands of charms needed to support people's dreams and goals. I have worked night and day on MyDagaz™ for two years and I am very passionate about what it represents and how we can help others. My family and I appreciate your support and patronage, and hope you enjoy what we have to offer.

Sincerely,
Rolf Heitmann
Founder/CEO MyDagaz


MyDagaz™ Intro

The ultimate goal of MyDagaz™ is to assist and support you achieve happiness, and we firmly believe this will happen by achieving YOUR dreams and goals in life. We want to help, support and encourage you to make this happen, and below you can find you how we will do this, and why it is so important!


"Remember Your Dreams?!" - MyDagaz™ Slogan

We are not trying to tell you what your goals are or should be, and nobody else should for that matter, it is all about YOU and achieving YOUR goals to make you feel better about yourself, your life and feel inner satisfaction and fulfillment.
Our slogan "Remember Your Dreams?!" is our way of saying please don't forget about yourself. It is both a question and a statement:  We are asking if you actually do "remember your dreams?", but we are also telling you to "remember your dreams!".

The font you see in the MyDagaz™ slogan is the MyDagaz™ font we created to emulate a modern day Rune inscription.


It's About "Not Forgetting" Your Goals and Dreams

Life is so hectic and stressful and it is so easy to put your own needs and desires on the shelf, and we want you to brush them off and keep thinking about them.
Whatever your goals and dreams are, MyDagaz™ is here to help and support you in your quest for a happier existence. We are not saying it will be easy or happen quickly, but with our support and encouragement (and the ever present goal reminder bracelet), it will happen!

We consider the MyDagaz™ Goal Reminder bracelet to be a critical part of our approach. It is a physical, ever present reminder of the goals you have set for yourself and decided you want to pursue.

With the Goal Reminder Bracelet on your wrist, it will always let you know when you are doing something contrary to the goals you have set for yourself. A good example is opening up a chocolate bar when you are on a diet - the Goal Reminder Bracelet and the Milestone Charms will certainly remind you of the wrong you are doing to yourself and "serve up" a good portion a guilt, hopefully enough to make you rethink the chocolate bar and find something healthier to eat. Having used the bracelet for almost a year, I can tell you that it works exactly as it was intended, which is also the feedback we have received from others as well,

The bracelet is very solid and at first you will notice its presence on your wrist, but like with any other jewelry you wear, your body will get used to is and stop noticing it. The milestone charms however, are designed to NOT allow you to forget their presence, yet not be intrusive or annoying to you. With their with their extremely light weight, they will feel like an ever so gentle brush against your skin, not unlike what a gentle gust of wind feels against your skin. If you shake your wrist vigorously, the charms will also make a subtle little noises when they hit the Goal Reminder Bracelet. No matter what you do though, you will barely notice the presence of all the milestone charms.


The Science Behind The Bracelets and Charms

The MyDagaz™ Goal Reminder bracelet works - no question about it, but how and why? The bracelet does not utilize technology, electronics or magic, and neither do the milestone charms. The "secret" or "science" behind MyDagaz™ is in the totality of what we do, and only when all the elements of the bracelet, charms, the online support community and the goal tracking tools are combined, we believe success if inevitable!

The Goal Reminder Bracelet is an unobtrusive, subtle and perpetual reminder that will not let you forget about your goals and dreams. The bracelets are made of high quality stainless steel and double linked to be "tough" enough to withstand constant usage and stand up to the elements. The latch is made of stainless steel with the MyDagaz™ logo, and the latch is very strong and will stand up to the "abuse" dished out from daily use. The design is also "hair" friendly and will not tug on any arm hair!

Charms are made of acrylic glass (plexiglass) and specifically designed to be very strong, scratch resistant, virtually fade resistant and extremely light weight, so you can have dozens of milestone charms on the bracelet without it getting heavy, annoying or cumbersome to wear. They have a spring loaded clasp that enables them to easily be attched to the bracelet. The extremely light weight charms gently brushes your skin and works by triggering a sensory perception that at times works on an unconscious level (meaning you are not even aware that it is happening).

It is our goal to support and help anyone's dreams or goals with our charms, whatever they might be. There will be thousands of charms available in the various milestone categories we have identified so far:
  1. Weight Loss milestone charms category
  2. Cessation milestone charms category
  3. Medical & Health milestone charms category
  4. Travel milestone charms category
  5. Bucket List milestone charms category
  6. Sports milestone charms category
  7. Financial milestone charms category
  8. Anniversaries milestone charms category
  9. Spiritual & Religious milestone charms category
  10. Education milestone charms category
  11. Custom milestone charms category

The Secret Behind Our Approach

The MyDagaz main mission is to support our members in reaching their goals and dreams in life, and we do this by providing online tools, a superior support community and by wearing our Goal Reminder Bracelet and Milestone Charms. The online support community is there to help and encourage our members during trying times and when life slumps or hits a low. We feel it is critical to have someone to talk to when this happens because we all know life always has some surprises in store for us. Although the online support is important, we firmly believe the most critical piece in achieving success is using the Goal Reminder Bracelet, as it is always with you as a constant reminder.

We have described the shape and designs for the Goal Reminder Bracelet and the Milestone Charms, but it is only when we combine these physical objects with our unique and patent pending methodology, that success is the likely outcome. Unlike the typical approach where you receive a reward when you reach a milestone, our approach is completely opposite and provides significantly more motivation and inspiration.

The MyDagaz™ approach using the bracelet and the milestone charms, is to place all the charms on the bracelet when you start pursuing a goal or a dream, and then remove charms as you reach the various milestones. This might seem trivial at first glance, but the benefits of this method are significant and multiple:

  • Psychological: The simple fact that all milestone charms are present from the very beginning, is a strong motivational factor because you can see all the steps that are needed to accomplish to reach your goal. The presence of all the charms and the desire to remove or reduce the number of charms (which subconsciously represents "road blocks" between you and your goal/happiness), provides a much stronger desire to win or accomplish this task than the opposite method of motivating yourself to "win" or accomplish the reward of receiving another charm.
  • Physical: With all the charms on the bracelet at the beginning of the pursuit of a dream or goal, the larger number of charms provide a stronger physical reminder with the gentle brushes of multiple milestone charms touching your skin. The sensation they create is still extremely subtle, but more noticeable which is extremely beneficial when starting pursuing a brand new goal.
  • Visual: With all the charms in place at the beginning of a goal pursuit, there is an undeniable visual effect from the colorful charms on your wrist. Again, it is almost impossible to ignore this strong, but unobtrusive reminder of your own promise to yourself.
This approach, combined with the use of our specially designed bracelets and charms, delivers a significantly stronger motivation as all the milestones you need to accomplish as always visible,


Avoid Regrets, Achieve Goals, Enjoy Happiness

MyDagaz™ is all about helping you focus and achieve on your dreams and life goals at this moment in time, but we also want you to avoid regrets later in life. People in their twilight years often reflect on their lives and the regrets they have, and we want to help you avoid these regrets by being conscious about the things you want to change or improve on, and actively work on making those changes.

On a personal note and while working on this particular segment, I could not help myself and I asked my 78 year old mom if she had any regrets in life, and asked her to be as honest as possible. She answered "my biggest regret is not being able to spend more time with you and your kids". It is very hard for me not to tear up when I think about this, but the feeling is so mutual mom and its not too late!  One of my top goals in life is to spend more time with my mom and brother that live on the other side of the Atlantic Ocean.

Nobody wants to live with regrets, but I dare say we all have them and MyDagaz wants to help you focus on your goals to avoid this! Believe it or not, the list of regrets below is just a small sample of the ones listed on numerous sites, and the ones below are listed in no particular order:

  • Been happier more. Not taken life so seriously
  • Wish I had lived my own life rather than how society taught me to live.
  • Gone on more trips with the family/friends
  • Not visiting a dying friend before he died
  • Wish I discovered my purpose earlier
  • Taught my kids to do stuff more
  • I wish I had taken more risks
  • Not asking that girl/boy out
  • Wish I had taken better care of myself
  • Not getting that degree (high school or college)
  • Wish I’d allowed myself to love
  • Spending more time with the kids/family
  • Wish I had touched more lives and inspired more people
  • Working so much at the expense of family and friendships
  • Standing up to bullies in school and in life
  • Stayed in touch with good friends from my childhood and youth
  • Turned off my phone more/Left my phone at home
  • Worrying about what others thought about me so much
  • Not having enough confidence in myself
There is NO reason for you to have regrets later in life! Even if you don't succeed 100% of the time,  you have to keep trying and do the best you can, and MyDagaz is the solution you are seeking. At the very core of our belief, we know that if you can accomplish your goals and dreams, you will become a happier individual, feel better about yourself and more satisfied with your life. Ultimately, this helps you achieve a greater "inner peace" and will positively impact your health and outlook on life.


A Happy Person = Endless Life and Health Benefits!

MyDagaz wants you to focus more on yourself and your dreams and goals, because we believe that will make you a happier and a more self fulfilled person. Besides, who doesn't want to be happy?! Being happy not only makes you feel good and positively affects your interaction with the surroundings, it has a profound impact on your productivity, health and well-being too.

Brain Health

Numerous studies show that happiness has a significant and lasting impact on your health, and it directly affects your brain: Negative mood variance disturbs your interaction with your environment, affecting your ability to perceive, remember, and reinforce existing or create new neural connections, while being happy improves your ability to be more cognitively alert and productive. Other than being much more fun to be around, being happy:

  • stimulates the growth of nerve connections.
  • improves cognition by increasing mental productivity.
  • improves your ability to analyze and think.
  • affects your view of surroundings.
  • increases attentiveness.
  • leads to more happy thoughts.

Happy people are more creative, solve problems faster, and tend to be more mentally alert. [Source: Psychology Today]

Longer Life

Being happy doesn't just improve the quality of your life. According to a new study, it may increase the quantity of your life as well. Older people were up to 35% less likely to die during the five-year study if they reported feeling happy, excited, and content on a typical day. And this was true even though the researchers took factors such as chronic health problems, depression, and financial security out of the equation.

"We had expected that we might see a link between how happy people felt over the day and their future mortality, but we were struck by how strong the effect was," says Andrew Steptoe, Ph.D., the lead author of the study and a professor of psychology at University College London, in the United Kingdom.
[Source: Health Magazine 2015]

People who consider themselves happy, have:
  • a lower heart rate
  • Lower levels of the stress hormone cortisol
  • Lower concentrations of a plasma associated with heart disease
  • According to an analysis of 30 studies, happy people are less likely to get sick
  • When exposed to the virus that causes colds and flu, people with a more positive outlook not only get sick less often, but recover faster.
  • In a study of stressed-out law students, optimistic people had more immune-boosting blood cells than their pessimistic peers.
  • People who are happy because they feel their lives have meaning and purpose (helping others for example), experience healthy changes at the cellular level.
  • Among older people, optimists have a 77% lower risk of heart disease than do pessimists. Researchers believe this is because optimists are better able to negotiate life's stressors without becoming irritated.
  • An analysis of 30 studies found that happiness adds several years to a person's life. The actual number of years could be as much as 7 1/2 years.
    [Source: happify.com]

Stress Reducer

Feedback from people using the bracelet have said it absolutely works as intended and more or less becomes a part of you. No matter how stressed you get, it doesn't let you forget about the promises you made to yourself. Several people have reported that being reminded of, and focusing on their goals and dreams had a calming effect at times of high stress situations.


Key Website Features

Online Support Community

The MyDagaz™ Online Support Community is also a powerful social networking platform on the MyDagaz™ website designed to allow all MyDagaz™ members to interact and support each other in addition to our dedicated personnel. This is a very powerful tool which will keep our members motivated and somewhere to turn when "life happens" and you need someone to lean on for support and encouragement to keep you going. The Community is the main source of support and collaboration between members and MyDagaz support personnel are there to help each other achieve their goals.


Online Personal Goal Manager

The Goal Manager is your online tool for tracking and managing your goals, milestones and self-imposed deadlines and timelines. This is an important tool that helps you keep It also offers other features to help you get rid of bad habits and other vices.

There are 3 great dashboards allowing users easily to keep all their goals, plans and habits under control:

  1. Today. It provides you quick access to all your goals, plans and habits set for today.
  2. Goals & Plans. It shows you all goals and plans with all your achievements.
  3. Habits. It displays all your habits and their history with habits graph. To check your habits for certain period of time quickly, you can use comfortable week navigation.

Online Chat

To ensure the best possible service to our members, we offer an online chat option in addition to using the Online Support Community. The online chat is available during normal East Coast US business hours, but we plan to expand the hours as soon as we can and eventually we want to offer 24/7 support.




Who We are and Why We Made It

The idea behind MyDagaz™ was born an evening in 2013 when my wife and I were talking about how hard it is to stay focused on a goal when "life happens". Being parents, working and always stressed, tired and exhausted, you always took care of everything else first and when it came time to think about what would make yourself happy (besides instant gratification through food and snacks), we were "zombies in front of the TV or asleep". "In the day to day life there was no time to think about yourself and your needs". This didn't happen overnight and was a gradual process over many years. If only there was a way to be reminded of what is important to you so you can work towards your dreams and goals and make them happen - even if it takes time. In a nutshell, this is how the seed to MyDagaz™ was born.

The Founder of MyDagaz™ is Rolf Heitmann, a seasoned entrepreneur and IT executive with a broad technology background as well. Rolf lives in Rhode Island USA, but has roots in and grew up in Norway where he became familiar with the ancient Viking runes, and this is how MyDagaz™ received its name. Rolf is a very enthusiastic driving force and believes in MyDagaz™ and its mission to help people become happier and live a more fulfilled life, He has personally executed, managed or overseen every aspect of the creation of MyDagaz™ and its services and offerings.

The Dagaz rune is a very "positively charged" symbol and MyDagaz™™ is a modern take on ancient beliefs transforming dreams and goals to realize a positive outcome, happiness in life and inner balance. For thousands of years, it was strongly believed that the Dagaz symbol brings a positive outcome to any situation that is of concern.


What We Need & What You Get

We have invested substantial time, money and efforts in the last years to research, design and develop the MyDagaz™ concept. We worked with industrial designers and engineers, graphic designers, user interface designers and the best creative minds to come up with a solution that we believe will serve our customers extremely well. We have completed a full manufacturing cycle and and have produced approximately 30 different charms in very small quantities in the weight loss category (maroon colored charms) and basic starter charms like the Start Charm, Half Way Charm and the Goal Reached Charm in most categories.

The charms are made in the USA, and we have already started working on improving manufacturing processes to enable larger scale production. Due to the large number of unique charms, we can not mass produce the charms, and in order to minimize cost and maximize flexibility in creating custom charms (and on short notice), all charms are made in-house.

We are ready to start manufacturing the thousands of different charms needed to help people with their goals, and for this we need your help in raising the needed funds for the following tasks:

  • Acquire 8 water-cooled, three-axis CNC machines capable of performing high-speed micro engraving/cutting operations. A CNC controller and a desktop PC with milling software is needed for each CNC machine. Estimated cost is US $4,500 each with a total cost of US $36,000.


  • Acquire charm raw material sheets in eleven different colors, lobster clasps, jumper rings and protective films for the charm front and back surfaces, Estimated total cost is US $14,000.

  • Acquire miscellaneous equipment to support the manufacturing process: engraving/cutting tool bits for the CNC machines, vacuum pumps for vacuum tables, water pumps, spindle vacuum systems for engraving debris collection. Estimated total cost is US $9,000
We are really excited about the deals and perks we can offer you in return for supporting us! We are offering discounts on memberships, bracelets, charms, and various package offerings containing all of these items. The crown jewel in our collection of perks is the LIFETIME membership option we are exclusively offering during this crowdfunding campaign and is never again to be offered.

Should we not be able to raise the entire amount we are seeking, we will need to scale back accordingly and. The critical task right now is to create as many charms as we can to help as many  people as possible with their goals and dreams. On the other hand, should we raise more funds than we are asking for, it will be used to secure a suitable location for manufacturing and warehouse for the products.


Frequently Asked Questions

What is MyDagaz™?

MyDagaz™ is a family owned company and the world's first to offer motivational bracelets and charms designed specifically to help you reach your goals - whatever they are! MyDagaz™ is membership based and relies on memberships to fund staff, technology and support growth. MyDagaz™ consists of two main elements;
  • The Online Support Community and a set of tools to help you track and manage the goals and dreams you have decided you want to focus on. The Online Support Community consists of MyDagaz™ staff and all the other MyDagaz™ members, and the sole purpose of the community is to offer support and encouragement to each other when life becomes challenging it is becomes difficult focusing on their goals and dreams.
  • The Goal Reminder bracelet is a critical piece to succeeding, and the bracelet's main function is to keep reminding you of the promises you made to yourself, i.e. the goals and dreams you decided to pursue. Members should wear the bracelet with the milestone charms so they at a glance can see where they stand and how far they have to go before reaching their goal. The charms provides subtle and soft reminders to the member so they don't forget.

The membership fees are purposefully kept extremely low and will be kept that way as we do not want this to be a financial burden. Unfortunately, many people cannot afford even a low membership fee, and we do offer assistance to low income families.

How does it work?

There are many ways to use the charms and we do not want to discourage anyone from being creative. There are some proven ways to doing it and we will outline those here as well as discuss different ways of using them in our Blog.

The bracelet is made of stainless steel and will survive most environments as it is intended to be worn 24/7. You might find it difficult to sleep with the bracelet on or prefer taking it off when showering, and of course you should take it off when you want to. It is important though to keep it on as much as possible as it is your constant reminder of the goals you have set for yourself.

Recommended use of the charms is to attach all milestone charms for a particular goal and then remove charms as you reach milestones. We designed the bracelet and the charms to work together to keep reminding you of your dreams and goals without being overbearing or annoying. The charms are made of acrylic glass which is very strong, yet extremely light weight and adding dozens of charms will barely impact the weight. We believe placing all the charms when you start pursuing a dream or goal is the most inspirational, not only because you clearly can see all the milestones you need to accomplish before you reach your goal, but all the charms provide a stronger, yet extremely gentle, soft and soothing touch to the skin to make sure you do not forget what is important to you.

The MyDagaz™ Online Support Community is a social networking platform on the MyDagaz™ website designed to allow all MyDagaz™ members to interact and support each other in addition to our dedicated personnel. This is a very powerful tool which will keep our members motivated and somewhere to turn when "life happens" and you need someone to lean on for support and encouragement to keep you going. The Community is the main source of support and collaboration between members and MyDagaz support personnel are there to help each other achieve their goals.

The FAQ section is where we post answers to the most frequently asked questions to help newcomers as well as existing members.

The Blog is another tool we use to help members with questions they might have and categorize the answers according to topic.

The Goal Manager is your online tool for tracking and managing your goals, milestones and self-imposed deadlines and timelines. This is an important tool that helps you keep It also offers other features to help you get rid of bad habits and other vices.

Why is it important to pursue goals and dreams?

Being happy doesn't just improve the quality of your life. According to a new study, it may increase the quantity of your life as well. Older people were up to 35% less likely to die during the five-year study if they reported feeling happy, excited, and content on a typical day. And this was true even though the researchers took factors such as chronic health problems, depression, and financial security out of the equation.

In other words, it is not only important to achieve your goals and dreams to feel better about yourself, achieve life fulfillment, inner peace and satisfaction, it has a direct impact on your health and you will live longer!

Ok - life is "getting in the way", what now?

When life "gets in your way" or difficulties in life are mounting, thinking about your own needs, desires or dreams are typically the last thing on your mind. It is unfortunate, but the reality that you set aside yourself and forget your own dreams when "life happens". The bracelet is there to remind you of your goals, and we have been told that thinking about your goals and dreams has a calming effect during stressful situations. The bracelet should help you keep your happy thoughts close by at all times, but we also want you to use the online community as a resource for communicating with others potentially having gone though what you are experiencing, listen and maybe personal advice to help work through difficult life situations.

What is the MyDagaz™ bracelet and charms made of?

The bracelet is made of stainless steel and will survive most environments as it is intended to be worn 24/7. You might find it difficult to sleep with the bracelet on or prefer taking it off when showering, and of course you should take it off when you want to. It is important though to keep it on as much as possible as it is your constant reminder of the goals you have set for yourself.

Recommended use of the charms is to attach all milestone charms for a particular goal and then remove charms as you reach milestones. We designed the bracelet and the charms to work together to keep reminding you of your dreams and goals without being overbearing or annoying. The charms are made of acrylic glass which is very strong, yet extremely light weight and adding dozens of charms will barely impact the weight. We believe placing all the charms when you start pursuing a dream or goal is the most inspirational, not only because you clearly can see all the milestones you need to accomplish before you reach your goal, but all the charms provide a stronger, yet extremely gentle, soft and soothing touch to the skin to make sure you do not forget what is important to you.

What is the size of the MyDagaz™ bracelet?

We currently have two bracelets: one is a men's bracelet, which is wider and thicker than the feminine women's bracelet. The bracelets will be stocked in the following sizes:
Women's bracelet lengths:
5",    5 1/2",    6",    6 1/2",    7",    7 1/2",    8",    8 1/2",     9"    and    9 1/2"

Men's bracelet lengths:
6",    6 1/2",    7",    7 1/2",    8",    8 1/2",     9",    9 1/2",    10"    and    10 1/2"

Who are you?

The Co-Founders of MyDagaz™ are Kelly and Rolf Heitmann, both seasoned IT executives with Rolf having a broad technology background as well. Rolf, having roots in and growing up in Norway, was familiar with the ancient Viking runes, that is how MyDagaz™ received its name.

Risks & Challenges

Since we have already completed a full production cycle of the weight loss charms and have learned the hard way what pitfalls there are, we are confident that moving into a larger scale production environment will be a smooth one. We are also very aware that with a larger scale production, we still have to be diligent with quality control to ensure the highest quality products. We have also minimized the risk of running out of materials by identifying multiple vendors that can deliver the necessary materials we need, and as we ramp up production we will also make sure we have necessary spare parts to minimize downtime during production.

Other Ways You Can Help

Of course backing our project by selecting one of the perks we offer is a very effective way to support our project and we are very grateful for that. We do understand however that backing is not always an option for everyone and we appreciate any other help one would be generously willing to offer.
Our main challenge is spreading the word and here are a few effective ways to support this effort:

  • Share the MyDagaz™ images or link on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Instagram, tumblr or any other social network you subscribe to
  • Forward the link and the information by email to your friends and acquaintance and ask them to do the same
  • Tell us about blogs or other media channels that could be interested in writing or talking about the MyDagaz™. We will be happy to reach out and provide them with everything they need to spread the word.
story_txt:
Fundraising Overview

We are running this campaign to ask for your help to raise funds to increase our manufacturing capabilities to produce the thousands of charms needed to support people's dreams and goals. I have worked night and day on MyDagaz™ for two years and I am very passionate about what it represents and how we can help others. My family and I appreciate your support and patronage, and hope you enjoy what we have to offer.

Sincerely,
Rolf Heitmann
Founder/CEO MyDagaz

MyDagaz™ Intro
The ultimate goal of MyDagaz™ is to assist and support you achieve happiness, and we firmly believe this will happen by achieving YOUR dreams and goals in life. We want to help, support and encourage you to make this happen, and below you can find you how we will do this, and why it is so important!"Remember Your Dreams?!" - MyDagaz™ Slogan
We are not trying to tell you what your goals are or should be, and nobody else should for that matter, it is all about YOU and achieving YOUR goals to make you feel better about yourself, your life and feel inner satisfaction and fulfillment.Our slogan "Remember Your Dreams?!" is our way of saying please don't forget about yourself. It is both a question and a statement:  We are asking if you actually do "remember your dreams?", but we are also telling you to "remember your dreams!".
The font you see in the MyDagaz™ slogan is the MyDagaz™ font we created to emulate a modern day Rune inscription.It's About "Not Forgetting" Your Goals and Dreams
Life is so hectic and stressful and it is so easy to put your own needs and desires on the shelf, and we want you to brush them off and keep thinking about them.Whatever your goals and dreams are, 
	MyDagaz™ is here to help and support you in your quest for a happier existence. We are not saying it will be easy or happen quickly, but with our support and encouragement (and the ever present goal reminder bracelet), it will happen!We consider the MyDagaz™ Goal Reminder bracelet to be a critical part of our approach. It is a physical, ever present reminder of the goals you have set for yourself and decided you want to pursue.



With the Goal Reminder Bracelet on your wrist, it will always let you know when you are doing something contrary to the goals you have set for yourself. A good example is opening up a chocolate bar when you are on a diet - the Goal Reminder Bracelet and the Milestone Charms will certainly remind you of the wrong you are doing to yourself and "serve up" a good portion a guilt, hopefully enough to make you rethink the chocolate bar and find something healthier to eat. Having used the bracelet for almost a year, I can tell you that it works exactly as it was intended, which is also the feedback we have received from others as well,

The bracelet is very solid and at first you will notice its presence on your wrist, but like with any other jewelry you wear, your body will get used to is and stop noticing it. The milestone charms however, are designed to NOT allow you to forget their presence, yet not be intrusive or annoying to you. With their with their extremely light weight, they will feel like an ever so gentle brush against your skin, not unlike what a gentle gust of wind feels against your skin. If you shake your wrist vigorously, the charms will also make a subtle little noises when they hit the Goal Reminder Bracelet. No matter what you do though, you will barely notice the presence of all the milestone charms.The Science Behind The Bracelets and Charms
The 
	MyDagaz™ Goal Reminder bracelet works - no question about it, but how and why? The 
bracelet does not utilize technology, electronics or magic, and neither do the milestone charms. The "secret" or "science" behind MyDagaz™ is in the totality of what we do, and only when all the elements of the bracelet, charms, the online support community and the goal tracking tools are combined, we believe success if inevitable!
The Goal Reminder Bracelet is an unobtrusive, subtle and
 perpetual reminder that will not let you forget about your goals and 
dreams.  The bracelets are made 
of high quality stainless steel and double linked to be "tough" 
enough to withstand constant usage and stand up to the elements. The latch is made of stainless steel with the MyDagaz™ logo, and the latch is very strong and will stand up to the "abuse" dished out from daily use. The design is also "hair" friendly and will 
not tug on any arm hair!Charms are made of acrylic glass (plexiglass) and specifically 
designed to be very strong, scratch resistant, virtually fade resistant and extremely light weight,
 so you can have dozens of milestone charms on the bracelet without it 
getting heavy, annoying or cumbersome to wear. They have a spring loaded clasp that enables them to easily be attched to the bracelet. The 
extremely light weight charms gently brushes your skin and works by 
triggering a sensory perception that at times works on an unconscious 
level (meaning you are not even aware that it is happening).

	It is our goal to support and help anyone's dreams 
	or goals with our charms, whatever they might be. There will be thousands of charms available in the various milestone categories we have identified so far:

Weight Loss milestone charms category

Cessation milestone charms category

	Medical & Health milestone charms category

	Travel milestone charms category

	Bucket List milestone charms category

	Sports milestone charms category

	Financial milestone charms category

	Anniversaries milestone charms category

	Spiritual & Religious milestone charms category

	Education milestone charms category

	Custom milestone charms category

The Secret Behind Our Approach


The MyDagaz main mission is to support our members in reaching their goals and dreams in life, and we do this by providing online tools, a superior support community and by wearing our Goal Reminder Bracelet and Milestone Charms. The online support community is there to help and encourage our members during trying times and when life slumps or hits a low. We feel it is critical to have someone to talk to when this happens because we all know life always has some surprises in store for us. Although the online support is important, we firmly believe the most critical piece in achieving success is using the Goal Reminder Bracelet, as it is always with you as a constant reminder.We have described the 
shape and designs for the Goal Reminder Bracelet and the Milestone 
Charms, but it is only when we combine these physical objects with our 
unique and patent pending methodology, that success is the likely outcome. 
Unlike the typical approach where you receive a reward when you reach a 
milestone, our approach is completely opposite and provides 
significantly more motivation and inspiration.

The MyDagaz™ approach using the bracelet and the milestone charms, is to place all the charms on the
 bracelet when you start pursuing a goal or a dream, and then remove 
charms as you reach the various milestones. This might seem trivial at first glance, 
but the benefits of this method are significant and multiple:

Psychological: The simple fact that all milestone charms are 
present from the very beginning, is a strong motivational factor because
 you can see all the steps that are needed to accomplish to reach your 
goal. The presence of all the charms and the desire to remove or reduce 
the number of charms (which subconsciously represents "road blocks" 
between you and your goal/happiness), provides a much stronger desire to
 win or accomplish this task than the opposite method of motivating 
yourself to "win" or accomplish the reward of receiving another charm.

Physical: With all the charms on the bracelet at the beginning of
 the pursuit of a dream or goal, the larger number of charms provide a 
stronger physical reminder with the gentle brushes of multiple milestone
 charms touching your skin. The sensation they create is still extremely
 subtle, but more noticeable which is extremely beneficial when starting
 pursuing a brand new goal.

Visual: With all the charms in place at the beginning of a goal 
pursuit, there is an undeniable visual effect from the colorful charms 
on your wrist. Again, it is almost impossible to ignore this strong, but
 unobtrusive reminder of your own promise to yourself.

This approach, combined with the use of our specially designed bracelets and charms, delivers a significantly stronger motivation as all the milestones you 
need to accomplish as always visible, Avoid Regrets, Achieve Goals, Enjoy Happiness
MyDagaz™ is all about helping you focus and achieve on your dreams and life goals at this moment in time, but we also want you to avoid regrets later in life. People in their 
twilight years often reflect on their lives and the regrets they have, and we want to help you 
avoid these regrets by being conscious about the things you want to 
change or improve on, and actively work on making those changes.
On a personal note and while working on this particular segment, I could not help myself and I asked my 78 year old mom if she had any regrets in life, and asked her to be as honest as possible. She answered "my biggest regret is not being able to spend more time with you and your kids". It is very hard for me not to tear up when I think about this, but the feeling is so mutual mom and its not too late!  One of my top goals in life is to spend more time with my mom and brother that live on the other side of the Atlantic Ocean.Nobody wants to live with regrets, but I dare say we all have them and MyDagaz wants to help you focus on your goals to avoid this! Believe it or not, the list of regrets below is just a small sample of the ones listed on numerous sites, and the ones below are listed in no particular order:


Been happier more. Not taken life so seriously
Wish I had lived my own life rather than how society taught me to live.
Gone on more trips with the family/friends
Not visiting a dying friend before he died
Wish I discovered my purpose earlier
Taught my kids to do stuff more
I wish I had taken more risks
Not asking that girl/boy out
Wish I had taken better care of myself
Not getting that degree (high school or college)
Wish I’d allowed myself to love
Spending more time with the kids/family
Wish I had touched more lives and inspired more people
Working so much at the expense of family and friendships
Standing up to bullies in school and in life
Stayed in touch with good friends from my childhood and youth
Turned off my phone more/Left my phone at home
Worrying about what others thought about me so much
Not having enough confidence in myself

There is NO reason for you to have regrets later in life! Even if you don't succeed 100% of the time,  you have to keep trying and do the best you can, and MyDagaz is the solution you are seeking. At the very core of our belief, we know that if you can 
accomplish your goals and dreams, you will become a happier individual, 
feel better about yourself and more satisfied with your life. 
Ultimately, this helps you achieve a greater "inner peace" and will 
positively impact your health and outlook on life.A Happy Person = Endless Life and Health Benefits!

MyDagaz wants you to focus more on yourself and your dreams and goals, because we believe that will make you a happier and a more self fulfilled person. Besides, who
 doesn't want to be happy?! Being happy not only makes you feel good and
 positively affects your interaction with the surroundings, it has a 
profound impact on your productivity, health and well-being too.Brain Health
Numerous studies show that happiness has a significant and lasting impact on your health, and it directly affects your brain: Negative mood variance disturbs your interaction with your environment,
 affecting your ability to perceive, remember, and reinforce existing or
 create new neural connections, while being happy improves your ability 
to be more cognitively alert and productive. Other than being much more 
fun to be around, being happy:
stimulates the growth of nerve connections.
improves cognition by increasing mental productivity.
improves your ability to analyze and think.
affects your view of surroundings.
increases attentiveness.
leads to more happy thoughts.

Happy people are more creative, solve problems faster, and tend to be more mentally alert. [Source: Psychology Today]

Longer LifeBeing
 happy doesn't just improve the quality of your life. According to a new
 study, it may increase the quantity of your life as well. Older

they reported feeling happy, excited, and content on a typical day. And 
this was true even though the researchers took factors such as chronic

"We
