We have completed a full manufacturing cycle and and have produced approximately 30 different charms in very small quantities in the weight loss category (maroon colored charms) and basic starter charms like the Start Charm, Half Way Charm and the Goal Reached Charm in most categories.The charms are made in the USA, and we have already started working on improving manufacturing processes to enable larger scale production. Due to the large number of unique charms, we can not mass 
produce the charms, and in order to minimize cost and maximize flexibility in creating custom charms (and on short notice), all charms are made in-house.We are ready to start manufacturing the thousands of different charms needed to help people with their goals, and for this we need your help in raising the needed funds for the following tasks:


Acquire 8 water-cooled, three-axis CNC machines capable of performing high-speed micro engraving/cutting operations. A CNC controller and a desktop PC with milling software is needed for each CNC machine. Estimated cost is US $4,500 each with a total cost of US $36,000.





Acquire charm raw material sheets in eleven different colors, lobster clasps, jumper rings and protective films for the charm front and back surfaces, Estimated total cost is US $14,000.

Acquire miscellaneous equipment to support the manufacturing process: engraving/cutting tool bits for the CNC machines, vacuum pumps for vacuum tables, water pumps, spindle vacuum systems for engraving debris collection. Estimated total cost is US $9,000

We are really excited about the deals and perks we can offer you in return for supporting us! We are offering discounts on memberships, bracelets, charms, and various package offerings containing all of these items. The crown jewel in our collection of perks is the LIFETIME membership option we are exclusively offering during this crowdfunding campaign and is never again to be offered.Should we not be able to raise the entire amount we are seeking, we will need to scale back accordingly and. The critical task right now is to create as many charms as we can to help as many  people as possible with their goals and dreams. On the other hand, should we raise more funds than we are asking for, it will be used to secure a suitable location for manufacturing and warehouse for the products.Frequently Asked Questions

What is MyDagaz™?
MyDagaz™ is a family owned company and the world's first to offer motivational bracelets and charms designed specifically to help you reach your goals - whatever they are! MyDagaz™ is membership based and relies on memberships to fund staff, technology and support growth. 
	MyDagaz™ consists of two main elements;
	
The Online Support Community and a set of tools to help you track 
		and manage the goals and dreams you have decided you want to focus on. 
		The Online Support Community consists of MyDagaz™ staff and all the 
		other MyDagaz™ members, and the sole purpose of the community is to 
		offer support and encouragement to each other when life becomes 
		challenging it is becomes difficult focusing on their goals and dreams.
The Goal Reminder bracelet is a critical piece to succeeding, and 
		the bracelet's main function is to keep reminding you of the promises 
		you made to yourself, i.e. the goals and dreams you decided to pursue. 
		Members should wear the bracelet with the milestone charms so they at a 
		glance can see where they stand and how far they have to go before 
		reaching their goal. The charms provides subtle and soft reminders to 
		the member so they don't forget.

The membership fees are purposefully kept extremely low and will be kept 
	that way as we do not want this to be a financial burden. Unfortunately, 
	many people cannot afford even a low membership fee, and we do offer 
	assistance to low income families.

How does it work?
There are many ways to use the charms and we do not want to discourage anyone from being creative. There are some proven ways to doing it and we will outline those here as well as discuss different ways of using them in our Blog.
The bracelet is made of stainless steel and will survive most environments as it is intended to be worn 24/7. You might find it difficult to sleep with the bracelet on or prefer taking it off when showering, and of course you should take it off when you want to. It is important though to keep it on as much as possible as it is your constant reminder of the goals you have set for yourself.
Recommended use of the charms is to attach all milestone charms for a particular goal and then remove charms as you reach milestones. We designed the bracelet and the charms to work together to keep reminding you of your dreams and goals without being overbearing or annoying. The charms are made of acrylic glass which is very strong, yet extremely light weight and adding dozens of charms will barely impact the weight. We believe placing all the charms when you start pursuing a dream or goal is the most inspirational, not only because you clearly can see all the milestones you need to accomplish before you reach your goal, but all the charms provide a stronger, yet extremely gentle, soft and soothing touch to the skin to make sure you do not forget what is important to you.
The MyDagaz™ Online Support Community is a social networking platform on the MyDagaz™ website designed to allow all MyDagaz™ members to interact and support each other in addition to our dedicated personnel. This is a very powerful tool which will keep our members motivated and somewhere to turn when "life happens" and you need someone to lean on for support and encouragement to keep you going. The Community is the main source of support and collaboration between members and MyDagaz support personnel are there to help each other achieve their goals.
The FAQ section is where we post answers to the most frequently asked questions to help newcomers as well as existing members.
The Blog is another tool we use to help members with questions they might have and categorize the answers according to topic.
The Goal Manager is your online tool for tracking and managing your goals, milestones and self-imposed deadlines and timelines. This is an important tool that helps you keep It also offers other features to help you get rid of bad habits and other vices.
Why is it important to pursue goals and dreams?
Being
 happy doesn't just improve the quality of your life. According to a new
 study, it may increase the quantity of your life as well. Older
 people were up to 35% less likely to die during the five-year study if 
they reported feeling happy, excited, and content on a typical day. And 
this was true even though the researchers took factors such as chronic 
health problems, depression, and financial security out of the equation.In other words, it is not only important to achieve your goals and dreams to feel better about yourself, achieve life fulfillment, inner peace and satisfaction, it has a direct impact on your health and you will live longer!
Ok - life is "getting in the way", what now?
When life "gets in your way" or difficulties in life are mounting, thinking about your own needs, desires or dreams are typically the last thing on your mind. It is unfortunate, but the reality that you set aside yourself and forget your own dreams when "life happens". The bracelet is there to remind you of your goals, and we have been told that thinking about your goals and dreams has a calming effect during stressful situations. The bracelet should help you keep your happy thoughts close by at all times, but we also want you to use the online community as a resource for communicating with others potentially having gone though what you are experiencing, listen and maybe personal advice to help work through difficult life situations.What is the MyDagaz™ bracelet and charms made of?
The bracelet is made of stainless steel and will survive most environments as it is intended to be worn 24/7. You might find it difficult to sleep with the bracelet on or prefer taking it off when showering, and of course you should take it off when you want to. It is important though to keep it on as much as possible as it is your constant reminder of the goals you have set for yourself.
Recommended use of the charms is to attach all milestone charms for a particular goal and then remove charms as you reach milestones. We designed the bracelet and the charms to work together to keep reminding you of your dreams and goals without being overbearing or annoying. The charms are made of acrylic glass which is very strong, yet extremely light weight and adding dozens of charms will barely impact the weight. We believe placing all the charms when you start pursuing a dream or goal is the most inspirational, not only because you clearly can see all the milestones you need to accomplish before you reach your goal, but all the charms provide a stronger, yet extremely gentle, soft and soothing touch to the skin to make sure you do not forget what is important to you.
What is the size of the MyDagaz™ bracelet?
We currently have two bracelets: one is a men's bracelet, which is wider and thicker than the feminine women's bracelet. The bracelets will be stocked in the following sizes:Women's bracelet lengths:5",    5 1/2",    6",    6 1/2",    7",    7 1/2",    8",    8 1/2",     9"    and    9 1/2"Men's bracelet lengths: 6",    6 1/2",    7",    7 1/2",    8",    8 1/2",     9",    9 1/2",    10"    and    10 1/2"
Who are you?
The Co-Founders of MyDagaz™ are Kelly and Rolf Heitmann, both seasoned IT executives with Rolf having a broad technology background as well. Rolf, having roots in and growing up in Norway, was familiar with the ancient Viking runes, that is how MyDagaz™ received its name.
Risks & ChallengesSince we have already completed a full production cycle of the weight loss charms and have learned the hard way what pitfalls there are, we are confident that moving into a larger scale production environment will be a smooth one. We are also very aware that with a larger scale production, we still have to be diligent with quality control to ensure the highest quality products. We have also minimized the risk of running out of materials by identifying multiple vendors that can deliver the necessary materials we need, and as we ramp up production we will also make sure we have necessary spare parts to minimize downtime during production.Other Ways You Can HelpOf course backing our project by selecting one of the perks we offer is a very effective way to support our project and we are very grateful for that. We do understand however that backing is not always an option for everyone and we appreciate any other help one would be generously willing to offer.Our main challenge is spreading the word and here are a few effective ways to support this effort: 
Share the MyDagaz™ images or link on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Instagram, tumblr or any other social network you subscribe to
Forward the link and the information by email to your friends and acquaintance and ask them to do the same
Tell us about blogs or other media channels that could be interested in writing or talking about the MyDagaz™. We will be happy to reach out and provide them with everything they need to spread the word.

story:
About the BitUnit 2015 seminar:

Bitunit Foundation will be organizing a Bitcoin-focused seminar on 28th November 2015 in Dansoman - Greater Accra, the City of Ghana. We will introduce Bitcoin and blockchain technology to the attendees. The BitUnit Foundation is determined to educate the masses on Bitcoin and other cryptocurrency usage and acceptance to improve their businesses and to help them understand the concepts of blockchain technology.

The event will be categorized into the following stages:

  1. Introduction to our newly founded BitUnit Foundation, our mission, vision, long term and short term goals.
  2. Introduction to Bitcoin, the importance of Bitcoin, Bitcoin usage and acceptance, and how to create a Bitcoin wallet.
  3. Introduction to Blockchain technology and its importance.
In addition, free meals and drinks will be included for the various participants. Participants will be issued certificates to show mastery in the crypto-sphere. Participation is fully FREE.

Our guest speakers:

Martin Albert (Bitalo.com): 
Martin is a full-time Bitcoin enthusiast from the very beginning of the cryptocurrency era. As a voluntarist, he thinks that statism is a crime and thinks about how to make the Bitcoin world a better place. For him, the most exiting thing is its political aspect - you and only you control your wealth. Having lost quite some Bitcoins in the past, Martin understood that centralized exchanges are in no way different than normal banks, where you give up control over your money. This inspires him to create a service for the Bitcoin world where the Bitcoins are always safe and in control of the users.

Robert David McLeod (Monetsu.com): Robert is an accomplished presenter and educator on blockchain technology. His diverse entrepreneurial background stretches over 15 years with projects ranging from technology, to finance, to building services, and community activism. Robert is currently the founder of the Silicon Valley funded blockchain startup Monetsu.com, is a former prize winner in the 2014 Bitcoin 2.0 Hackathon, and founder of the Vancouver Bitcoin meet up.

Brock Hager (technologist, bitcoin enthusiast): Brock has been working in the digital currency space since early 2013.  Besides giving training on Bitcoin and blockchain technologies, he also works full time as a computer technician in Iowa. He has over 10 years of experience working in various IT career fields including Application Analyst, Financial Systems Analyst and Help Desk Analyst. Brock lives in West Des Moines, Iowa.


TimothyCurry  is passionate about promoting disruptive technologies which reduce cost, streamline productivity, improve connectivity, promote commerce and inspire unity. Timothy has been an avid Bitcoin and Blockchain enthusiast since shortly after being introduced to the technology back in February of 2013. Timothy’s knowledge, personality and enthusiasm grant him guest speaker invitations for various events, conferences, and seminars. 


How your donations will be used:

Below is the budget estimate for the upcoming Bitcoin and Blockchain Technology Seminar. The estimate was done for an expected number of 150 visitors.

The foundation has about 50 students from the Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST) in Kumasi who will be moving with the BitUnit team from Kumasi to Accra to join the other students in Accra for the event.
Our guest speakers will be accommodated by the foundation and moreover there will be BTC giveaways for participants to enable them to know how to transact and open a wallet and to actively start using Bitcoin right away.


Our Rewards:


All Perks are produced by AfriWorks in Ghana. Afriworks is a platform made of entrepreneurs who are into locally handmade products and dedicated to promoting prosperity through entrepreneurship and crypto-currencies. The Afriworks team are into customized calabash necklaces, beaded necklaces and weaved bracelets and has the ability to produce in large scale, it is the first shop in Africa to accept Bitcoin for payments.

For more work samples please visit the AfriWorks Homepage & facebook group.


About BitUnit Foundation:

The foundation seeks to raise funds for upcoming events that will bring together the youth and ambitious and self-determined entrepreneurs enabling them to improve their businesses as entrepreneurs without government intervention.

The Foundation's primary mission is to spread the Bitcoin gospel to the people of Africa and beyond. This is our first event and by attending the event, you will hear from speakers in the crypto-world, receive great knowledge about Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, and have a lot of fun with other participants.

Donate to BitUnit Foundation with Bitcoin:

17VXTkqAjtuWAQHLyERNVBuPp9VANRrGUp

story:
BS"D

Short Summary

Rabbi Shalom's Arush's books have changed the world, translated into numerous languages, sold more than 2 million copies. 
Rabbi Brody and Rabbi Ballen are coming to the US in November and FOR THE FIRST TIME EVER we have the opportunity to bring them to Northern California. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise the money for flight tickets, lodging, classes:

  • Every dollar goes directly to R. Shalom Arush's yeshiva "Chut Shel Chesed"
  • You get beautiful Garden books in return for your donation to give to your friends
  • If we raise $6,000 or more they will be able to give DOUBLE the classes.

The Impact

California has more than 1 million Jewish people. We are everywhere and our job is to be the light on the nations. Our job is to show every human being that Hashem is right there with them, that Hashem is holding your hand! He loves you!
All you have to do is open your eyes, open your heart, and reach out to Hashem. He is waiting for you to speak to him, to tell him three words: "Thank You Hashem"
We have all been touched by Rabbi Shalom's teachings. They are so simple. You don't have to be religions to be close to Hashem, all you have to do is to open your mouth and to talk to Him. Teshuva is not about keeping Shabbat or keeping Kosher. Teshuva is about revealing your will to be close to the King. And you already are, you just don't know it. 

Let's bring this simple truth to every person by spreading the light of Emunah and bringing these two beautiful students of Rabbi Shalom Arush.

Risks & Challenges

Our only challenge is the Yetzer Hara, but since even the Yetzer Hara is from Hashem, and Hashem is right here with you, we will be succesful with G-d's help and infinite mercy. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially please LIKE, SHARE, COMMENT and tell all your friends.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
More and better author events

You know that BookPeople of Moscow's mission includes hosting inspiring author events for adults and children of all ages. Our schedule of events, available for viewing at www.bookpeopleofmoscow.com, is accordingly pretty busy. In just the past 3 and 1/2 years since the Spurlings and the Werners bought and revitalized the store, we've enjoyed meeting at least two Pulitzer winners and dozens of award-winning authors. But perhaps you've noticed that  1) sometimes it is hard to hear even with a microphone and amplifier, and 2) the chairs we have for our in-store events are large, heavy, difficult to move, and take up a lot of space?

  • BookPeople of Moscow wants to keep hosting lots of events, because the feedback from the wide range of people who attend is consistently enthusiastic and positive. Although author events rarely turn a profit, we love contributing to the cultural and artistic life of our vibrant community.
  • A better sound system and chairs will make it much easier for BookPeople staff to set up for events and for the attendees to enjoy them.
  • The cost of a better sound system and new chairs is beyond our budget; the day to day sales at the store simply don't allow us to set aside any money for anything after expenses for payroll, occupancy costs, and the store stock.

Your contribution will help BookPeople of Moscow meet community needs and help keep BookPeople vibrant and solvent.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We have been planning on replacing our chairs at some point and have finally located the perfect solution. (Thanks to Village Books in Bellingham!) The chairs are comfortable, lightweight, durable, easy to store, easy to set up and take down, and will make it possible for us and our volunteers to set up for events without worrying about tweaking our backs or breaking a sweat in our dressy event clothes. The chairs will also allow us to fit a few more people into our event space since they have a narrower profile than our current chairs, which were purchased from UI surplus and meant for permanent, heavy-duty classroom use. Each new chair costs $23 and there are no shipping costs. We'd love to get at least 50 (cost of $1150) and will get up to 100  ($2300) if funds allow.
  • A new and better sound system can be purchased for $2500. We are in the process of seeking out the best system for our needs.
  • If we don't meet our goal we will buy as many chairs as we can, and if possible, we will buy a portion of the sound system that we need, and try again for the rest of the system at a later date.

What price inspiration and enlightenment?

We are going to quote our hero Azar Nafisi (author of Reading Lolita in Tehran) in her newest book, The Republic of Imagination, explaining why reading and bookstores are essential:

"Imaginative knowledge is pragmatic: it helps shape our attitude to the world and our place in it and influences our capacity to make decisions. Politicians, educators, businessmen -- we are all affected by this vision or its lack. If it is true that in a democracy, imagination and ideas are secondary, a sort of luxury, then what is the purpose of life in such a society? What will make its citizens loyal or concerned about their country's well-being, and not just their own selfish pursuits? I would argue that imaginative knowledge is, in a very practical sense, indispensable to the formation of a democratic society, its vision of itself and its future, playing an important role in the preservation of the democratic ideal."

Why We Need Your Financial Contribution

Books are not like other products or widgets or food, therefore, the book industry is a little different from other retail ventures. Truthfully, it's fiendishly difficult to stay in business at all, much less turn a profit.

  • Book retail prices are usually printed on the books by the publishers and when we buy books from publishers and distributors we pay most of that retail price, with a small discount. The small margin between what we pay for a book and what we sell that book for - usually a few dollars per book if we're lucky - is where we have to get the ALL the funds for our payroll, occupancy costs, and store stock. Unlike the prices of food, toys, clothes, electronics, or other consumer goods, the prices of books can't be adjusted upwards quickly or easily to account for increases in overhead costs, which are rising all the time.
  • Author events cost money in terms of stocking the books, staffing the event, setting up the event, providing snacks and beverages, and publicizing the event. Thank goodness the publisher - or sometimes the author herself - usually pays for the author's travel expenses, food, and lodging. Yet even so, very rarely do we sell enough books at an event to even cover the costs associated with it. But still we love to host authors; the cultural benefit of their presence in our community far outweighs the financial burden of bringing them here.
  • We try to pay our employees living wages, which is almost twice Idaho's minimum wage. In a bookstore, giving you good service requires well-educated staff. Helping you find the book you want requires a different kind of skill than making you a great cappuccino. Also, most of us have families to support and student loans to pay.
  • Oh, and one other reason we can't adjust book prices upwards to set aside a little money for chairs and a sound system: Amazon controls a majority of the market for book sales in the United States. (Authors United and the American Booksellers Association is urging the U.S. Dept. of Justice to investigate Amazon as a possible monopoly and/or monopsony.) In the meantime, their use of books as a loss-leader for all their online sales of other consumer goods - and their failure to pay sales taxes in the states where their customers buy books - has put many independent bookstores out of business, constantly pressures the price of books downward, and takes away sales from independent booksellers like ourselves.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please spread the word about our campaign by using all the Indiegogo share tools available.
  • Buy all your books at BookPeople of Moscow and encourage all your friends, family, and acquaintances to do the same! You can shop in person at the store at 521 S. Main in downtown Moscow, Idaho, or visit our website at www.bookpeopleofmoscow.com.

The small margin between what we pay for a book and what we sell that book for - usually a few dollars per book if we're lucky - is where we have to get the ALL the funds for our payroll, occupancy costs, and store stock. Unlike the prices of food, toys, clothes, electronics, or other consumer goods, the prices of books can't be adjusted upwards quickly or easily to account for increases in overhead costs, which are rising all the time.
Author events cost money in terms of stocking the books, staffing the event, setting up the event, providing snacks and beverages, and publicizing the event. Thank goodness the publisher - or sometimes the author herself - usually pays for the author's travel expenses, food, and lodging. Yet even so, very rarely do we sell enough books at an event to even cover the costs associated with it. But still we love to host authors; the cultural benefit of their presence in our community far outweighs the financial burden of bringing them here.
We try to pay our employees living wages, which is almost twice Idaho's minimum wage. In a bookstore, giving you good service requires well-educated staff. Helping you find the book you want requires a different kind of skill than making you a great cappuccino. Also, most of us have families to support and student loans to pay.
 Oh, and one other reason we can't adjust book prices upwards to set aside a little money for chairs and a sound system: Amazon controls a majority of the market for book sales in the United States. (Authors United and the American Booksellers Association is urging the U.S. Dept. of Justice to investigate Amazon as a possible monopoly and/or monopsony.) In the meantime, their use of books as a loss-leader for all their online sales of other consumer goods - and their failure to pay sales taxes in the states where their customers buy books - has put many independent bookstores out of business, constantly pressures the price of books downward, and takes away sales from independent booksellers like ourselves.
    Other Ways You Can Help Maybe you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:  Please spread the word about our campaign by using all the Indiegogo share tools available.
 Buy all your books at BookPeople of Moscow and encourage all your friends, family, and acquaintances to do the same! You can shop in person at the store at 521 S. Main in downtown Moscow, Idaho, or visit our website at www.bookpeopleofmoscow.com.

story:
"Would you pay more than $1,000 to remotely communicate with another computer? The blind have to do this." This statement, made by the developers behind the recently funded NVDA Remote Access project, helped to bring to light the issue faced by blind computer users everywhere.

Currently, blind computer users have two choices when it comes to gaining access to remote computing devices, something sighted people have been able to do for years, often using free apps to do so. They can either pay large sums of money to Aquire specialized software to do this in an accessible manner or use a product like NVDA Remote Access. However, both of the aforementioned choices assume both computing devices are running some version of Windows. AccessibilityHound Remote brings the remote control concept into the cross-platform arena, ensuring that blind people can maximize the potential of the technology they already own.

How Will We Help Fight Unemployment?

There are an estimated 70% of blind Americans (American Federation for the Blind) and an estimated 75% of blind europeans (European Blind Union) who are unemployed. By implementing cross-platform remote computer access and working with free and open-source screen reader venders, we seek to create job opportunities for blind people everywhere, especially in countries where access to traditional assistive technologies are priced far beyond the already outlandish North American prices.

By open-sourcing AccessibilityHound Remote, we hope to ensure that everyone can access affordable, accessible and quality assistive technology and its accompanying training, regardless of their geographic region or socioeconomic barriers. It is only through access to solid training and assistive technology that blind people will be able to keep up with the increasing demands of a connected life, both at home and at work.

AccessibilityHound Remote helps to secure access to assistive technologies by providing new opportunities for building smart networks of connected devices. For example, a trainer in Bowen Island, Canada can teach a new assistive technology user in Paris, France at a fraction of the cost typically associated with costly in person trainers.

Why AccessibilityHound Remote?

We at AccessibilityHound Remote wish to build on NVDA Remote Access' success to make sure that blind computer users everywhere can access remote computers, regardless of the operating system installed at both ends. While the NVDA Remote Access project concerned itself with creating accessible connections between Windows computers, we recognize that there are many different accessible platforms used by blind technology users. These include IOS/OS X and Apple's built-in VoiceOver screen access technology, Android and Google's Talkback, Windows/Windows Mobile and NVDA, among others.

We believe that blind people should have the same right to choose their computing platforms and mix and match as they see fit. Our approach reflects that, allowing users of any of the above platforms to control Mac or Windows PCs remotely, giving a freedom that today can only be dreamed of by blind people but that sighted people have enjoyed via apps such as Microsoft's Remote Desktop and Parallels Access.

For many blind people, the choice of one platform over another is economically driven, as many of them live on fixed incomes. These individuals should therefore be able to access the technology training and resources they need to complete work and independent living tasks from the technology that they already own.

But Still, ... Why?

AccessibilityHound offers the first cross-platform screen reader remote support package, combining security, reliability and a robust network into a package that can be installed anywhere, from the classroom, to home, to work. Furthermore, AccessibilityHound Remote is compatible with NVDA Remote Access and will be similarly developed with an open-source model, allowing anyone to learn how the software operates and add additional features.

Why so much?

Software as complex as AccessibilityHound Remote requires talented engineers from diverse backgrounds, including iOS, web, Android, Mac, Windows and Linux development. Hiring such talent usually costs a minimum of $70 an hour. However, Alex Jurgensen (Lead Software Engineer at AccessibilityHound) and the rest of our team have agreed to complete this project at a fraction of that hourly cost.

Every dollar raised will go into the research, development and ongoing support required to keep such a large and completes project working with the latest assistive technologies on the market.

Why Should You Contribute?

Blindness and the resulting unemployment is often accompanied by high rates of depression and feelings of low self-esteem. By contributing to AccessibilityHound Remote, you are giving blind people the chance to become employed and experience the basic human dignity that comes along with having the means to support oneself. Together, we can help put a stop to the financial buriers that have traditionally held blind people back from reaching their fullest potentials.

story:
KrazyRide Technology is a mobile app providing tranportation services long distance and tours.

We combine all aspects of ground transportation in one single place accessible from a touch of a button.

As a member of KrazyRide community you will be able to:

- Find local rides whenever needed with a driver of your choice.

- Find friendly travelers willing to share a seat for a ride across the country.

- Easy access to tour services. You book and our tour driver will pick you up from your residence and explore with you the city.

- Find reliable chauffeurs for your events and ceremonies. Select among various categories of cars.

- We let the driver and the rider in control. 

- We maintain a safe platform with safe features as instant messaging, Alert to use while on the ride to prevent incidents, Access code to make sure you embark on the right vehicle, social media to check your driver or rider background on top of the throughout background we complete to make sure our drivers and riders are riding safe.

-you earn for driving or riding .

We will be delighted to count you as a member of our community.

Thanks and hope to see you on board.


New version : http://www.krazyride.info/staging08082015


www.KrazyRide.com

story:
It all starts with a EUREKA Moment!

Here at WREN, we're just like you. We're teachers, makers, entrepreneurs and business owners, artists, market vendors, parents, retirees, students, women and men.  And we're dedicated to giving our members the tools they need to really grow their businesses  and creative projects. 
That's why we do EUREKA Nights!
What's Eureka Night? Modeled on the “boot camp” style perfected by the Stonyfield Entrepreneurship Institute, participants present their business or project and the specific marketing challenge they face to a panel of local experts and a supportive audience. After a short comment/questions period, the participants are silent as the panelists and audience make rapid-fire suggestions and offer strategies for the business. This "case method" approach ensures a practical and grounded real-world experience. Participants, as well as the audience, take home a wealth of pragmatic and useful ideas that can be immediately put into action. The facilitator makes sure there are no long-winded talkers, keeps things moving along and ensures that everyone gains from the evening.  There's even time for networking and snacks.  Everybody benefits!

We Need Your Help!

We know Eureka Nights are a powerful way to help our members succeed, and build networks of support for both emerging and established North Country entrepreneurs. While we rely on the generosity of industry experts and community leaders who donate countless hours of their time to make these events happen, there are still costs involved in each one.  That's why we are launching this campaign...so we can keep those lightbulbs lit up with brilliant flashes of game-changing insights!

  • Each Eureka Night cost to produce, between publicity, food and supplies, and those costs are only going up. 
  • We have an ambitious line-up of EUREKA Nights coming up this fall and winter. A successful Indiegogo campaign ensures we can move forward with our plans to keep offering EUREKA events for artists, writers, and entrepreneurs throughout the North Country. 

Risks & Challenges

Here at WREN we don't just talk the talk...we walk the walk of our mission every day by taking bold leaps in the direction of our dreams and working hard to make things happen.  This campaign is a perfect example of that! We are not just telling you how to raise money for your project, business or organization...we are SHOWING YOU HOW IT'S DONE.  Why does this matter?  Because you know when you come to WREN for resources, advice and support for launching your business or next great idea that what we offer is born out of our direct experience. We can help you, because we have been there ourselves. 

Other Ways You Can Support WREN's Mission!

The true power of WREN grows from our connections, and the strength of the networks we collectively build. With your help, we make good things happen in the North Country and beyond. Here are some easy, practical ways you can help support our mission:

  • Donate to this campaign!  Every little bit helps us reach our goal!
  • Share this campaign with your friends, family and contacts on social media, with the super easy to use Indiegogo share tools!
  • Consider joining WREN! We are a membership driven organization. Your membership helps grow our networks of support, for you and so many others throughout the North Country! An individual membership is only $35, is good for a year, and can pay for itself many times over in discounts and free workshops and events. 
From all of us at WREN...THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!

story:
Hello

  I'm nervous just writing this. My name is Dwayne a young entrepreneur asking for donations to help out my technology startup company call SmartFlyyer. I grew up in a rough community in Miami. Growing up was always tough but I always manage to make a way out of no way. By the blessings of God I was able to pitch my company concept to the manager of Watsco Venture a branch from Watsco, Inc a billion dollar company in Miami. He love my prototype app and concept that in return they offer to invest an undisclosed amount if I can prove traction in the first three months of my company launch date. That’s the problem; I have no capital to start my launch process. I'm reaching out to my church, friends, strangers and neighborhood community to please support a young men trying to reach the American Dream. I’m a very work hard and hold an associate degree in Psychology. Also visit my company website for more info www.smartflyyer.com

Please Support A Young Bright Men Reach His Goals!

The Year Of 2015 Have Not Been That Good So Far.

February: Lost My Job Due To The Company Going Bankruptcy

March: Lost My Stepmother Which All I had Left
March: Sleeping On Friends Sofa  For The Time Being.

April-May: Decline By More Than 22 Banks for Business Loans( Some Love The Business Plan I Just Had No Collateral To Give)

August: Talks With Watsco Inc about potentially investing in my company (a blessing to me)

I lost my job due to the fact the company I work for went bankrupt. I have no income as of now to support me or SmartFlyyer launch date. I currently sleeping on my friends sofa as they support me through the hard times as I push harder towards my goals. I'm in progress of completing my Bachelor Degree and in-search for a job. I've been declined by more than 22 banks for line of credit to help SmartFlyyer reach the next goals. If you have read this post please help me raise money by RE-POSTING or DONATING, for I would really appreciate it. THANK YOU and GOD BLESS.

DONATION GOES TOWARDS

-Completing Android App (IOS app is Complete)

-Servers Monthly Fee

-Marketing And Advertising

-Office Supplies

- SmartFlyyer Business Expenses

story:
Hi everyone,

WHO:       "Our House" Resource Center, LLC is working to obtain  501c3, Non-Profit status for our organization called H.E.A.R.T.S (Help Each Adolescent-Mother Reach Their Spark).  All funds will be used for that.  We need YOUR help with......... 

WHAT:  501c3 Filing Fee: $850; Article of Incorporation filing for non-profit: $60; Lawyer Fee: $600; 16 passenger van: $4,000, Rental property/Building Fund: $1600 a month+.........to provide Additional Education Services via group theory       (mental/emotional health), training/workshops on parenting and child development, healthy lifestyle & prenatal care, career & money management, etc, to young mothers in North Carolina.

WHEN:    90 minutes a session, Once a week, 4 -5x a month, 32 weeks, ENTIRE SCHOOL YEAR for as many young mothers as possible.

WHERE:   The young mothers of OHRC are served in the high school setting. Durham, NC.

WHY:       By donating for the cause "You" will help us obtain our 501c3 status which allows us the ability to: 

  • Increase the graduation rate for expecting and parenting mothers
  • Decrease the drop out rate of teen mothers
  • Receive contributions from large corporations
  • Apply for grant funding
  • Transport the young moms and their children to off-site activities, 
  • Support the "Our House" facility
  • Provide nutritious meal during lunch (healthy lifestyle & prenatal care)
  • Incentives for motivation (self-esteem) 
  • Field trips/new experiences for exposure to new life
  • A facility where we can provide services and shelter off-site

Facility for Young Moms 

Their main frustration is their living environment NOT because they have a hard time following the rules.  Due to their various circumstances, their roles and responsibilities in the household has surpassed that of a teenager.  They are mothers and fathers to themselves, their siblings, and their newborn children. They are chefs, maids, and some even work to help pay their household bills.  Providing a living environment that is structured, stable, and secure is extremely important to us. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread  the word and share our page. Thanks in advance!


FOUNDER

I have seen first-hand the challenges that  have derived from adolescent pregnancy and parenting as a teenager. Such as witnessing friends and classmates face motherhood throughout high school.  Being raised by a single mom, I have lived the struggle that these girls and their children are currently living. NOT FUN!  Now we have developed an organization that motivates young mothers to keep pressing on, putting away the notion of  giving up, seeking resources, and making a better life for them and their child.

  

I am Tameka Brown, a North Carolina A&T State University alumnae and a seasoned Family and Consumer Science educator turned entrepreneur that is making a significant impact in the lives of teenage mothers. My love for children began as a teenager while working after-school as a Group Leader for Little River Elementary School in Durham, N.C. My passion accelerated in full force when I became a Teen Living & Parenting and Child Development teacher in Winston-Salem/Forsyth County School System and I had  so many young mothers in my classes.

WE DO WHAT WE DO BC! Risks & Challenges

Teen pregnancy has disadvantages for both mom and baby.Teen pregnancy is life changing. While most teen pregnancies are unplanned, even a planned pregnancy has risks and potential complications. While teen pregnancy rates have declined over the past 10 years, 22 of 1000 high school students still get pregnant each year, according to a report on the website Pregnant Teen Help. Nearly 1 million babies are born to teens each year, including 18- and 19-year-old, and not all of them are ready for or want the responsibility.

An estimated 70 percent of pregnant teens drop out of school, according to Pregnant Teen Help, and only half of those young women have jobs. Reasons for dropping out of high school include physical problems, such as morning sickness, and emotional problems, such as body image embarrassment, a fear of bullying or sexual harassment.

Compared to non-teen mothers, teen moms have higher rates of medical conditions such as high blood pressure or preeclampsia, reports Aetna InteliHealth. Some issues are caused by teens getting less prenatal care due to low income, embarrassment or trying to hide the pregnancy. Teens also have higher rates of premature birth and low birth weight of babies. Pregnant teens also tend to suffer from anemia. To avoid these problems, teen moms should see a doctor regularly, eat well, omit alcohol and drugs and quit smoking.

Teen moms have a greater likelihood of ending up on welfare, according to VAhealth. Additionally, the cycle will possibly continue through the next generation, as the daughters of teen mothers are 22 percent more likely than other teens to become teen moms, too, according to "Kids Having Kids: A Robin Hood Foundation Special Report on the Costs of Adolescent Childbearing." These are some of the various odds that are against the young ladies at OHRC so again we need " You" and what ever contribution that you can make.

Reasons for dropping out of high school include physical problems, such as morning sickness, and emotional problems, such as body image embarrassment, a fear of bullying or sexual harassment.
Compared to non-teen mothers, teen moms have higher rates of medical conditions such as high blood pressure or preeclampsia, reports Aetna InteliHealth. Some issues are caused by teens getting less prenatal care due to low income, embarrassment or trying to hide the pregnancy. Teens also have higher rates of premature birth and low birth weight of babies. Pregnant teens also tend to suffer from anemia. To avoid these problems, teen moms should see a doctor regularly, eat well, omit alcohol and drugs and quit smoking.
Teen moms have a greater likelihood of ending up on welfare, according to VAhealth. Additionally, the cycle will possibly continue through the next generation, as the daughters of teen mothers are 22 percent more likely than other teens to become teen moms, too, according to "Kids Having Kids: A Robin Hood Foundation Special Report on the Costs of Adolescent Childbearing." These are some of the various odds that are against the young ladies at OHRC so again we need " You" and what ever contribution that you can make.

story:
Thank you for supporting us. We reached 113% of our goal! This campaign was connected with: 

MotionGallery web site＊https://motion-gallery.net/projects/fountain_ring

Featured in


Be the owner of your own fountain

Wear it, create it and enjoy it.

When you wear this ring and place it under running water, it will create a butterfly-shaped water membrane. I have also developed another ring that can create a spider shape. With these rings, you can be the owner of your very own fountain.

With our Butterfly Ring, you can enjoy the refined and fluttering shape of a water butterfly by placing the ring directly under running water. Or, by adjusting the water flow, with our Spider Ring you can experience the elegant and delicate curve of a water spider’s legs.

My history

I started my career when I was twenty years old, during my third year at Musashino Art University. One day, while I was washing a spoon, I noticed that tap water created a thin and transparent membrane when hitting the surface of the spoon. I also realized that this phenomenon created a dry area beneath the water membrane where my hand wouldn’t get wet. I was enchanted by this sudden discovery. I started dreaming about building a water dome that could cover my whole body.

At first, I studied the six elements of a water membrane. Then, using many water pumps, I researched the mutual relationship between the water flow and the membrane’s diameter.

As you can see, a 20cm water dome looks like a jellyfish. A 70cm one can be worn as headpiece, stimulating the five senses. The dry space under the water dome is limited to a diameter of about 2m. So, when I created a 8m water dome, the size of the dry space remained the same. In this case, the surface created by the running water is suitable for projection mapping. Visitors could enjoy the feeling of being underwater and at the same time watch the projected lights. 

With my water dome project titled “Study of an immersive water display” I obtained my PhD at Tokyo University. My dream became to celebrate the importance of water with everyone, beyond countries and borders.

Big Fountains Era

From 1999 to 2009, I built 11 water domes at Japanese museums, department stores and rock festivals as temporary installations. Constructing and dismantling each water dome took 6 hours. The system is made of a pool, a water pump and pipes and a circular platform. In addition, electricity is needed for the circulation of the 13 tons of water needed to make the installation work and to provide energy to the lighting equipment. 

At times I was asked if I could build larger water domes. The answer was yes, but the space where people could stand under the running water without getting wet would still remain the same size. 

I was really happy to be able make water domes, but, at the same time, I felt frustrated, because the quality of the entertainment didn’t always match up to my expectations. To make the water domes more enjoyable, I needed more water, fire, lasers and fireworks, but that wasn’t always possible. I also couldn’t built water domes whenever I wanted to, despite having designed them.

Small but beautiful Fountains

So I was determined to develop a small but beautiful fountain. As you know, my starting point was in the kitchen. I realized that a spork could generate a special shape with three antennas created by the pointed parts that were obstructing the water flow. After that I studied many types of shapes and finally developed five special ones: a butterfly, a spider, a dragonfly, a cherry blossom and an arabesque. 

Thanks to my research, in 2013 Atelier OPA was awarded with the Lexus Design Award. During that time, I turned two of those particular shapes into finger rings. 

Paola Antonelli, one of the judges and a senior curator of The Museum of Modern Art (MoMA) commented “Poetic, effective, minimum effort >maximum effect. It chooses delight as a goal and it achieves it.”

3D Modeling

Rapid prototyping helped me with finalizing the details. After drawing the shapes, our designer, Ishikawa turned them into 3D models.

Each time the model is completed we produce it by using a 3D printer and check the result under running tap water, making small changes as we go. Finally, I was able to obtain a final design. 

After that I first worked with a wax model, which I later used to create a silver one. Lastly, a craftsman polished it and turned it into the final product. All these procedures were done in Tokyo, making Fountain Ring a product 100% made in Japan. These rings are the product of twenty years of research. I have also applied for Japan, US, EU and Chinese design patents.

Wear it, create it and share it.

You can wear these special Fountain Rings anywhere, anytime. While you wash your hands, draw a bath or play in the pool, you can enjoy your very own fountain. From now on, wherever you go, the world is your stage. 

My hope is to share the pleasure of my works with everyone. After you got Fountain Rings, please send me your pictures, otherwise use hashtag as follwings:  #fountainowner  #fountainring  #butterflyring  #spiderring

Instagram:　http://instagram.com/fountainring

Facebook:　http://www.facebook.com/fountainring


The best gift for someone special, or even for yourself!

It's not just a ring, but a whole new way to experience water. Each ring comes packaged in a velvet box, making it perfect as a present for someone special or even for yourself!

Color options and Rhodium plating

You can choose the color of the pleating. The colors currently available are: silver,  gold, rose gold, grey and black.

The Rhodium coating is made to last and to keep the ring's surface shining. However,  scratches or stain start appearing after using them, please ask a jewelry shop near you to pleat it again.

Laser engraving

By choosing an engraved ring, we will engrave up to 19 letters on the inside of the ring's band. A name, date or sweet message will make your ring even more special and  personal.

The available  fonts are:

  1. HGP Mincho B
  2. Monotype corsiva
  3. Edwardian script JTC

Conversion table between USA, UK, EU and Japanese sizes

When choosing the ring's size, we recommend ordering the larger size because the ring's band is 6 mm thick. Please refer to the Japanese sizes when ordering your ring.



The Ring sizes and weights

Butterfly Small Ring :  height 1.1 cm, depth 2.8 cm, width 2.2 cm, weight 12 g.

Butterfly Regular Ring :  height 1.1 cm, depth 3.3 cm, width 2.5 cm, weight 13 g.

Spider Small Ring:  height 0.6 cm, depth 2.2 cm, width 2.3 cm, weight 13 g.

Spider Regular Ring :  height 0.6 cm, depth 2.6 cm, width 2.7 cm, weight 15 g.

The fountain's size of Butterfly ring

The size of the butterfly-shaped water membrane depends on the quantity of running water and the differences in the ring's size. 

When you use a Small ring to make a butterfly membrane, it's dimension will be around 11 cm in width, and you will need 0.3 litter of running water every 10 seconds. However, when you use a Regular ring, the membrane width will be  16 cm and you will need 0.33 litter of running water every 10 seconds.

In both cases, if you use much water the hourglass shape disappears and a large butterfly takes its place.

The fountain's size of Spider ring

Compared to the butterfly ring, the spider ring makes a rather larger fountain.  The size of the spider-shaped water membrane depends the quantity of running water, rather than the differences in the ring's size. Whether you use a Small or a Regular sized ring, 0.3 litter of running water every 10 seconds makes a fountain that has a diameter of 25 cm. When you use 0.4 litter of running water every 10 seconds, both rings make fountains that have a diameter of 30 cm.


We would love your help

The Fountain Ring is a new design so we look forward to hear your feedback. So far we have built fountains for various companies, and a total of more than a million people visited and took commemorative pictures at our water domes. Many of these people wanted us to keep the water dome permanently, but that wasn’t possible since they were part of temporary installations. But now is time to share our new fountains with everyone, in a permanent and inspiring way. Your contributions in this campaign will allow us to improve even more and develop new Fountain Rings so please don’t hesitate to contact us with any questions or comments you may have.


Perks Overview


FAQ

Q. Are these rings safe for children?

A. No. These rings are not to be regarded as toys but as pieces of jewelry. Thus, it's important that the user practices caution when using them around children.

Q. What about water consumption?

A. The purpose of these rings is not to consume water, but to celebrate it and underline its importance. When washing your hands, drawing a bath or playing in the pool, these rings will remind you of the essentiality of water, making its user rediscover its fundamental qualities. 

Moreover, even when you are not playing with water, the ring’s shape will remind you of the water membrane’s shape. This idea came from Zen’s philosophy. In Kyoto, Japan, there are many dry gardens in Karesansui, style such as the one in Ryoan-ji temple. There, the rocks and pebbles are used to represent water instead of an actual river. It is very unique and manages to evoke the image of water even without its actual presence. The same can be said for Fountain Ring, that represents water and fountains in a modern, charming and sustainable way, similarly to a dry garden.

Q. When was your turning point as a fountain artist?

A. After the great East Japan Earthquake of 2011. In Japan, many public fountains ceased to operate. In order to preserve energy and water, some of them have still not resumed operation to this day. I started thinking that despite the fact that art and design can’t permanently solve this type problems, they can still be used to understand and express the importance of water. Water circulates throughout the plant and enriches out lives. The human body consist largely of water and all creatures need to survive. So, I decided to celebrate the importance of water by developing a small but beautiful fountain. 

Q. Can I make a fountain in a bathroom or in a kitchen in my house?

A. It depends on the water flow. To make a beautiful fountain, a clear and straight laminar tap water flow is the best. If the water contains bubbles and has a not-transparent, turbulent flow, water will hit Fountain Ring hard and become a spray. Find the best tap water in your house or office. That is the place that water-butterflies and water-spiders can inhabit.

Q. Can I make a fountain when I pour water from a glass?

A. No. The falling water that comes from a glass is a bit twisted and not suitable for making a fountain equally on all sides. Tap water from facets, hoses and watering cans, such as water that comes from, pipe is good for making fountains. By bringing the watering can to a pool, you can enjoy a fountain without worrying about consumption of water. 


Possible risks and challenges

Our concern is only about the date to complete and ship the rings. The design of Fountain Rings is done. Next step is mass production at a silver factory. We estimate that we can produce 50 rings per month. Craftsmen gradually get used to polish these special forms, they can make it faster and we can receive more rings per month. Moreover, engraving and plating take time. We check our products before shipment and when we found error, remake it again. We closed our campaign in the end of October, so that we scheduled to deliver these rings to you in December. We will do our best to send the rings at least it reaches to you before Christmas.

Schedule 

Close campaign: October 16th

Start production: October 1st (for the orders received in September)

Finish production: November 30th

Send by EMS: from December 10th

Meet the Team: Atelier OPA

Yuki Sugihara, Ph. D. Fountain artist

Munetaka Isikawa, Designer

Toshihiko Suzuki, Architect

Bianca Isnardi, Marketing and customer care

story:
HELP ME MAKE A SPLASH DIFFERENCE!

My name is Judy Arellano and this is Nikki’s Passionate Paw Campaign to open

                                                                       Become a Paw Member Today!   

WHY CHOOSE US?   

We are bringing together our passion for people, our passion for animals, and our passion for business!  When it comes to pet care, nobody is more passionate about caring for pets than the team at Splash and Dash.  We are excited about the future of our pet salon and ready to bring years of business experience into a growing pet industry proven brand called Splash and Dash. 

    


So for those who are tired of bathing their pet, tired of the same old grooming cut at the big box store, tired of your home smelling like your pet?  We have a solution!  A convenient way to pamper your pet that reduces your stress, eliminates odors in your home, and decreases your monthly expenses with our value membership service.

WHAT IS SPLASH AND DASH? 

We are a pet grooming salon with an amazing boutique.  Moreover, it is our exclusive unique signature membership service for the everyday dirty dog that has made us standout.  We will offer an “unlimited monthly bath and brush” service starting at only $39.95. This allows pet parents to bring their pets in as much as they need to keep their pet looking and smelling great!  We know your dog’s need to get outside and be active, but this doesn’t mean you have to settle for a dirty dog!  Our salon will offer a full range of services for dogs and cats in addition to the monthly unlimited bath and brush membership.  Our salon will offer a clean, safe, and friendly atmosphere for your pets.  We will stand behind our salon by offering a 100% customer satisfaction guarantee. 

                       

                                                   

   

Our boutique will offer a variety of specialty products for your pets.  To reach our customers outside of our community, we will connect with our customers through our website and most other social media outlets.  You will not have to live in our community to be a fan!    

Unique services we will offer such as our pet taxi service, drop off valet, and flexible scheduling will enable our business to be known as the unique pet store everyone is talking about!      

OUR MISSION   

To provide a loving, safe, caring and professional environment to the pets whose care we have been entrusted;

To treat our customers with respect, service excellence and with business integrity; and

To be a forward thinking, pet passionate member of our larger community. 


WHO IS OPERATING THIS BUSINESS?  

My name is Judy Arellano, future Owner of Splash and Dash in West Lake Mary/Orlando area.  It has been a dream of mine for many years to work with animals, but my career path led me into the health care industry.  It has been a rewarding experience and it has allowed me to develop my business skills in an environment of caring, respect, compassion, and understanding of others.  Armed with this knowledge and experience, I am excited to move forward in fulfilling my true passion and dream – owning a pet focused business that allows me to interact and “love on” man’s best friend---our treasured pets. 

As a business manager for 20+ years in the health care field, I have gained experience in leadership, accounting, accounts receivable, payroll, marketing, human resources, and perhaps most importantly, excellence in customer service.  My mother was an owner of her own hair salon for 20+ years and as a child I watched her build a very successful business by putting the customer relationship first.  Earning and maintaining our customer’s trust and satisfaction with our service will be the #1 priority of the West Lake Mary/North Orlando Splash and Dash Team.  I am ready to integrate my business background with my crazy passion for animals.  I am hopeful that you are likewise ready to support me and become a paw member in my campaign to bring quality pet grooming to the West Lake Mary/North Orlando area! 

Joining my team, will be my daughter Nicole, who has experience in retail, inventory control, customer service, and has volunteered for Seminole County Animal Shelter.  She will assist in the store and bring value added with her patience, kind heart and love of animals. 

We have lived in West Lake Mary/Sanford for 19 years and love our community.  I have watched Seminole County grow into a pet lover’s community.  Our community is filled with doggie awesomeness!  I am proud to be a part of this pet friendly community and I look forward to getting to know more and more people who share my passion and love of animals.

WHY A FRANCHISE? 

                  

As an extension to my business, this franchise provides knowledge, training, technology, and continued support for years to come.  The Pet Business is growing and having their experience will allow me time to focus on our customer’s needs.

Splash and Dash for Dogs is a proven brand franchise that I have come to know and love.  The more I read about this franchise, the more I wanted to know.  It was like being offered a seat on a rocket ship, “don’t ask what seat; just get on!” I knew this was the business I could throw my passion into and succeed.

 

In 2014, Splash and Dash made the Inc. 500 list of one of the “Fastest Growing Privately held companies in the USA”

To learn more visit Splash & Dash Website: https://splashanddashfordogs.com 


WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS CAN EXPECT:


·  A vision of excellence

·  A passionate owner, a compassionate staff, an experienced groomer

·  A safe, secure, and clean environment

·  A hand dry and gentle brush (a playful approach)

·  Convenient Hours and Flexible Scheduling

·  All natural and organic food products

·  Community Events

·  A 100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee


Our convenient store will be located on SR 46, West Lake Mary, in North Orlando, Florida.       

                         


HOW ARE WE UNIQUE? 

Our passion for animals goes beyond business.   We are making it a mission to bring awareness to the many homeless pets in need of a loving home.  Through our store, social media, and our website, we will spread the word!  We will begin by being a business sponsor of T.E.A.R.S. (Together Every Animal Receives Support) a fundraising organization for the homeless animals in Seminole County, Florida.  I am a volunteer for this worthy organization.  This organization is passionate and dedicated to helping pets find forever homes. I am grateful to be a part of this wonderful organization and excited for Splash and Dash West Lake Mary/North Orlando to do more to help animals find loving homes.  As our business grows, I hope to support and sponsor other worthwhile animal charities and events.  People say that today’s businesses must learn to give back to their communities.  But, as I see it, the dogs and cats that I will take care of are actually doing the “giving back”!  I find no greater pleasure than playing with a happy (and clean!) dog!

Given my experience in health care, I fully recognize the unique and fulfilling role pets play in the lives of senior citizens and the frail elderly.  I am passionate about helping connect senior citizens with sheltered/rescue pets.

Our commitment is not only to be the best store in our community, but to raise awareness.  The bottom line is, more lives will be saved because of your generous support!

WHAT WE NEED AND WHY?  

Our need is simple!  We do not have the financial resources to open today, so we need your help.  Like your pet, “large or small, we love them all”!  No matter what the size of your contribution, you will be helping us get one step closer to opening our store. 

Funds will be used for start-up costs to include:


Operating Capital:  

-  Computer Equipment  -  Utility Expense   -  Signage

-  Initial Supplies Inventory  -  Insurance  -  Licenses & Permits

-  Furniture/Fixtures  -  Marketing   -  Van (Pet Taxi Service) 

 

Why you should contribute?   

·  GIVE BECAUSE IT MAKES YOU HAPPIER

·  GIVE BECAUSE EVERY BIT HELPS

·  GIVE BECAUSE YOU THINK OUR STORE WILL MAKE A DIFFERENCE

·  GIVE BECAUSE YOU CHOOSE KINDNESS OVER CRITICISM

·  GIVE BECAUSE YOU LOVE ANIMALS

·  GIVE BECAUSE YOU SUPPORT SMALL BUSINESS OWNERS

·  GIVE BECAUSE YOU WANT TO HELP US GROW

·  GIVE BECAUSE YOU BELIEVE IN OUR MISSION

·  GIVE BECAUSE YOU BELIEVE A DREAM DOES NOT HAVE AN

 EXPIRATION DATE

·  GIVE BECAUSE YOU WANT TO IMPROVE OUR COMMUNITY

·  GIVE BECAUSE YOU SUPPORT RESCUE/SHELTERED PETS

·  GIVE BECAUSE YOU HATE GIVING YOUR PET A BATH

In addition to the good vibes created through giving, you can score fabulous perks. With your help you will have satisfaction knowing you are not only helping us open our doors to an amazing business opportunity, but you will be making our community a better pet friendly place to live.

Other ways you can help

Although not everyone can contribute, we appreciate your support and you can still help us greatly by sharing our campaign. 

  • Share our Indiegogo link to your friends and family: http://igg.me/at/nikki-paw-campaign 
  • Like and Share our Facebook page:  https://www.facebook.com/SplashAndDash46
  • Follow us on Twitter:  http://twitter.com/SplashAndDash46
  • Look for referral contests throughout our campaign
  • Contact us at:  splashanddash46@gmail.com

Thank you so much!  

With love from our hearts! 


Judy & Nicole  

                       

And some awesome pets we love!
story_txt:
HELP
ME MAKE A SPLASH DIFFERENCE!My
name is Judy Arellano and this is Nikki’s Passionate Paw Campaign to open                                                                       Become a Paw Member Today!   
WHY
CHOOSE US?   
We are
bringing together our passion for people, our passion for animals, and our
passion for business!  When it comes to
pet care, nobody is more passionate about caring for pets than the team at
Splash and Dash.  We are excited about
the future of our pet salon and ready to bring years of business experience
into a growing pet industry proven brand called Splash and Dash.      So for those who are tired of
bathing their pet, tired of the same old grooming cut at the big box store,
tired of your home smelling like your pet? 
We have a solution!  A convenient
way to pamper your pet that reduces your stress, eliminates odors in your home, and decreases your monthly expenses with our value membership service.WHAT IS SPLASH AND DASH?  We are a pet grooming salon with an
amazing boutique.  Moreover, it is our
exclusive unique signature membership service for the everyday dirty dog that
has made us standout.  We will offer an “unlimited
monthly bath and brush” service starting at only $39.95. This allows pet
parents to bring their pets in as much as they need to keep their pet looking
and smelling great!  We know your dog’s
need to get outside and be active, but this doesn’t mean you have to settle for
a dirty dog!  Our salon will offer a
full range of services for dogs and cats in addition to the monthly unlimited
bath and brush membership.  Our salon will
offer a clean, safe, and friendly atmosphere for your pets.  We will stand behind our salon by offering a
100% customer satisfaction guarantee.                                                                               Our boutique will offer a variety of specialty products for your pets.  To reach our
customers outside of our community, we will connect with our customers through
our website and most other social media outlets.  You will not have to live in our community to
be a fan!    Unique services we will offer such as our pet taxi service, drop off valet, and flexible scheduling will enable our business to be known as the unique pet store everyone is talking about!      





OUR MISSION   
To provide a loving, safe, caring and
    professional environment to the pets whose care we have been entrusted;
To treat our customers with respect,
    service excellence and with business integrity; and
To be a forward thinking, pet passionate
    member of our larger community.  




WHO IS OPERATING THIS
BUSINESS?  My name is Judy Arellano, future Owner of Splash and Dash in
West Lake Mary/Orlando area.  It has been
a dream of mine for many years to work with animals, but my career path led me into
the health care industry.  It has been a
rewarding experience and it has allowed me to develop my business skills in an
environment of caring, respect, compassion, and understanding of others.  Armed with this knowledge and experience, I
am excited to move forward in fulfilling my true passion and dream – owning a
pet focused business that allows me to interact and “love on” man’s best
friend---our treasured pets.  As a business manager for 20+ years in the health care field, I
have gained experience in leadership, accounting, accounts receivable, payroll,
marketing, human resources, and perhaps most importantly, excellence in customer
service.  My mother was an owner of her
own hair salon for 20+ years and as a child I watched her build a very
successful business by putting the customer relationship first.  Earning and maintaining our customer’s trust
and satisfaction with our service will be the #1 priority of the West Lake
Mary/North Orlando Splash and Dash Team. 
I am ready to integrate my business background with my crazy passion for
animals.  I am hopeful that you are
likewise ready to support me and become a paw member in my campaign to bring
quality pet grooming to the West Lake Mary/North Orlando area!  Joining my team, will be my daughter Nicole, who has experience
in retail, inventory control, customer service, and has volunteered for
Seminole County Animal Shelter.  She will
assist in the store and bring value added with her patience, kind heart and
love of animals.  We have lived in West Lake Mary/Sanford for 19 years and love
our community.  I have watched Seminole
County grow into a pet lover’s community.  Our community is filled with doggie
awesomeness!  I am proud to be a part of
this pet friendly community and I look forward to getting to know more and more
people who share my passion and love of animals.WHY A FRANCHISE?                    
As an
extension to my business, this franchise provides knowledge, training, technology, and
continued support for years to come.  The
Pet Business is growing and having their experience will allow me time to focus
on our customer’s needs.
Splash and Dash
for Dogs is a proven brand franchise that I have come to know and love.  The more I read about this franchise, the
more I wanted to know.  It was like being
offered a seat on a rocket ship, “don’t ask what seat; just get on!” I knew
this was the business I could throw my passion into and succeed.

 In 2014, Splash and Dash made the
Inc. 500 list of one of the “Fastest Growing Privately held companies in the
USA”To
learn more visit Splash & Dash Website: https://splashanddashfordogs.com  WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS CAN EXPECT:


· 
A vision of excellence· 
A passionate owner, a compassionate staff, an experienced
groomer· 
A safe, secure, and clean environment· 
A hand dry and gentle brush (a playful approach)· 
Convenient Hours and Flexible Scheduling· 
All natural and organic food products· 
Community Events · 
A 100% Customer Satisfaction GuaranteeOur convenient store will be located on SR 46, West Lake Mary,
in North Orlando, Florida.                                HOW ARE WE UNIQUE? Our passion for animals goes
beyond business.   We are making it a mission to bring awareness
to the many homeless pets in need of a loving home.  Through our store, social media, and our
website, we will spread the word!  We will
begin by being a business sponsor of T.E.A.R.S. (Together
Every Animal Receives Support) a fundraising organization for the homeless
animals in Seminole County, Florida.  I
am a volunteer for this worthy organization. 
This organization is passionate and dedicated to helping pets find
forever homes. I am grateful to be a part of this wonderful organization and
excited for Splash and Dash West Lake Mary/North Orlando to do more to help
animals find loving homes.  As our
business grows, I hope to support and sponsor other worthwhile animal charities
and events.  People say that today’s
businesses must learn to give back to their communities.  But, as I see it, the dogs and cats that I
will take care of are actually doing the “giving back”!  I find no greater pleasure than playing with
a happy (and clean!) dog!Given
my experience in health care, I fully recognize the unique and fulfilling role
pets play in the lives of senior citizens and the frail elderly.  I am passionate about helping connect senior
citizens with sheltered/rescue pets.Our commitment is not only to be the best store in our
community, but to raise awareness.  The
bottom line is, more lives will be saved because of your generous support!WHAT WE NEED AND WHY?  Our need is simple!  We do not have the financial resources to
open today, so we need your help.  Like
your pet, “large or small, we love them all”! 
No matter what the size of your contribution, you will be helping us get
one step closer to opening our store.  Funds will be used for start-up
costs to include:Operating Capital:  - 
Computer Equipment  - 
Utility Expense   - 
Signage- 
Initial Supplies Inventory  - 
Insurance  - 
Licenses & Permits- 
Furniture/Fixtures  - 
Marketing   - 
Van (Pet Taxi Service) 
  
Why you should contribute?   
· 
GIVE
BECAUSE IT MAKES YOU HAPPIER· 
GIVE
BECAUSE EVERY BIT HELPS·

BECAUSE YOU THINK OUR STORE WILL MAKE A DIFFERENCE· 
GIVE
BECAUSE YOU CHOOSE KINDNESS OVER CRITICISM·

GIVE

GIVE
BECAUSE YOU WANT TO IMPROVE OUR COMMUNITY· 
GIVE
BECAUSE YOU SUPPORT RESCUE/SHELTERED PETS· 
GIVE BECAUSE
YOU HATE GIVING YOUR PET A BATHIn addition to the good vibes
created through giving, you can score fabulous perks. With your help you will
have satisfaction knowing you are not only helping us open our doors to an
amazing business opportunity, but you will be making our community a better pet
friendly place to live. Other
ways you can helpAlthough
not everyone can contribute, we appreciate your support and you can still help
us greatly by sharing our campaign.  

Share our
     Indiegogo link to your friends and family: http://igg.me/at/nikki-paw-campaign 


Like and
     Share our Facebook page:  https://www.facebook.com/SplashAndDash46


Follow us
     on Twitter:  http://twitter.com/SplashAndDash46


Look for
     referral contests throughout our campaign

     at:  splashanddash46@gmail.com

Thank you so much!  With
love from our hearts!  Judy
& Nicole                         And
some awesome pets we love!
